With an unprecedented depth of gameplay, players experience original storylines featuring Vulture, Shocker, Rhino, and Mysterio all while battling through graphically rich 3D environments.

name: Spectral Tower II
summary:
Neverland is a lush, green world told of in ancient traditions.

Spectral Tower II is the second game in the RPG series released by Idea Factory for the PlayStation One console, the game begins with an intro in which the adventurer arrive to a town and after that he will meet another adventurer that will take him to the ruins of the evil tower that is located in the desert.

The gameplay is in third person perspective using an overview view meanwhile the player is exploring the different floors of each tower, and also a third person perspective for the battle parts.

name: Space Nations: Battlearena
summary: A Space Nations: Battlearena is a video-game that blends the survival, space simulator, and scavenging elements with last-man-standing gameplay.

name: Speedway Racing
summary:
In Speedway Racing, you will enjoy the fastest, most spectacular races at over 230 Mph, avoiding multiple collisions against 20 rivals.

There are several modes available, including Championship, Arcade and 4-player multiplayer.

There is also an online leader board where you can compare your best times with those of your friends and players from around the world.

name: Spider-Sense Spider-Man: Web-Master
summary:
Spider-Man: Web Master is a Plug It In & Play TV Motion game based on Spider-Man.

The web-sling controller features a wrist strap that you insert your arm into, A and B buttons, and a D-pad.

name: Spider-Sense Spider-Man: Web-Master
summary:
Spider-Man: Web Master is a Plug It In & Play TV Motion game based on Spider-Man.

The web-sling controller features a wrist strap that you insert your arm into, A and B buttons, and a D-pad.

name: Spider-Man 2: Web of Words
summary: Spell your way to victory in the Spider-Man 2: Web of Words game! Help Spidey climb buildings and defeat Doc Ock with your fantastic vocabulary.

name: Spider-Man 4
summary: Spider-Man 4 is an unreleased game for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC that was based on the movie of the same name. It was meant to tie in with the cancelled fourth Spider-Man movie.

name: Space N Traders
summary:
Space N Traders is a trading game with a vertical shooter gathering process, inspired by the original Space Invaders game. This could be a Game Changer (pun intended) with the family teamwork focus using our Co-Pilot system with zero negative impact on the main player.  
  
The game revolves around the Qridart family who are trying to find suitable planets to inhabit and bring the remaining population of their destroyed home planet.  
  
They need to secure 4 suitable planets but the 4 Evil Empires that destroyed their home planet are getting closer to doing the same to these native species.  
  
Can you find the strength and skills required to fight off the 4 Evil Empires and save these peaceful Civilisations? Will you be able to help them build defenses, in order to battle the 4 Evil Empires, and stop them once and for all? Or will these species suffer the same fate as your home planet and end in destruction?  
  
Play as the Qridart family, build up defenses, trade, upgrade, and bring the fight back to the 4 Evil Empires and reap revenge for the Qridart species.  
  
Allow your species to have a peaceful existence side by side with the native peaceful species.  
  
In Space N Traders we have a Unique Co-Pilot System, have a child or friend help you play the game, giving you huge overall benefits and helping children bond with the main player. This is aimed to allow even very young children(age 3) to game and bond without any negative impact on the main players progress.  
  
This is a family friendly game with a bias towards co-op style play that helps bonding while giving the added bonus of higher rewards.  
  
Space N Traders can be played alone.  
  
The game does not contain any episodes of violence, blood, and gore, sexual content or strong language. Content is suitable for all ages, including young children.  
  
P.S. No children were harmed in the process of creation or testing of this game.  
  
P.P.S. Please also be aware that spaceships have been physically hurt during game testing.

name: Spider-Man and the X-Men in Arcade's Revenge
summary: Spider-Man and members of the X-Men have teamed up in this side-scrolling action game to fight against Arcade, who has built a giant amusement park for the sole purpose of trapping and destroying the super-heroes. You first play as Spider-Man, who sees the X-Men get kidnapped by Arcade and follows them. Once you make it inside Arcade's park you can choose to play as Spider-Man, Cyclops, Storm, Gambit, or Wolverine, each of whom are trapped in a different part of Arcade's maze of deadly traps. You must navigate all five of them safely out, using their different skills and abilities while defeating baddies and bosses along the way.

name: Space Variance Authority
summary: Simple rules, extreme challenge! Just move your character and loop around bubbles to clear them. Sounds easy? Don’t be fooled—no one’s conquered this game yet. Are you up to the task?

name: Spin Rhythm XD: Indie Pack DLC
summary: Take a road trip to a distant, heartfelt past with the Spin Rhythm XD Indie Pack. Spin through 7 nostalgic tunes from artists Hachiku, Blanco Tranco, Obscura Hail, and more.

name: Spooky Horror Game
summary: A psychedelic horror shooter. A prison, four monsters, and you. Collect items and keys to survive. Don't let them find you.

name: Spirit Vendor
summary: I built Spirit Vendor as a solo indie dev, and I'm excited to share it with you! In this charming world, you decide how your day unfolds—run your shop, tend your fields, and care for your animals. Explore a lively village, meet unique characters, build friendships, and perhaps even find true love.

name: Spookitchen
summary: Run a haunted delivery restaurant in the Halloween world of Spookitchen! Explore the wild Poltergeist Forest for ingredients and serve dishes so delicious they’d wake the dead. Face quirky ghostly customers and win the showdown against the witch. Play solo or with up to 4 players for fun and chaos!

name: Space Rocks in Space
summary: Blast into the chaos of Space Rocks in Space, the ultimate 3D space flight adventure. Pilot customizable ships, explore stunning worlds, and battle through asteroid storms, UFO attacks and endless missiles barrages in this retro arcade odyssey.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants Talking Heads
summary: A 1999 Nick.com browser game where players click SpongeBob SquarePants characters to trigger voice clips and animations.

name: SpongeBob Moves In
summary: Create Bikini Bottom, make food & keep everyone happy.

name: SpongeBob vs. The Big One: Beach Party Cook-Off
summary: Play as Spongebob in this DS exclusive cooking simulator and help him become the best chef in bikini bottom

name: Spy Tactics
summary:
Spy Tactics is a mix of puzzle and turn-based strategy about fascinating adventures of a spy.

Develop your strategy and move the player on a grid, using tricks and tactics. There are many difficult missions waiting for you ahead: destructing special objects, obtaining the secret data, murdering dangerous enemies, stealing classified information. Calculate every step you make! Enemies are armed, but your espionage skills will allow you to remain unnoticed and get into top secret rooms!

many levels with their own secrets
several options of passing the levels – tactical/strength
beautiful visual style, area and locations
picking mechanical locks
hacking computer terminals
enemies of various strength and with various abilities
complicated puzzles that only the real agent can solve!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants Bubble Ball
summary: A 1999 Nick.com browser game where players control SpongeBob to hit and bounce a bubble ball to score points. Gameplay focuses on timing and simple arcade-style mechanics.

name: Spacewar!
summary:
Spacewar! is one of the earliest digital computer video games. It is a two-player game, with each player taking control of a starship and attempting to destroy the other. A star in the center of the screen pulls on both ships and requires maneuvering to avoid falling into it.

In 1971 it was unofficially ported into a coin-operated PDP-11 machine and renamed Galaxy Game. As an arcade machine it was installed at the Tresidder Union at Stanford University in September, 1971, two months before the official release of Computer Space, the first mass-produced video game. Only one unit was built initially, although the game later included several consoles allowing users to play against each other.

name: Spaceborne Survivors
summary: Slice, dice and blow up thousands of enemy ships! Spaceborne Survivors is a sci-fi casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to become a mecha menace against huge enemy fleets invading your space system.

name: Spelly Cat
summary: Solve word puzzles. Rescue your owner. Get fed!

name: Splatter: Zombiecalypse Now
summary: Inspired by the Hotline Miami and Resident Evil series, Splatter is a top-down-shooter with a film-noir singleplayer campaign, challenging fights against all kinds of monsters, gory splatter effects and destructible level environments.

name: Space Pilgrim Episode III: Delta Pavonis
summary:
Still reeling from the life-changing events of the previous episode, Gail seeks out a safe haven with her father in the Delta Pavonis system.
However, she soon learns that the politics of Planet Leto can be as treacherous and unpredictable as the local weather. What's more, her father seems to have disappeared under suspicious circumstances ... can she find him before her enemies catch up with her?

name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition
summary:
Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition is a First-Person Shooter for PS4 and PC based on Games Workshop’s cult classic board game set in Warhammer 40,000 universe. Expanding upon the original game, and featuring a host of new content, new features and a richer multiplayer mode, the Enhanced Edition is the ultimate Space Hulk: Deathwing experience on PC and for the first time on PlayStation 4

Play as a Terminator of the Deathwing – the feared 1st Company comprised of the elite of the secretive Space Marine Chapter, the Dark Angels – and engage in a desperate battle against Genestealers, within the claustrophobic confines of a Space Hulk. Grow stronger, gaining skills, new abilities, and powerful equipment as you earn experience across perilous missions. The Enhanced Edition brings a host of fresh features to enjoy in both solo and multiplayer: a new class, an expanded arsenal, deadly new enemies , a deep online customisation system, and a new Special Missions mode bringing infinite replayability with randomly-generated missions for every game chapter.

This edition marks the game’s first release on PlayStation 4, with all its additional content available through free updates for all present and future Space Hulk: Deathwing players on PC. Strap on your Terminator armour and equip the iconic weaponry of the Space Marines to overcome the threats lurking deep within Space Hulk Olethros!

name: Space Invaders
summary:
Space Invaders EX (simply titled Space Invaders in North America) is a Space Invaders title released in 2002 by Activision for the Game Boy Advance.

The game features two main gameplay modes. The 1 Player mode is the main gameplay mode, which is an update on the classic Space Invaders formula. The game features four different types of enemies, each with a different color. By defeating four enemies of the same color in a row, you get a single use special weapon. Red enemies drop the straight rocket, which goes through enemies vertically. Blue and green enemies drop the right and left rockets respectivelly, which make a 90° turn when they hit an enemy, going through the remaining enemies horizontally. Finally, yellow enemies drop the diagonal rocket, which divides itself in two when it hits an enemy then goes through them diagionally. This weapons system would later be expanded upon in Space Invaders Extreme.

Classic Mode is a recreation of the original game, though adapted to fit the smaller screen. Additionally, the game featuresn 2-players versus and co-op modes through the GBA Link Cable.

name: Space Pirates and Zombies 2
summary: In SPAZ 2 you must survive in an evolving post apocalyptic Galaxy. The zombie threat is defeated, infrastructure has collapsed, fuel is scarce, and scavenging means survival. Initially the Galaxy contains hundreds of fleets, each trying to survive. AI captains do everything the player can.

name: Splodey
summary: The platformer without a jump button! Master the art of potion propulsion in this fast-paced adventure where strategy, precision, and creativity meet explosive fun.

name: Spider Mall!
summary: A night of urban exploration goes wrong for Explorer X as he finds himself trapped in an abandoned shopping mall facing off against security guards and a giant hungry spider. You make the choices in this live action bodycam FMV game. Escape the mall or die trying!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide - Ghostly Digital Edition
Space Chess
summary: Play Capture-the-King Raumschach, invented in 1907 and made more playable by futuristic visuals! Spread out cells and helpful highlighting maximize the player's ability to visualize the board. The game features public and private lobbies.

name: Spire Blast
summary:
Take a step into the colorful world of Spire Blast. With your ever hungry dragon companion collapse numerous mysterious towers of all shapes and sizes that have risen all over the kingdom.

Test your wits and skills, use all the tools at your disposal and you will emerge victorious!

name: Spider Maze
summary: You are alone in an abandoned maze. A monstrous, hairy spider hunts you. To escape, survive three deadly trials hidden within the maze. Experience intense scares and spine-tingling thrills. Player discretion advised - not recommended for players with arachnophobia.

name: Spot Girls Difference
summary: Spot Girls Difference is a game to find different things. Come on, find different things among all kinds of beautiful women. Every level will have a new beauty, and different places may be in any location of the beauty.

name: Spellbreak
summary:
Spellbreak is an epic fantasy action-spellcasting game where players fight to become an all-powerful battlemage. Weave spectacular spell combinations, craft strategic builds, and master your environment as you dominate the Hollow Lands solo or with friends in a non-stop quest for survival.

The servers are currently shut down, but the developers have generously released a PC standalone version that allows you to host community servers or play offline.

name: Spotto!
summary: Spotto! is a puzzle game in which the player takes control of Spotto, adjusting his bomb toss trajectory with the stylus to throw bombs into the ghosts’ mouths, either directly or via obstacles located throughout the environment. While ghosts and obstacles may be moving in some of the fifty stages, Spotto remains stationary in the lower left corner all the time. In the Story Mode, the player gets five bombs at the beginning of each stage and loses one for every toss that doesn't kill an enemy. After a kill, a super bomb which causes more damage, is sometimes awarded. Besides the ghosts, some boss characters will have to be beaten.

name: Spooky Monkey
summary: A cozy top-down Zelda-like ARPG with satisfying riddles, relaxing exploration, and a spooky undead theme.

name: Spiritgrapher: The Asylum 99
summary: A retroy style first-person horror adventure set in an abandoned hospital. You are a spiritgrapher, your camera can see what is beyond the reach of the human eye. Head to an abandoned hospital and shoot a report about supernatural events.

name: Spacestation Pheta
summary: You find yourself trapped in the abandoned space station Pheta and must find a way out!

name: Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home - Ultimate Edition
summary: Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

name: Space Food Truck
summary: Space Food Truck is a cooperative, culinary scifi adventure. 1-4 players take on unique roles aboard the Galaxy Gourmet. Their mission: explore a vast, procedurally-generated galaxy in search of exotic ingredients, craft delicious recipes, and withstand the untold dangers of deep space.

name: Space Blaze
summary: Space Blaze taps into that old-school sideways scrolling shoot’em up, by leading you through 7 challenging levels filled with action. There are three different weapon systems with a single mega-weapon for each and don’t forget that classic 80s games feature - a giant boss to shoot it out with at the end of each level. Today it’s all about cool retro without the frustrating loading times, so get started and get a friend to join you in a two-player battle against hordes of enemies in Space Blaze.

name: Splatoon 3: Side Order
summary:
Challenge yourself to a new single-player campaign, Side Order! As Agent 8, you wake up to discover Inkopolis Square has been drained of color and its residents have gone missing.

Looming over the city is the ominous Spire of Order. Alongside a drone who claims to be Off the Hook member Pearl, Agent 8 must fight off waves of enemies in floor after floor of challenges on their way to the top of the Spire and learn its secrets.

Use color chips to boost your abilities in this experience that’s designed to be replayed over and over.

name: Spy vs. Spy 3
summary:
Spy vs. Spy: Arctic Antics 
 
Spy vs. Spy: Arctic Antics (also known as Spy vs. Spy III: Arctic Antics)[10] was the third game in the series, and switched the location from a tropical island to the frozen wastes of the Arctic. The spies fought by means of throwing snowballs at each other and setting traps, which decreased their body heat bar. Tools the spies used included a saw which allowed a hole to be cut in the ice for the second player to fall into and lose body heat. Lost body heat could be restored by moving into an igloo with a heater inside.

name: Spider-Man: 030 - Red Suit Mod: Trip Web
summary: Cast a horizontal cable-like web that trips enemies

name: Spider-Man: 039 - Enemy Mod: Guilt Trip
summary: Give you enemies a guilty conscience and lessen their attack strength.

name: Spectral Report
summary: Enter abandoned locations as Spectral Reporters to prove the existence of ghosts. But beware: sanity is fragile, and not everything you see is real. Cooperate with your team, investigate the place, take evidences, and finally prove that ghosts are real.

name: Sphere III: Enchanted World
summary: Take a journey to an epic fantasy world of Sphere 3: Enchanted World, the PvP-based MMORPG with hardcore non-target system! Play it for free to experience massive battles, breathtaking castle sages, deep storyline and even more.

name: Spider-Man: 025 - Red Suit Mod: Air Evac
summary: A special web-defense by escaping straight up.

name: Space Hunted
summary: You are Jade Hunter, an intergalactic treasure hunter. While traveling past an uncharted planet, your ship was shot down. Now Jade is an intruder, an alien, on this uncharted planet, and is being hunted down. Your mission is to survive and escape the planet! Travel through 128 levels! Avoid and defeat enemies to survive! Collect powers to ensure your survival! Do you have what it takes to survive in Space Hunted? Or will you be hunted down?

name: Spellstone
summary: Spellstone is a fantasy card game with beautiful hand-drawn art and rich lore! Collect hundreds of striking cards to battle through a compelling story and unravel the mystery of the Void.

name: Spyro: Year of the Dragon
summary: The Dragon Realms are celebrating the ‘Year of the Dragon’ when a mysterious cloaked figure emerges to steal all the Dragon Eggs. Under the spell of the evil Sorceress, an army of Rhynocs is now guarding the helpless eggs in the Forgotten Realms. With new and old friends, Spyro is on a quest to recover the lost eggs, defeat the Rhynoc army and stop the evil Sorceress.

name: Space Fighter: Code 1999
summary: It's a shooting game with a space background. Destroy a certain number of enemies and clear the level until you clear it. Enemies appear randomly, and each time you play it has a different experience. Welcome to discover more secrets in the game.

name: Spider-Man: 017 - Black Suit Mod: Shaky Ground
summary: Knock enemies to the ground with an earth-shaking attack.

name: Space Sex Lab
summary: Doctor Diana gets to study alien flora and fauna on new planets. But she gets so lonely, until space elf pilot Flex comes to keep her company. How much futa dick can the good doctor take? How deep down her tight little asshole can Flex go?

name: Spider-Man: 014 - Black Suit Mod: Disguided
summary: Briefly become invisible.

name: Spread The Love
summary: A silly dating sim where your flavor decides your fate. Customize your profile, flirt with six lovably unique characters, and try to survive your first date!

name: Spider-Man: 010 - Black Suit Mod: Octattack
summary: Spin a special 8-point attack.

name: Spider-Man: 024 - Red Suit Mod: Slow Motion
summary: Briefly avoid attacks by slowing everything down.

name: Spider-Man: 011 - Black Suit Mod: The Bowling Ball
summary: Fire a spherical, Symbiote-matter projectile.

name: Spider-Man: 006 - Arsenal Mod: Web Fluid
summary: Shoot a web so high it creates rain, which will drop devastation upon you enemies.

name: Spider-Man: 007 - Black Suit Mod: Spider Bite
summary: A quick, stabbing attack, draining health from your enemy.

name: Spider-Man: 016 - Black Suit Mod: Up & Away
Spider-Man: 020 - Red Suit Mod: Spider Shield
summary: Repels solid objects and reduces damage from enemy's blows.

name: Spider-Man: 012 - Black Suit Mod: Jumping Spider
summary: Produce mega-jumping power.

name: Spider-Man: 019 - Black Suit Mod: Black Flail
summary: Wield a ball and chain-type weapon with a blob at the end of a web.

name: Spider-Man: 022 - Red Suit Mod: Spidey Sense
summary: Bestows the ability to sense danger more easily.

name: Spider-Man: 008 - Black Suit Mod: The Tarantula
summary: Inflict heavy damage on your enemy.

name: Spider-Man: 026 - Red Suit Mod: Tuffanuff
summary: Scan to withstand more punishment. Your health will deplete more slowly.

name: Spider-Man: 013 - Black Suit Mod: Goo Hammer
summary: Unleash a super-strong punching attack.

name: Spider-Man: 001 - Character: Spider-Man
summary: Transform into Spider-Man and swing into action.

name: Spider-Man: 021 - Red Suit Mod: Super Slinger
summary: Extends distance when web-slinging.

name: Spider-Man: 009 - Black Suit Mod: Trap Door Spider
summary: Use a crouch-and-spring attack.

name: Spider-Man: 023 - Red Suit Mod: Web O Mondo
summary: Encase Spider-Man inside a ball of webbing and roll it over your enemies.

name: Spider-Man: 049 - Arsenal Mod: Health Drink
summary: Completely restores Spider-Man's health.

name: Spider-Man: 027 - Red Suit Mod: Arachnophobia
summary: Psych out your enemies by making them nervous and unsure.

name: Spider-Man: 015 - Black Suit Mod: Bad Habit
summary: Get a lift with a web-assisted leap.

name: Speedrun
summary: You're trapped in underground cities! Run and use your special dash movement to survive.

name: Space Pilgrim Episode IV: Sol
summary: Locked away in the most secure prison in the galaxy, with little hope of escape, Gail Pilgrim faces the most difficult ordeals of her life. Her only hope lies in trusting those who she has come to regard as her friends.

name: Spider-Man: 028 - Red Suit Mod: Hang 'em High
summary: The web-slinging attack can hang an enemy from a convenient post.

name: Spider-Man: 037 - Enemy Mod: Web of Steel
summary: Assist Spider-Man in his "encounter" with New Goblin.

name: Spider-Man: 034 - Enemy Mod: Tritium Card
summary: Assists you in your confrontation with Doc Ock.

name: Spider-Man: 036 - Enemy Mod: Spider Agility
summary: Projectiles inflict less damage - especially useful against Green Goblin.

name: Spider-Man: 038 - Enemy Mod: Ego Boost
summary: Get a boost in morale and your stats, too.

name: Spider-Man: 047 - Arsenal Mod: Spider Speed
summary: Get a burst of super speed and pummel foes with extra vigor.

name: Spider-Man: 044 - Mission Mod: Big Apple 4
summary: Activates "Missing Person's Squad" mission.

name: Spider-Man: 043 - Mission Mod: Big Apple 3
summary: Activates "Web-slinger" mission.

name: Spider-Man: 035 - Enemy Mod: Disintegrator
summary: Boost your powers - especially against Sandman.

name: Spider-Man: 033 - Enemy Mod: Sonic Drubbing
summary: Increase your sonic energy - especially against Venom.

name: Spider-Man: 048 - Arsenal Mod: Super Strength
summary: Summon all of Spider-Man's power, briefly increasing his attack damage.

name: Spider-Man: 031 - Red Suit Mod: Camouflage
summary: Trick some of your enemies by briefly becoming difficult to see.

name: Spider-Man: 056 - FX Mod: Time Twist
summary: Turn day into night. Who knows what mysterious effects lurk within a veil of darkness?

name: Spider-Man: 045 - Mission Mod: Big Apple 5
summary: Activates "Gangland Uprising" mission.

name: Spider-Man: 046 - Arsenal Mod: Invincibility
summary: Become invincible for several seconds.

name: Spider-Man: 041 - Mission Mod: Big Apple 1
summary: Activates "Clobber the Robber" mission.

name: Spider-Man: 051 - Arsenal Mod: Web Flurry
summary: A powerful attack that smacks all enemies with web blasts. Use once per level.

name: Spider-Man: 057 - FX Mod: Daily Bugle
summary: Unlocks concept art for the video game.

name: Spider-Man: 040 - Enemy Mod: EZ Does It
summary: Gain less experience for completing the level, but your foes will be slightly weaker.

name: Spider-Man: 058 - FX Mod: Sound Mode
summary: Sample all of the sound effects and music in the game.

name: Spider-Man: 053 - FX Mod: Super Jumper
summary: Jump ridiculously high, clearing tall buildings.

name: Spider-Man: 054 - FX Mod: Parade Route
summary: Cause colorful confetti to rain from the sky.

name: Spider-Man: 060 - FX Mod: Comic Book Mode
summary: Spider-Man's attacks are accompanied by a visible comic-style "Pow!" and "Biff!"

name: Spider-Man: 055 - FX Mod: Wacky Noises
summary: Sound effects within the game become comically altered and exaggerated.

name: Spidy
summary: Adventures of a young spider

name: SPQR: The Empire's Darkest Hour
summary: SPQR is a 3D adventure game that challenges you to learn how the Roman Empire works - structurally, mechanically, economically, culturally and politically. Players are given one year to investigate five equally suspicious suspects in order to solve the ultimate mystery: Who is plotting to destroy Rome and how will they do it?

name: Space UFO
summary: A cosmic 2D arcade. Control the flight of the UFO in space.

name: Spirits' Forest
summary: Armed with a sacred sword, protect the sacred forest of a kingdom against the invasion of fiery demons in this shoot'em up taking place in a universe that mixes medieval and fantasy.

name: Spot the Odd Pictogram!
summary:
Which Pictogram Doesn’t Belong?
A Fast-Paced Brain-Training Spot-the-Difference Game

name: Space Funeral 2: of Rubies and Gold II - From Shadows We Rise
summary: A sequel to Of Rubies and Gold, and an unofficial sequel to Space Funeral 2. The game takes place after Of Rubies and Gold but before Space Funeral 2.

name: Spring: 1944
summary:
A WWII RTS game 
Spring: 1944 is an open source Real Time Strategy game set in the final year of WWII. Think of it like a cross between Company of Heroes and Supreme Commander, as designed by someone who played neither. 
 
Originally begun in 2002 as a single-unit modification for Total Annihilation called Axis & Allies TA, the game has since grown well beyond its original plans. The mod was completed in August of 2005, with the main dev at that point (M_26_7 / SpikedHelmet) deciding it was time to move on. Not long after, an early version of the Spring engine was released — an engine designed to run content from Total Annihilation, and Axis & Allies TA was soon ported by a fan, and then by FLOZi in November of 2005. The port was then released in December 2006 with a few bits of new content (mostly infantry models) and updated game play elements. 
 
After that release, AATA was reborn as Spring: 1944 – a complete re-build from scratch, using all-new content and a new design philosophy. While our release schedule has been a tad on the erratic side, work has been progressing continuously ever since 2006, with published builds going out approximately once or twice a year. The game reached a nearly completed state between 2010-2011, and most of the work since that point has focused on balance, a handful of new gameplay mechanics, cleaning up the game’s internals and smoothing out the experience for new players.

name: Spirit-Capture Net
summary: In "Spirit-Capture Net," guide a small spirit through a world of light and obstacles. Every move creates new barriers, making each puzzle more challenging. Experience unique self-blocking mechanics, clever level design, and a clean visual style. Outsmart yourself and find the way out!

name: Spider-Man: 005 - Red Suit Mod: Daddy Long Legs
summary: Unleash a superior kicking attack.

name: Spider-Man: 002 - Black Suit Mod: Black Widow
summary: Paralyze you opponent with a poisonous bite.

name: Spider-Man: 004 - Red Suit Mod: Fly Paper
summary: Deploy a sticky-webbing that hampers an enemy's movement.

name: Spider-Man
summary: A Toys 'R' Us exclusive edition of Spider-Man for HyperScan. It comes with an extra card, number 059, Quick Learner.

name: Space Memory: Parrots
summary: Cute, relaxing memory game where you match pairs of adorable parrots in space

name: Sparticles
summary:
Sparticles is a fast-paced platformer about using colorful particles to uncover your surroundings. 
 
The objective of each level is to defeat all of the enemies in the room (if any) and reach the goal. However, the terrain is invisible to the player. The player can discover terrain by physically bumping into it, or by performing a double jump or making a dash. Sparticles contains 100 levels, more or less difficult. Gameplay mechanics are added gradually, so as not to tire the player. 
 
Key Features 
 
100 platforming levels to test your skills 
Defeat challenging Bosses! 
If there are enemies, you must destroy them to unlock the exit portal 
Scoreboard to see the best time of all users and friends on each level 
Repeat as many times a level, death is very fast!

name: Spy vs. Spy
summary:
The black Spy and the white Spy are out to beat each other before the time bell rings. Find the needed objects by digging through drawers, closets and furniture in the house. Foil your opponent by setting creative booby traps in the various rooms (a bomb in a dresser drawer, for instance).

Fights ensue when both spies enter the same room. Find hidden weapons in the rooms to help with those fights, since one of you will die if you run into each other.

name: Spearrowblade
summary: A dark 2D action-adventure in Metroidvania style. Choose sword, spear, or bow, explore a connected world full of secrets, meet strange NPCs, battle powerful foes – and face your rival. Your path, your weapon, your destiny.

name: Splash Girls
summary: A new third person shooter by qureate about a nurse fighting suddenly transformed giant girls to cure them.

name: Sprint City
summary: Sprint City is a shared world, competitive 2D platformer from the original creators of SpeedRunners. It’s all about fast movement, tight controls, and the constant fear that someone behind you just found a shortcut you didn’t know about.

name: Spotless
summary: Clean, Clash, and Collect across the crummiest corners of this Single-Player Rogue-Lite. Spend your meager earnings wisely on both permanent and temporary upgrades, so that even the thriving haunts of cute and creepy creatures can’t stop you from cleaning until everything is Spotless!

name: Space Invaders DX
summary:
A remake of the original with several new options and gameplay elements, including a competitive two-player mode.
Introduced a "parody mode" that replaces the traditional sprites by those from other Taito games including Arkanoid, Bubble Bobble, The NewZealand Story, and Darius.
Early versions use Taito's B system hardware, while later ones use Taito's F3 system hardware.
The home versions were released as Space Invaders - The Original Game. Other names include: Space Invaders XL on the Nuon, Space Invaders '​94 on the Game Boy and Super Nintendo Entertainment System, and Space Invaders 2000 and Space Invaders 1500 on two PlayStation re-releases.
The home releases feature variants of the two-player mode.
The Game Boy release was an update to the 1990 version of Space Invaders Part II. Extra options similar to Space Invaders DX are available when played via Nintendo's Super Game Boy.
The first PlayStation release lacked the two-player mode. Subsequent PlayStation re-releases in 1998 and 2001 restored it. The 2001 release, known as The Invaders and Space Invaders 1500, includes a 3D version, and was part of D3 Publisher's Simple series of budget games that sell for ¥1500.
The Super Nintendo Entertainment System version was also released on Nintendo's Virtual Console.

name: Spring in Her Step
summary: Change is scary, but she'll choose to bloom anyway.

name: Space Vanguard
summary: "Space Vanguard" is a plane shooting game with science fiction theme, which tells the story of an insignificant landing battle against stars. The player will act as a paratrooper and take part in this attack on the planet controlled by Winchester's military industry.

name: Sprill & Ritchie: Adventures in Time
summary: Return items to their correct era in Sprill and Ritchie - Adventures in Time, a wonderful adventure across different ages. Ritchie invites Sprill over to check out his latest invention - a time machine. When the machine is turned on, things go awry and items from all different eras of time are misplaced. Now, the young fox cub is on a thrilling adventure to restore the course of history.

name: Space Chaos
summary: Team up and dive headfirst into the galaxy’s most glorious space mess. Scan, sort, and ship ridiculous cargo before your station blows sky-high.

name: Spooky Shooter 3D
summary: Spooky Shooter 3D - is a hardcore 3D shooter where you will survive in an old castle full of monsters.

name: Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening - Gold Edition
Spook Game
summary: Spook Game is a 2D action endless game where the challenge is to survive increasing waves of enemies while advancing as far as possible. With pixel art visuals and a dark atmosphere, players face creatures like ghosts and zombies in an environment inspired by classic horror.

name: Spider Dynasty
summary: This is a completely innovative Metroidvania-like game. There are two ancient trees host two royal families who have maintained an aerial dynasty woven from spider silk for generations. However, unknown evil forces are corrupting the entire silk world…

name: Spyro: A Hero's Tail
summary:
Spyro: A Hero's Tail is the fifth console game in the original Spyro series and the ninth game in the series in all. Developed by Eurocom, it was the first game in the series for the Xbox, as well as the second game in the series for the PlayStation 2 and GameCube (with the former console release being the only one of the three to support widescreen). It is also the final installment in the original Spyro continuity for home consoles. This is also the first and only Spyro game to be completely produced in Europe.

The game introduces a new antagonist, Red, a former Dragon Elder banished years before the events of the game, and sees the protagonist, Spyro the Dragon, attempt to defeat him with the aid of his best friend Sparx, Hunter the Cheetah, flying penguin Sgt. Byrd, and mole Blink, who are all playable.

name: Sports Bar VR
summary:
Bringing the virtual pub experience to your living room. Sports Bar VR is the ultimate social experience available on PlayStationVR, featuring an awesome set of bar games, an incredible pool simulation and an amazingly detailed sports bar overflowing with fun and silly physics props. Join up with 6 of your friends to hangout and play some air hockey, throw a few rounds of darts or build an insane dominoes setup using books, chairs, bottles and whatever else you can find. Play with friends or offline against the AI, earn experience points and unlock a wide array of collectable hats and fun objects to add a bit of swagger to your VR style.

Whether you're a budding Skreeball champion, or its a serious game of pool your after or just want take part in the time-honoured pastime of throwing empty beer bottles against the wall there is no wrong way to hangout in Sports Bar VR.

name: Spark! Photon Blast
summary: "SPARK! -PHOTON BLAST-" is a sports action game where players face off in a futuristic stadium, rendered with stunningly beautiful photorealistic graphics. Your goal is to score by launching a sphere into your opponent's goal. Enjoy the heart-pounding, high-octane action where every second counts!

name: Spider-Man and Venom: Maximum Carnage
summary:
Spider-Man and Venom: Maximum Carnage is a side-scrolling beat 'em up game for the Super NES and Sega Genesis/Mega Drive, developed by Software Creations and published by Acclaim Entertainment and it's subsidiary LJN in 1994. The game, based on a sprawling comic book story arc of the same name, features numerous heroes, including Spider-Man, Venom, and their allies from the Marvel Comics fictional universe like Captain America, Black Cat, Iron Fist, Cloak and Dagger, Deathlok, Morbius and Firestar, all teaming up to battle an onslaught of villains led by Carnage, including Shriek, Doppelganger, Demogoblin and Carrion.

Both the Genesis/Mega Drive and Super NES versions come in a red cartridge. They were later released in the normal cartridge colors (black for Genesis, gray for Super NES).

The game was followed up by a sequel called Venom/Spider-Man: Separation Anxiety.

Universal Studios Orlando used Maximum Carnage as the theme for a haunted house at Halloween Horror Nights in 2002.

name: Spire Horizon Online
summary: Enter Aetheria in Spire Horizon Online, an MMORPG where players become resurrected skeleton warriors. Choose from various classes, battle numerous monsters, and explore diverse regions. Will you save Aetheria?

name: Spring Ninja
summary:
I am a Ninja. I'm handsome and... fat.
However, I cannot jump over 5 cm.
My creator wants me to fly high.
He bought me an amazing spring. Wow! Not bad!
I now can jump, like a cat!

name: Spooky Monster
summary: The story is about a young woman who has been forcibly taken by a demon to another world, crawling with various monsters: zombies, ghosts, vampires, fairies. Now she must coexist with them until she can return home.

name: Spacecom
summary: A strategic-to-the-bone, star fleet command game in which deception, smart movement, and choices to battle decide victory or defeat.

name: Space Farmer
summary:
Become the ultimate planet manager in Space Farm Tycoon!

Build a space farm, manage an alien restaurant, and make a fortune in this addictive idle tycoon game.

name: Space Mantlet
summary: Bite size colossal battle! Build an army in minutes as infantry upgrade with orbital drops into war machines! Then combine those machines to form the giant Mantlet mech! All while bullet hell rages! In a transhuman future, command Mantlet One to secure New Terra!

name: Space Bross
summary: Your chicken has been kidnapped, and that's all it takes to send a retired astronaut into full galactic mayhem. Space Bross is a hand-drawn 2.5D tower defense & action roguelite where you'll build bases, fend off alien hordes, and blast your way across planets to bring your feathery friend back.

name: SparkLine
summary: Tap the circles to the rhythm of a vibrant lineup of songs spanning many genres and make your journey alongside the netizens of the World of Spark!

name: Sparc
summary:
Sparc is a competitive vSport - a unique physical sport only possible in virtual reality, where players challenge each other in fast-paced, full-body VR gameplay.

• Challenge contenders online via quick one-on-one matches or compete with your friends through custom games.
• Rise up the ranks through cross-platform competitive modes
• Customize your avatar with a wide variety of visually striking and attention-grabbing options
• Watch matches in-person or while you queue for the next match through Courtside, a freeform social area for spectating in VR
• Track your performance through stats on wins, accuracy and more

name: Space Chef
summary: Hunt down strange alien creatures and plants, then cook 'em! Deliver your tasty creations to the galaxy's most unsafe places on your homemade star scooter. In a quirky mix of exploration, cooking and action, you’ll rebuild your mysteriously destroyed kitchen using nothing but junk and scrap parts.

name: Space Way: Echo of the Galaxy
summary: In this retro space shooter you will have the opportunity to take control of a space fighter and crush waves of enemies. Show all your agility and reaction!

name: Sprite Sequence: Chapter 2
summary: A short wacky adventure about the discovery of one's self. In this second chapter, our nameless hero learns to fight and survive alone in the wild before discovering the reasons of his ordeal.

name: Space Ace
summary:
Space Ace, the follow up to Don Bluth's legendary Dragon's Lair, can now be enjoyed from the comfort of your home. This fully arcade authentic version includes all of the original scenes you've come to enjoy, and even an all-new global high scores list so you can show how well you handle Ace's laser gun. Other bonuses include a full watch feature to sit back and enjoy Don Bluth's stunning animation.

In Space Ace you play the heroic Ace who must stop the evil Commander Borf from taking over the Earth! Borf plans to reduce all of humankind to infants and take over the planet. Only two people have the courage and strength to stop Borf and save Earth: the beautiful Kimberly and the heroic Ace. But as they approach Borf's stronghold, Ace is hit by the Infanto Ray, changing him into a child, and Kimberly is kidnapped by the evil madman!

The Fate Of Earth Is In Your hands!

name: Spectral vs. Generation
summary:
The fate of a land rests in the hands of fearless fighters, united in their quest to control the power of the Earth temple. Master devastating attacks and vanquish your enemies in this epic struggle between good and evil!

Spectral VS Generation is a 2D versus fighting game in which you take control of one of ten fighters from the Spectral Force series and Generation of Chaos series. The cause for all the fighting is apparently to decide who will claim the powers of the of the fabled Earth temple.

The fighters to choose from are Ice witch Mayura, War gale Weles, Empress of darkness Roze, Northern knight Eril, Sword master Kryce, Aristocrat of Darkness Jado, Holy fist Ryuken, Explosion child Hiro, Wyvern of the East Drochimaru and Holy god earth. Each fighter has their own weapon and fighting techniques which include special attacks and fights are best of three. The game offers an Arcade mode, Training mode and Survival mode for single player as well as an VS mode for multiplayer.

name: Space Wombat
summary:
Space Wombat is a 3D platformer that follows the adventures of the eponymous spacesuit-wearing bipedal wombat. Space Wombat is heading home to Planet Ucliptus when his spaceship receives a distress call from a nearby planet. While landing to investigate, Space Wombat damages his ship; to make matters worse, his cargo—a shipment of the valuable Power Gumnuts—is seized by the evil WomBots, whose ploy it was to lure him to their base. Now, Space Wombat must recover his stolen cargo, repair his ship, and escape.

Gameplay mostly consists of collecting Power Gumnuts while jumping on crates, avoiding obstacles, and dealing with WomBots, some of which can be destroyed while others can only be temporarily disabled. There is a boss fight after every five levels, as well as a bonus level that can be unlocked by collecting the letters "W," "O," "M," "B," "A," and "T," which are strewn around the levels.

Running on Macromedia Shockwave, Space Wombat was originally released as an ad-supported browser-playable game, but was later made available as a paid downloadable version.

name: Space Command Battleship
summary:
The universe is unfair. First Earth and now exoplanet Earth 2 is facing the same cosmic injustice...but You can stop this! Your SpaceCom battleship is in position, the weapons are ready to fire and the asteroids are incoming - Failure is not an option!

The derelict sound of space couldn’t hide the destruction of Earth. A war of rock that spelled the end of humanity as we knew it - everybody was dead and the few survivors waited to be rescued... rescue never came. That was 900 years ago now, the survivors that were left took refuge aboard the mighty SpaceCom One battleship - and over many generations they learn to control the spaceship and left the broken galaxy that we once called home...
After 100 years of travelling through the vast and dark wilderness of the Universe: they came across Porous-Rift, a galaxy populated by exoplanets they may one day call home again. However, history came back to haunt the crew of SpaceCom One... the Asteroid Belt of Porous-Rift had ruptured, causing thousands of mighty asteroids to rip the only chance that humanity would have of repopulating. Humanity wasn’t ready then... so they must be ready now.

name: Spider Canyon
summary: Set in an unforgiving desert world, SPIDER CANYON is a first person physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a spider. Use your trusty spiderweb to scale the dangerous desert terrain and reach the finish line. Good luck!

name: Sphizofrenia: Concept of Horror
summary: Sphizofrenia is a concept of horror.

name: Spring Falls
summary:
A puzzle game about water, erosion, and watching things grow.

Manipulate the landscape and bring wildflowers to life as you make your way down a peaceful mountainside.

name: Spirit & Steel
summary:
The spirits of a remote volcanic island have lived in balance for generations, until William Von Pingleton III arrives with a mining army and a plan to turn them into fuel for his machines. When his first attack knocks the island’s shaman, Ila, off her feet, the spirits answer with a gift: the power to command the elements themselves.

In Spirit & Steel, you play as Ila, a short but stubborn 70-year-old shaman who hits harder than she looks. Swap between elemental fists, chain melee combos, and weave in dashes and air movement to outplay swarms of mechanical enemies in tight, focused combat encounters. Every arena asks you to use your full toolkit; knock foes back with wind, pull them in with crashing waves, and burn through armored threats with searing fire.

As you fight deeper into the island, lush beaches and sacred temples slowly clash with scaffolding, smokestacks, and churning machinery.

Your journey builds toward a final showdown with Pingleton in his volcanic stronghold, where you’ll put all of your unlocked elements to the test. Defeat him, free the captured spirits, and restore the island’s balance, or watch it disappear under steel.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Yellow Avenger
summary:
Absorbing evil one drop at a time!

When the Dirty Bubble captures Mermaidman and Barnacleboy, only one sponge can save the day! Help Spongebob use his new powers to fight the Dirty Bubble and his legions of evildoers.

name: Spooky Castle: The Adventures Of Kid Mystic
summary: When the evil Bobby Khan descended on the peaceful kingdom of Tulipton and stole all the Mystical Orbs, the king was overwhelmed. The orbs were needed to protect the kingdom from the marauding monsters (an unfortunate side effect of building your kingdom in the Monster Wilderness). So with every last knight battling the rampaging hordes, the king could spare only one wizard for a reckless mission to reclaim the lost orbs: Kid Mystic

name: Spirit Knight
summary: Spirit Knight is a challenging 2D action game where players face three powerful bosses, using precise controls and strategy to defeat them.

name: Special Strike
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! Survive on photorealistic grey sand dunes in your tanks. Join forces with allies to dominate epic battles and claim victory.

name: Speed Race DX
summary:
The original Speed Race and Wheels had an upright arcade cabinet, while Midway's Racer introduced a sit-down cabinet. Taito released an updated version of Speed Race called Speed Race DX in 1975.

Speed Race DX is an updated version of Speed Race. The game plays mostly identical, with the player racing in a top-down view and gaining points for overtaking other cars. The cabinet is bigger and two new features have been added to the game with a gear shift lever and an in-game timer.

name: Space Cruise
summary: Space Cruise is a hybrid of both metroidvania style platforming and traditional bullet-hell gameplay, allowing the player to choose which play style resonates with them most for each run. With power-ups for both methods of gameplay, randomised levels on the branching paths, and leaving the final decision to the player, each run should...

name: Splatter Blocks
summary: Aim, splash, and paint the board with colourful cubes for fun and accuracy!

name: Spend It Like You Hate It
summary: A game where you blow through your boss’s money.

name: Spell Weaver
summary: Put on the power of giant fighting machines and engage in an epic battle for battlefield supremacy in this thrilling mech game. Choose your perfect mech, equip it with devastating weaponry, and set out to destroy the enemy base and take down opponents controlling their own mechanical monsters.

name: Space Depot
summary: Unemployed in a utopian future you've just received a job offer for Depot Manager with ZENCORP Logistics and Distribution. No need for pants. This is a work-from-home position. Telecommute 23 billion miles to manage the logistics needs of a small sector of outposts with your trusty drone.

name: Spy Games: Elevator Mission
summary:
Enhanced 3D graphics – From sprites to polygons, this title has been faithfully recreated for the next-gen systems. Environments, levels, weapons and enemies will be familiar to fans of the series, while creating a new experience for those unfamiliar with the series.
Level Design – Play through one enormous level, spread out through 40+ sections, minimizing load times and keeping the action continuous.
Replay Value – Missions will never get stale as the key figures holding important documents, etc. are randomly assigned, giving the game almost infinite replay value.

YOU’RE A SECRET AGENT TASKED WITH RECOVERING VITAL DOCUMENTS FROM THE ENEMY SYNDICATE. USE STRATEGY, STEALTH AND CUNNING TO ACCOMPLISH YOUR MISSION! GET IN! GET OUT!

The classic gameplay of Elevator Mission is back with a new twist! Utilizing the unique control functions of the Nintendo Wii™, along with 3D graphics, this beloved title has been reborn for the next-generation consoles!

name: Spirit Catcher 93'
summary: Spirit Catcher 93', a first-person descent into psychological horror. A journey of evasion, discovery, and surviving the relentless Shepherd. A chilling return to the roots of classic horror that will leave you breathless.

name: Spolous Ex
summary: Save the galaxy Danioy from invasion of army corps Doscoponian.

name: Split Polarity: The Science Puzzle Arcade Game!
summary: Get ready Scientists, things are about to get crazy! The atoms have become unstable, so it's your job to guide the highly volatile particles into the black holes. Play against friends in local multiplayer in Versus Mode, or attempt a high score in the Labyrinth.

name: Spiteful Lovers in a Perfect World
summary: How would you live in a world without suffering?

name: Spectral Force
summary: Spectral Force is the first in a long series of tactical role-playing games. This is a war simulation game set in "Neverland", where humans, gods, and the demon clans each wage war over the continents for their own visions of unity.

name: Spider Solitaire
summary: Spider Solitaire is one of the most popular solitaire games in the world! If you are a big fan of Spider Solitaire, Klondike solitaire, FreeCell Solitaire or other card games, you will love this spectacular and highly polished game! Change the game's appearance to suit your own taste. Progress through the game to unlock unique card sets and backgrounds. Customize your Solitare to make it unique and exclusive. Stunning animations and gameplay designed for endless entertainment in the palm of your hand.

name: SpaceKraft!
summary: Explore the space and go for new adventures with this physics based space game! Discover steampunk themed planets, solve puzzles, gather resources, craft machines & systems and have fun with gravity in an open-world galaxy. Refuel, repair and upgrade your ship to find your way back to mother earth.

name: Spirit Valley
summary: Spirit Valley is an erotic creature collecting game. Build your dream team and solve the mystery of Spirit Valley!

name: SpongeBob Adventures: In A Jam
summary: Get Ready to go on an Amazing Adventure with SpongeBob and his Friends! Plankton’s latest scheme to steal the secret Krabby Patty Formula has backfired in a big way, leaving the world covered in JellyFish Jam! Now it’s up to you and SpongeBob, along with friends new and old to rebuild and restore order to Bikini Bottom and Beyond!

name: Spectre Report
summary: Play solo or with friends in online multiplayer. Use authentic ghost-hunting tools such as the EMF reader, Spirit Box, and REM Pod to detect supernatural activity and identify what kind of spirit you’re facing.

name: Spaceship Battler Unlimited
summary: Pulse laser battles between you and enemies.

name: Spire of Glory
summary: Indie Roguelike Autobattler Poolbuilder

name: Space Alien Hangar
summary: Play as a space alien in a light-hearted third-person 3D sci-fi adventure. Explore a space station hangar, power up the hover jack, transport an aggressive alien pet onto the shuttle, fix the broken shuttle engine, etc. All with the help from your floating AI companion. Gamepad suggested.

name: Spellrain
summary: Survive the spellrain disaster that has turned the world into a magical land filled with cute monsters. Buy spells, craft armor and upgrade your base to restore peace in Spellrain.

name: Speedboat League
summary: Race fast and shoot 'em all up with powerful speedboats. Intense, action-packed boat racer with lots of weapons, tons of unlockables, crazy stages, game modes, local and online multiplayer. Speedboat League has it all.

name: Space Fuel
summary: Bite-sized arcade shmup. Slam enemies, beat Bosses, get power-ups and repeat! Pilot your ship through deep space.

name: Space Planet Invader: Cosmic Power
summary: Defend, Build, Conquer Unleash Your Cosmic Power

name: Spark in the Dark
summary: The hardcore dungeon crawler where you will go to the endless depths of the mysterious grim dungeon.

name: Space Travel: Chronicles
summary: This is an RPG-style role-playing story game. The protagonist moves to a new town and starts high school, but during their time there, they encounter their sister from a parallel world. The protagonist then begins to investigate this mysterious situation.

name: Spellbound Shuffle
summary: Tactical roguelike deckbuilding game in a funky post apocalyptic far west. Pick a hero, build your own deck and cleanse the world from the evil. On top of regular attacks and defenses, make good use of movement and positioning on the grid to stay alive !

name: SpikerMan Game
summary:
SpikerMan is an RPG with a large explorable world, colorful characters, and uses the LMBS (Linear Motion Battle System), a battle system that takes place in real time.

SpikerMan is an eager teenager who wants to become a great and unstoppable warrior. Along his journey he will fight against a great number of foes, evil space emperors, crime lords, pirates, overlords, and even space gods.
Gather your teammates, journey to other planets, complete side quests, gain power, and bring down everyone in your way to become the Great and Powerful SpikerMan!

name: Spandex Force: Champion Rising
summary: Create your own hero, train your superpowers and battle crooks and villains in this tongue-in-cheek hex based match-3 RPG. There's never a dull moment in Vigilance Valley!

name: Speed Legacy: Ultimate Drive
summary: In Speed Legacy, players find themselves in a futuristic metropolis fueled by speed and adrenaline. As a former professional racer stripped of your license, your mission is to reclaim your reputation and expose the corrupt automotive giant Phoenix Motors. Participate in intense drag races, drift challenges, police chases, and high-risk deliveries. With a mix of dynamic storytelling and thrilling gameplay, every mission brings you closer to becoming a racing legend.

name: Space Treasure Hunters
summary:
After the Third Galactic war, many worlds were left in ruins. In these ruins remained treasures of inestimable value. Hundreds of treasure hunters are crisscrossing the Galaxy. One of them is David Fox - and it seems that he finally got lucky...

Discover clues that the famous treasure hunter left in the Space restaurant. Go to the place where the greatest treasure of all time is hidden and get it for yourself!

name: Space Traveler's Brain Creator
summary: Save your cognitive brain here! Spatial navigation and working memory boost plan. Kill dementia today and everyday.

name: SpyLens: Sex in focus
summary: You never thought that in your hands you would end up with the camera that creates the desire and the need to want to sleep with you; just by taking a picture of her or them. How far do you want to go with your new toy?

name: Sponchies
summary: Welcome to the Sponchies tryouts, The Sponchies are an ELITE TEAM created by the government to do special, secret, impossible missions; Only the best are able to get into the program. In order to become a Sponchie you have to complete a set of 50 incredibly difficult hand crafted levels.

name: SpongeBob SquigglePants
summary: In SpongeBob’s most crazy, creative adventure yet, be prepared to laugh your SquigglePants off as you tilt, flick, tap and draw through more than 100 Nanogames set in six zany worlds. SpongeBob SquigglePants puts you in the driver’s seat for a dizzying series of lightening-speed Nanogames, giving you mere seconds to finish one before moving right on to the next. Within this rapid-fire succession of challenges, SpongeBob SquigglePants exposes players to never-before-seen SpongeBob art styles from the Nickelodeon vault. SpongeBob SquigglePants also lets players digitally draw, paint, color and choose from dozens of SpongeBob-themed stamps, using the uDraw to create a masterpiece worthy of a place in Patchy’s own collection of SpongeBob art, or their own refrigerator, thanks to the uDraw’s exclusive ability to export art to the Wii’s SD card slot. The entire game is hosted by SpongeBob’s biggest fan, Patchy the Pirate, in a never-before-seen live action experience for an added level of under-the-sea silliness.

name: SpiritSweeper
summary:
Join teenager Reenie and their spirit companion Oose as you start your (soon to be) successful spiritsweeping business. Explore houses, clear away spirit mess and deck out your treehouse!

Explore houses and uncover the secrets of the people who live there! What will you discover?

Use your trusty spirit brushes to clean away spirit imprints and capture adorable spirits to fill out your bestiary! Clean a lot, or a little - it's up to you!

Customise your treehouse by buying items with your hard earned pocket money! Discover more items while cleaning to unlock them in the shop!

name: Spaceman Sparkles 2
summary: Spaceman Sparkles 2 is a frantic bullet-hell that takes place in a thumpin' disco universe, you'll be begging for mercy while bobbing your head to the beat.

name: Space Tow Truck
summary: Space Tow Truck is a 100% pure physics puzzle game with a beautiful scifi narrative full of humor. You play as an astronaut that has to, after a painful car crash landing on the Moon, use the laws of mechanics to get out of trouble. Come and discover the Moon!

name: Space Scum
summary: Lead a band of mercenaries through battle after battle in this Sci-Fi, turn-based RPG. Fight your way across different planets, earning loot and equipment to outfit your team – and remember, no option is off the table when survival is on the line.

name: Spot Challenge Vol. 2
summary: Spot Challenge is a game series inspired by 'Find the Differences,' where you compare two images and spot over 330 differences across 35 levels. Play solo or with friends and family—test your attention to detail in this fun challenge!

name: Spintires: MudRunner - American Wilds
summary: This content requires the base game MudRunner on Steam in order to play.Upgrade your MudRunner with the American Wilds Expansion and enjoy a slew of new additions, including 9 iconic US trucks from household brands like Ford, Hummer and Chevrolet, dozens of new vehicles add-ons, 2 new sandbox maps inspired by the rough lands of Montana and North Dakota, and 2 new challenge maps!

name: Spirit of the North
summary: "Spirit of the North is a single player, 3rd-person adventure game inspired by the breathtaking and mysterious landscapes of Iceland. The story takes root from various pieces of Nordic folklore. The game is unique in that it purposefully has no dialog or narrative. Players must breathe in their surroundings to solve various puzzles and speculate the meaning of a lost ancient civilization. Play as an ordinary red fox who’s story becomes entwined with the guardian of the Northern Lights, a female spirit fox. As you journey over the mountains and under red stained skies you’ll discover more about your companion and a land left in ruin."

name: SpinCross
summary: spin it!

name: Split Second
summary: A recreation of an LED game, with no LEDs

name: Spider-Man: Mysterio's Menace
summary: Set in New York, Spider-Man: Mysterio's Menace enables players to assume the role of Spider-Man as they take on super-villain Mysterio and his illusory tricks for control of Manhattan. Spider-Man must fight a slew of Mysterio's sinister conspirators and gadgetry to get to the bottom of their plot and free New York from Mysterio's mind-warping grip.

name: Sperma
summary: Experience a roguelite in a fashion you never asked for. Command a fleet of brave spermoids, upgrade your load, and save the world by getting fertilized!

name: Spirit Slider
summary:
Spirit Slider features five sliding puzzle games.
Each puzzle game consist of 27 game pieces that have the ability to slide anywhere within a 3 x 3 x 3 grid.

name: Space Memory: Cats
summary: Cute, relaxing memory game where you match pairs of adorable cats in space

name: Spot It Fast! Kids' Difference Hunt
summary:
Easy & Fun Spot the Difference!
A Cute Brain-Training Game to Boost Your Mind

name: Space Cake
summary: Space Cake is a sci-fi shoot 'em up game from Motion Blur Game Studio.

name: Spyro: Year of the Dragon - Collector's Edition
summary: The Collectors' Edition version of Spyro: Year of the Dragon. This game is part of a trilogy released in the Spyro Collectors' Edition boxset. This version is mostly the same as the original. The only key difference is the words "Collectors' Edition" on both the disc and manual. The manual also has a white Playstation banner instead of the typical black banner.

name: Spot Challenge Vol. 1
summary: Spot Challenge is a game series inspired by 'Find the Differences,' where you compare two images and spot over 360 differences across 35 levels. Play solo or with friends and family—test your attention to detail in this fun challenge!

name: Spikair Volleyball
summary: Control the 4 players of your volleyball team. Recruit players, train them and win tournament to become the best volleyball club.

name: Space Blast
summary: You are Zam, the king of Mars. One day, riots take place on the planet and it's up to you to travel the solar system and uncover a massive conspiracy perpetrated by a supernatural being named Fat Cat.

name: Sprout Valley
summary: Sprout Valley is an upcoming farming simulator game where you can step back from the busy life and grow the garden of your dreams. Captivating story, hand-crafted experience, cute graphics and many more!

name: SpiritScape
summary: Team up, explore haunted realms, and banish spirits in this cooperative ghost-hunting experience. Uncover supernatural mysteries with friends in this strategic multiplayer game.

name: Spooky Express
summary: Plan the train route for the world’s spookiest theme park! Transport monsters to their destinations — but don’t let them bite the passengers or you’ll have a grave problem.

name: Spank The Idle Monkey
summary: This is a classic spin on Idle Clicker games, inspired by a classic Flash game with a twist on it, hidden horror story built into a simple game will take your clicking excitment and make you question all that hard work. Was it worth it? how many did you hurt? Will you stop?

name: Space Grunts: Chrono Shard
summary: You have an X amount of turns before all hell breaks loose. Gain experience and new items to find ways to prolong the inevitable while you complete missions on board of space ships, moon bases and other mysterious areas in space. One step at a time in this fast paced but turn based roguelike.

name: Sprunki Horror From the Loop
summary: Will you break the circle of madness, even if you have to lose everything? Discover the dark secrets that the world of Sprunki hides. Be careful, because an ancient evil is waiting for you there.

name: Spiritless Ltd.
summary: Do you sometimes hear scratching, scraping or rumbling noises? Then you might have a poltergeist in your home. But don’t panic. Spiritless Ltd. is here to help you and expel the ghost from your home.

name: Space Empires III
summary: The third game within the Space Empires series brings the dawn of a new age of exploration. Your race keeps running through the fabric of space and moves to other solar systems beyond your own.

name: Splatoon.io
summary: A fast-paced paint war game where players compete to cover the map in their team’s color. Battle in turf wars, balloon fights, and daily events against real players or bots. Play solo or with friends in vibrant, strategic matches full of chaos and intense action.

name: Speed Surge
summary: Strap in and ignite your engines in Speed Surge, the adrenaline-pumping arcade racing game where every second counts! Dash through thrilling tracks as you race against time. Are you ready to become the ultimate speedster?

name: Spellloom
summary: spellloom is a roguelike bullet-hell dungeon crawler with deep spell-building. Play as a Spellweaver—an intrepid QA tester employed by a cynical Dungeon Architect—and brave his chaotic creation. Prepare for fierce Combat, creative Spell Crafting, and perilous Exploration in the ever-shifting Void.

name: Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years From Earth
summary: In this sci-fi RPG you are sent to a fleet of spaceships which have been invaded by aliens who escaped during a routine mission. This involves walking around and fighting off any aliens you encounter, while collecting keys for the doors. A toxic coolant must be handled carefully if this is to be achieved. 6 programmable robots can help with repair chores The game's control system has a direction pad for moving and inventory mapping.

name: Space Marauder
summary: When humankind discovers an alien race on a distant planet, it becomes clear that the extra-terrestrial way of life threatens survival on Earth. Rather than sending out a fleet of space destroyers or loads of nuclear warheads, it is determined that Earth's best chance of wiping out these creatures is (drum roll, please) you! As Space Marauder, it is your job to avoid waves of space beings careening through the outer reaches of the galaxy. You are aiding only by a jet pack and a laser gun. Sound tough? It is. Assorted power-ups are strewn about to help you in your plight, but the best asset you'll have is your itchy trigger finger and taste for alien blood. Lots of powerful bosses wait at the end of each of the game's levels, and every stage presents new and increasingly difficult challenges for our hero. Boasting a cool soundtrack and smooth controls, there's plenty of gameplay to keep your fingers moving for hours on end.

name: Sport Shooter: The Eight Galleries
summary: Take part in the Sport Shooting Rifle event. Navigate a sprawling complex while testing your nerves and your aim. Hit targets under pressure and race against time as you are pursued by a ghostly presence. Try to make it out alive.

name: Space Hulk
summary:
"WE ARE THE VANGUARD OF HONOUR. THE CUTTING EDGE OF THE BLOOD ANGELS. WE BRING DEATH."

The legendary Space Hulk returns to Windows PC, Mac and Linux in this epic turn based strategy game. Set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, an intriguing story of legendary battles and heroic actions unfolds. Play as a small squad of fearless Space Marine Terminators who attempt to reclaim their honor by mounting an assault on a derelict space hulk infested by hordes of vicious tyranid Genestealers.

Take control of the Adeptus Astartes of the Blood Angel chapter and guide them towards glory, while battling fierce Xenos and uncovering ancient relics in the infested confines of the massive Space Hulk named “Sin of Damnation”.

The game is a 3D digital turn based strategy game that recreates the classic claustrophobic board game experience in both singleplayer and multiplayer.

Customers purchasing Space Hulk will receive a free copy of the Deathwing Terminator DLC for Warhammer 40,000: Storm of Vengeance by EutechnyxKey Features:The first Space Hulk computer game in 17 years! Available on multiple platforms.
Set in the hugely popular Warhammer 40,000 universe! Official license of the legendary boardgame from Games Workshop.
Turn-based tactical strategy game! Based on the popular and iconic board game mechanics.
Blood Angel Terminators! Fight the ferocious Genestealers with heroes of the mighty Blood Angels.
Fearsome Genestealers with challenging AI! Meet unforgiving hordes of Genestealers!
Thematic 3D environment! Experience the dark labyrinth of a Space Hulk as never before..
Single player campaign based on the "Sin of Damnation" space hulk! Take on the Sin of Damnation campaign, which includes 3 brand new prequel missions and the 12 missions from the classic board game.
Multiplayer head-to-head recreating the board game experience against a friend! Get in the hot seat and battle it out with a friend.
Cross platform multiplayer between Windows PC, Mac, Linux and iOS! Play asynchronous against friends and foes on multiple platforms.
Now with online Co-op mode!

name: Splitgate 2: Sabrask Founder's Pack
summary:
Sabrask Founder's Pack includes:

- 2 Sabrask character skins
- 3 Sabrask weapon skins
- 1 emote
- 1 banner
- 1 charm
- 1000 Splitcoin

name: Splitgate 2: Aeros Founder's Pack
summary:
Want to become a Splitgate 2 founder? Each faction Founder's Pack comes with two character skins and three weapon skins, plus an emote, banner, charm, and 1000 Splitcoin.

Aeros Founder's Pack includes:

2 Aeros character skins
3 Aeros weapon skins
1 emote
1 banner
1 charm
1000 Splitcoin

name: Splitgate 2: Starter Pack
summary:
Ready to get your Splitgate journey started? This Starter Pack comes with three assault rifle weapon skins, a special portal skin, and 500 bonus Splitcoin.

Pack includes:

500 Splitcoin
Starting Lineup Tempo
Starting Lineup Synapse
Starting Lineup Trailblazer
Realm Warp Portal

name: Splitgate 2: Meridian Founders Pack
summary:
Want to become a Splitgate 2 founder? Each faction Founder's Pack comes with two character skins and three weapon skins, plus an emote, banner, charm, and 1000 Splitcoin.

Meridian Founder's Pack includes:

2 Meridian character skins
3 Meridian weapon skins
1 emote

1 charm
1000 Splitcoin

name: Spot Zero
summary: Gacha ARPG developed by Tarta Games.

name: Splitgate 2: Ultimate Founder's Pack
summary:
Become the Ultimate Splitgate 2 Founder

The Ultimate Founder's Pack includes:

6 character skins
24 weapon skins
2 emotes
3 banners
3 charms
3000 Splitcoin

name: Space Monkeys
summary: Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game where you must unleash your inner ape to face 12 unique levels in space. Use skill and strategy to dodge lasers, evade enemies, and collect bananas in zero-gravity on your journey to escape a retro-styled evil space station.

name: Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3
summary: Space Engineers Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3 includes Warworn Armor Skin, Cab Cockpit, Twin-blade Wind Turbine, Colorable Solar Panels, Holo LCD, Inset LCD panel, Sloped LCD panel, Curved LCD panel, Round Beacon, Inset Couch, Inset Bed, Inset Button Panel, Entertainment Corner and many more.

name: Spring Breeze
summary: Spring Breeze is the first main game in Kirby Super Star and Kirby Super Star Ultra. It is essentially a simplified remake of Kirby's Dream Land, with some differences to compensate for this. It is the first main game to be playable, and is designed to introduce new players to the game.

name: Splice
summary: A security job gone wrong. Now you are trapped with something deep inside an underground research bunker, and you are all that is left. Can you overcome your fear in this escape room horror?

name: Splinter Cell: Blacklist Spider-Bot
summary: Official companion for Ubisoft's upcoming title : Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Blacklist. Control Spider-Bot, Sam Fisher's most advanced infiltration gadget ever engineered.

name: Space Wreck
summary: A Fallout-inspired post-apocalyptic RPG in space with an extreme focus on role-playing. Inch wide, miles deep - intentionally short yet surprisingly deep and branching adventure with multiple gameplay styles. Combat 100% optional.

name: SpinShot
summary: Break stuff, collect COINs, upgrade your ARC, score points, and chase high scores through precision and maintaining your multipliers.

name: Space Ace
summary: Space Ace is a 2D top-down shooter that focuses on upgrading your ship to fight through levels of Bosses and smaller enemies. Play with keyboard + mouse or Xbox controller.

name: Spiritstead
summary: Spiritstead is a cozy life sim town building game where you care for a growing village full of cute little villagers.

name: Spiritus 2
summary: The survival horror concludes in part two of SPIRITUS, set in a post-apocalyptic city and the depths of pure evil. Survive in classic 90's gaming tropes augmented with modern HD graphics.

name: Space Gears
summary: Space Gears is a next-generation Strategy set on Mars. Don't fret about micromanaging build orders, or your resources. Set your sights on victory by raising an army of mechs and build up your base in this fluid and fast-paced PvE and PvP strategy game.

name: Sphere: Flying Cities
summary: Sphere – Flying Cities is a sci-fi citybuilding game which combines strategy, simulation and survival elements in an extraordinary and immersive scenario. In the aftermath of the moon‘s explosion you need to rise to the challenge! Take over control of the very first flying city ascending from Earth!

name: Space Road: Elite
summary: Trade between star systems. Fight against pirates and alien invaders. Modification of the ship.

name: Spooky Story
summary: Spooky story - In this creepy platformer, you will get the role of a magic mushroom that went hunting for the treasures of elves. Carefully jump across the platforms to reach the goal

name: Space Scavenger
summary: Action roguelike where you build and command your own spaceships. Battle enemies, explore planets and customize your ship on the fly. Make the best use of the quirky ship modules you find, ranging from slingshots to ion cannons, to try and avoid certain death.

name: Speedrun Maker
summary: its like trackmania without cars

name: Spatial
summary:
Spatial is a 3D gaming hub where creators craft and share immersive social experiences for web, mobile, and VR. We're transforming online interaction from passive watching to active play. Think YouTube, but for games.

From Racing Empire to Merge Survivor Zombie, there are thousands of games that can be discovered on Spatial. And with the Spatial Creator Toolkit, developers can build and publish their own games to a community of millions of players, to the library of games is growing every day.

name: SpaceExile
summary:
This is a Twin Stick Shooter style game that requires the utmost survival against the relentless enemy.

You can earn points by playing the game and use the points you earn to purchase five main tasks, four special weapons, and six types of upgrades.

Leverage a wide range of unique weapons and upgrades to score even higher!

protect the space station from oncoming enemies!

Continuous updates will add more attacks and more enemies.

name: Space Miner
summary: Space Miner is a shmup with roguelike elements and weapon customization. Destroy asteroids, collect different minerals to improve your ship, and discover new places on the galaxy!

name: SpiceX
summary: SpiceX is a fast-paced sci-fi arcade adventure where you play as a new employee testing the Inferno 1. Navigate zero-gravity and blast through obstacles on your way to Outer Spice. With precise controls and a neon cyberpunk vibe, action and finesse are key to survival.

name: SpongeGlock SquarePants
summary: SpongeGlock SquarePants is an FPS game developed by indie game developer Mix Morris, inspired by Nickelodeon’s favorite cartoon series SpongeBob SquarePants in the late 90s. For those who want to download this unique game in Bikini Bottom, you can find the download links of the game in this article

name: Spell Cast
summary: Co-op time survival game with roguelite elements, up to 10 players online

name: Space Hack
summary: The colony ship, Maximus XV was on course. This was supposed to be an uneventful trip. No one on board expected the gravitational entity. It quickly swallowed Maximus XV.

name: Space Explore
summary: Space Explore gives you a first hand experience of the journey that astronauts take while embarking on space missions. The space station circles the earth, 400 kilometers above us. It serves as a research laboratory and is also suited for testing spacecraft systems and equipment.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Spirit Horse Simulator
summary: You are Spirit, son of the legendary Amadeus. Humans shattered your herd. Now, grown and fierce, you must rescue your siblings across deserts, forests, and farms. Reunite the lost. Run free. Not all humans are enemies. Your journey begins now.

name: Space Speedjam 1
summary: Space Speedjam 1 features 5 new maps, a hub level and a intro made in just two days (Apr 4th-Apr 6th 2025), themed after the space maps of Quake 2 and other games.

name: Spellcaster University: Gears and Gobelins
