summary: Go on an adventure in the footsteps of an ancient civilisation. Explore hostile planets, build your base and acquire the technologies of the past before they are turned to create chaos.

name: Spitfire Heroes: Tales of the Royal Air Force
summary: German forces occupy Europe and prepare to invade England. Britain's survival depends on the courage of a handful of men: the pilots of the Royal Air Force. Join the squadron and scramble your Spitfire on thrilling missions to shift the balance of power in World War II in Spitfire Heroes. This exciting air combat shooter brings the heroic actions of the RAF to the DS with intuitive flight mechanics, devious enemy pilots, and wireless support for up to four players. Players fly for the Royal Air Force through missions based on real events that shaped the outcome of the war. Fast-Paced Air Combat: Roll, shoot, bomb, and maneuver your way through some of the toughest opponents ever to take to the skies. Earn medals and ranks as you progress through the course of World War II – if you survive. Exciting Mission-Based Gameplay: Enter into frenzied dogfights with German fighters, strafe columns of enemy tanks, cover the evacuation of Allied troops, knock buzz bombs out of the sky with a tip of your wing and more in an expansive campaign that recreates some of the most famous battles of the war.

name: Spaceforce: Captains
summary: Control the fate of the galaxy in the turn-based strategy game Captains that invites you to explore and conquer space. Ultimately lead your fleets and captains to victory. The game features several distinct forms of game play, including gathering resources, role-playing, and strategy. The basic elements of the game involve developing a space station (space building structures that produce resources, captains or ships) and conquering the space with a captain leading a large fleet and using technology. You develop fleets composed of the squadron commander - Captain and space ship squadrons. When you take a space base, you can buy any of its buyable ships.

name: Spirit Bounce
summary: The world was corrupted after a spirit of darkness was born, now Aqua, Ignis and Spark must come together to save their friends and restore the world's balance. Relive the essence of classic brick-breaking arcades in a fun adventure with charismatic characters.

name: Spooky Lab - Creative halloween game for kids
SpaceRoads
summary: An HD remake of a classic. Hours of fun gameplay and more content to be added soon.

name: Spooky Speedrun
summary: Spooky Speedrun is a highly challenging 3D-Platformer, where the player has to perform one difficult jump after another in time-based levels, that require perfect timing and execution. The game has no easy-mode or upgrade abilities, you’ll have to rely on pure skill. Are you up for the challenge?

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake - BFF Edition
Space Depression
summary: You must do your best to protect the world! Destroy all enemies. Get the highest score.

name: Spooky Mall
summary: Pack your stores with the items ghouls crave in Spooky Mall, a colorful endeavor to serve the undead. The job market is tough and no one seems to be giving you a chance. An odd phone call one night changes all of that when a special night job is offered. Beggars can't be choosers you think, and soon you're off but when you get there, something about the customers just doesn't seem right.

name: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions
summary: Spider-Man: Shattered Dimensions is a thrilling action-packed adventure set in four dramatically different universes from legendary Spider-Man lore, each with a distinct Spider-Man armed with unique skills and strengths, in one original storyline. Players will be transported to new locations never before seen in a Spider-Man game, from lush jungles and dusty deserts to various urban terrains. Acclaimed comic book writer Dan Slott takes players on a mission to contain the magical energy of the Tablet of Order and Chaos, which has been shattered and sent hurtling across parallel universes, and battle fan-favorite villains in a quest to restore the fabric of reality.

name: Spellt
summary: SPELLT is a daily word game. Find as many words as possible from a set of letters. A new puzzle comes out every day!

name: Space Pilot II
summary: Kingsoft released this spacier sequel to Space Pilot in 1985.

name: Sphera: The Inner Journey
summary: Join Tess, a lonely young girl, on a perilous journey into a world born from her imagination in Sphera, a new hidden object adventure from Sandlot Games! Teased relentlessly by her older brother for her quirks and oversized glasses, Tess longs to escape her isolated life. Her chance arrives when she discovers a mysterious marble that transports her to a bizarre realm ruled by a kind walrus-like creature named Zuchary. However, when Zuchary's adopted son, Jacob, betrays him, he turns to Tess for help. In return, she will be given the chance to return home. Aid Tess in embracing her true destiny as a warrior princess in Sphera!

name: Sports Trivia: Championship Edition
summary: Sports Trivia is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Adrenalin Entertainment and published by Sega, which was released in 1995.

name: Space Hunk
summary: Space Hunk is a fighting game created during the Mojam 2 by Ludosity.

name: Specimen #08
summary: The untitled eighth game in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. takes place in an unknown, blood-soaked location. The only new detail given on the research log is an ultrasound image of an unknown figure.

name: Spacefarer Solitaire
summary: Spacefarer Solitaire is a beautifully designed and animated classic game for Nintendo Switch, with excellent replay value.

name: Spiders
summary: Move your missile base back and forth and shoot at a growing spider web and attacking spiders. Every few rounds a woman's face will appear and she will wink at you.

name: Space Struck Run
summary: Space Struck Run is a small game where you take control of Dectron The Cyborg, where you have to do your best to survive in outer space while the difficulty keeps rising.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Legendary Edition
summary: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Space Pinball
summary:
Space Pinball is the name given to the prototype that would eventually become Galactic Pinball. Space Pinball was near complete before it was scrapped. It features 5 tables, where Galactic Pinball only has 4. All 5 of the prototype pinball tables are different from those that were included in the retail game.

In the prototype, all tables are linked together. Beating a table just starts you off at the next table, and there is no ending of any kind. There is also no “puck” counter, the game simply returns to the stage select screen when you lose a “puck”.

name: Spy of Deimos
summary: Take control of Greg, an intergalactic spy who possesses the newest teleportation technology. Your mission is to espionage Sorova, an illegal company which has been trying to build a forbidden weapon to destroy the earth.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Revenge of the Flying Dutchman
summary: Jumping Jellyfish! It's SpongeBob vs. The Flying Dutchman. While cruising through Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob discovers a magic bottle and unleashes the Flying Dutchman. The Dutchman is furious that he was disturbed, and places a curse on SpongeBob. To lift the curse, SpongeBob must now seek out the 10 lost treasures that have been scattered throughout Bikini Bottom. Embark on a hilarious sea-slapping adventure featuring the hottest superstar to hit the high seas, SpongeBob SquarePants.

name: Spin & Match Puzzle Learn at Once 3 Languages
summary:
Learn German, French, and Italian simultaneously!
The ultimate time-efficient learning puzzle game

name: Space Demolisher
summary:
Space is waiting for you, destroy everything in your path! 

Number 1 Endless Space Game

Challenge yourself to become the world's best destroyer!

Each wave it will get harder to survive, you'll explore new things to destroy more and more!

A sense of real space

Don't worry you will become master how to control your ship in a dangerous space each time you play!

name: Speckle: Chill Puzzle Game
summary: Speckle is a simple puzzle game, that attempts to deliver a fun and relaxing experience. However, this is a puzzle game, so ‘rage quitting’ is a possible side effect!

name: Space Bound
summary: Retro Strategy Arcade Shooter

name: Spiders in the Bath
summary:
Spiders ruining your bath time? Webs clogging up your taps? Silk in your shampoo?
No need to panic - simply practice your spider spraying technique with Spiders in the Bath!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming: Definitive Edition
summary: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Spasms of Stupidity
summary: PC wargame-Roguelike, inspired from DragonForce(Saturn)

name: Space Takeover
summary: You have to withstand intense rivalry in space exploration. Choose one of the mighty powers and develop a space program. The future is yours.

name: Spirits of Mystery: The Silver Arrow - Collector's Edition
summary: The mystical Silver Arrow has been stolen from you on the eve of your wedding. Without it, you can’t marry your beloved Prince Philip! Can you track down the arrow in time?

name: Spellcaster's Assistant
summary: You are Emmy Epheremelda, a sorcerer in training/magical assistant. Your master is out on a mission and has left you in charge. All was fine and well till these annoying Tomeverme showed up and decided to wreck the magical library! It's up to Emmy to do away with these nuisances before Master shows up! And remember, it wasn't your fault! Use magical tomes to cast unique spells! Defeat enemies with the power of spellcasting! Explore over 30 levels of the magical library! Try to get the highest score possible!

name: Space Fortress
summary: Space Fortress lets you control a mid-screen base while defending it from enemies emerging from each of the four edges of the screen.

name: Space Ranger vs. Reptiloids
summary: Boundless expanses of the space hide in themselves many dangers. From the darkest corners of the universe came those who want to seize our land. And only you can protect it from extraterrestrial invaders.

name: Spinal Fantasy
summary: Spinal Fantasy is a 10 minutes parody game of Final Fantasy 7. It starts with Sephiroth stealing the spine of Cloud, who tries to retrieve it. On his way he meets Tifa, Aerith and Black Mage whom also have things stolen from them.

name: Sphinx Adventure
summary: Text adventure in which you gather treasure in order to bring it to the Sphinx.

name: Space Empires
summary: Space Empires I is the first chapter of the Space Empires series. A classic galactic conquest and turn-based strategy video game where you are the leader of a race of intelligent beings building large spaceships for interplanetary and interstellar travel through warp points between star systems.

name: Space Rift - Episode 1
summary:
Be part of the action! SPACE RIFT is the first part of a breathtaking action space adventure with a captivating story specifically designed for Virtual Reality!
Experience the excitement of flying through the expanses of our galaxy up close in your own cockpit and join the fight for the freedom of humanity on Mars!

name: Space Qube
summary:
The universe is infested with dangerous monsters threatening all life! Build your personal spaceship and join Space Jack’s quest in saving the universe. Blast your way through endless levels of Alien mayhem.
With Space Qube's in-game Voxel editor you can create anything and take it for a spin in the space! There are tons of models already created and more is coming in - fast. Take control of a space ship, a flying toilet, a flying cow or anything else, shoot as many aliens as you can and get the highest score to climb up the ranks. Some serious unique bosses are waiting for you on your quest! Space shooters will never be the same.

name: Specteared
summary: Survival Horror with innovative mechanics. Custom procedural algorithms providing unique experience for each playthrough. Lot's of organic, procedural animation. Simulation of sound waves bouncing in facilities to help identify danger in really immersive way.

name: Spinny Fan Zone
summary: Steal a briefcase!

name: Spirit Stone
summary: This is a casual adventure game, players can freely choose to go through the gate, hang up, automatic combat, etc., but continue to develop pets and upgrade equipment to make themselves more powerful.By matching pets with different attributes, activate different spirit stones!

name: Space Fighter 2
summary: "Space Fighter 2" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Speedmapping Pack 196: Quick Honey
summary: Weekend-long speedmapping session; eight Honey-themed singleplayer maps.

name: Space Hockey
summary: Space Hockey on Hoverbikes!

name: Spellbound
summary: Spellbound is a virtual reality game which lets you enter into storybooks and be one of the characters. Stop living a boring life, put on your robe and wizard hat, and become a real wizard!

name: Space Road
summary: On the way to a new Galaxy! In Space Road get on board your spaceship and get all the stars!

name: Space Fantasy: Anonymous Hero
summary: The thrilling shooting game is now available on Steam! Manipulate the ""Hero who wishes to remain anonymous"" While mowing down the approaching mecha corps Defeat the mech army in high-speed battles.

name: Space Codex
summary: Space Codex is a casual retro arcade minimal awesome top-down shooter featuring waves of enemy spaceships with different attacks in what is, literally, a bullet hell. To beat them, you will have power-up options available through the map. The game only gets harder. How long can you stay alive?

name: Spirits of Mystery: Song of the Phoenix
summary: Players must reunite the kingdoms of Phoenix and Dragon after they have been at war for 300 years.

name: Space Slice
summary: Space adventure game.

name: Spaceship Ace Pilot
summary: Spaceship Ace Pilot is a physics driven space simulation game that will push your skills to the limit. Your goal is to collect all power cells in the level in order to execute a hyper jump to the next level. Do you have what it takes to be the best spaceship pilot in the galaxy?

name: Speeder
summary: Speeder is a game that aims to avoid obstacles. The speed increases with every minute. Break your records. Dynamic music will enhance your experience.

name: Space Horde Attack
summary: Collect weapons and destroy enemy ships

name: Speedrun the Game
summary: Speedrun the Game is a stereotypical “save the princess” kind of game, but with a twist. You do go to the castle, defeat the bad guys, and save the princess, but the whole point of the game is to play it over and over to get a faster time, achievements, hats, mini games, etc. Every time you play the game, there’s something different about it than the last time you played!

name: Space Interceptor
summary:
Space Interceptor is an Asteroids tpye of game where you have to avoid not only asteroids but also aliens.

'Space Interceptor: Deluxe Edition' is the name for the registered version, which unlocks more levels and enemies.

name: Space Blade
summary: Single player, top down, retro space-shooter, destroy enemies and fight bullet-hell bosses, upgrade during runs and after them to progress further and faster.

name: Spinnortality
summary: Amass wealth, topple governments, achieve immortality. Spinnortality is a cyberpunk management sim where corporations are king. Can you build your technocratic power and create an empire that will stand for eternity?

name: Space Fury
summary: Space Fury was one of the many popular vector games developed in the early 1980s in the same model as the famous Asteroids game released by Atari in 1979. Space Fury was developed by Sega for the Sega G80 Arcade system, and was also released in cartridge form for the ColecoVision gaming system.

name: Spinball
summary: Spinball is a fast, fun, and competitive multi-player sport game with non-stop scoring action. Rack up the points as you spin your paddles to smack the ball towards the goal, and try not to accidentally score against your own team!

name: Spirit of Glace
summary: Help tell the story of Glace, a small creature who suddenly blinks into existence and must find purpose in a world torn apart by a mysterious force. Based on the original 2004 classic played by millions, Spirit of Glace is an open world adventure platformer with a story you won't forget.

name: SpellRogue: Supporter Pack
summary: The Supporter pack decks out each wizard with golden garbs. If you love SpellRogue and want to support us further, buying this DLC will help fuel further development. And, it also comes with our eternal gratitude and thanks for your love and support of SpellRogue.

name: Spark Mk1
summary: Spark MK1 is a fast paced non-stop action game that will challenge your reflexes.

name: Spider Kong
summary: Spider Kong shares very similar gameplay to Donkey Kong, where the player is required to climb ladders and avoid obstacles to get to the top. In Spider Kong, however, the enemy throwing objects at you is not an ape but a giant spider.

name: Spark of Light
summary: Help Nerow bring back the light to his magical world and search for hidden fireflies that guide him through the darkness. Solve the mysteries of the stolen light together with Nerow on a magical journey to rescue the Sun-bug and restore the natural balance!

name: Spawn: The Eternal
summary:
Spawn: The Eternal is based on Todd McFarlane's Spawn comics. The game switches back and forth between two styles of play. There's an exploration mode, which is along the lines of Tomb Raider. Spawn must climb and jump his way through a variety of environmental obstacles while smashing crates and furniture to find power-ups.

When you approach an enemy, however, the engine switches into something between a 3D fighting game and an old-fashioned side-scrolling beat-em-up. Spawn must defeat one or more enemies, who may be surrounding him before he can continue.

name: Space Time
summary: Space Time is a classic arcade style shooter with a modern touch. The goal is to destroy targets and achieve a high enough score before time runs out. There are 9 unlockable ships, 3 game modes and 3 difficulties.

name: Spring Bunny Islands
summary: Seek serenity in hand-painted "Spring Bunny Islands". Uncover 200 playful bunnies hidden amongst the vibrant blooms of 9 unique islands.

name: Speed Bike Racing
summary: You are a speed bike racer, and the legendary MotoX motorcycle race is closely approaching. You have decided to test your skills before the big event. The goal is to ride as far as you can in total meters, before you crash your bike. The further you go, the more prestige and famous you become.

name: Spoxel
summary: Explore, customize, and build across the world of Spoxel as you fight the otherworlders. Use runes to construct custom powerful or infuse weapons and armor with rare resources. Explore an infinite world while you build a base to establish a foothold of power to defend from your enemies!

name: Spacefighter Rukia
summary: Jump into the cockpit with Rukia, a space pilot mercenary, and follow her story to save the galaxy in this top-down 2d Space shooter

name: Space Conflict: Runner
summary:
Fly as fast as you can! Avoid the planets!
Exciting space adventure where you will control a ... spaceship!
In this game you need to fly between planets and collect stars. Dangers are awaiting you at every step so you will need a lightning reaction.
Try to beat your friends and get first place in Leaderboard.
3..2..1.. Well, you think you're pretty agile? Let's start!

name: Space Scaven
summary: Space Scaven is a physical puzzle game about an engineer, whose job is to collect black boxes on abandoned space stations.

name: Spiral Up
summary: An extremely challenging 2D Platformer made by a bunch of Jump King lovers: breach the sky, or torture yourself, with spring and gravity. Can also be played with your friends, either for a race or for co-op.

name: Spy Kids Learning Adventures: Mission - The Nightmare Machine
Spinners
summary: Spinners. You get dropped a spinner every 2 hours 5 times per day. Each spinner is also made by the community in Discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something fantastic. Compete with friends, win the most unique item and become a spin master!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Extended Edition
summary: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Spyjinx
summary: Spyjinx mixes action strategy gameplay, dynamic world building and RPG character development in a treacherous world of espionage.

name: Speakeasy
summary: A fast paced 1920s themed fighting game with 10 second rounds and a three button control scheme.

name: Spellcraft
summary: Spellcraft is a new type of strategy game: a Real-Time Battler where you actively command an entire team of heroes and cast spells to outplay your opponents.

name: Space-Fright
summary: Space-Fright is a cute stealth horror game.

name: Space Panic VR (Room Escape)
summary:
Space Panic VR (Room Escape) is a VR Escape Room unlike any other you've seen before.

Set in the future aboard a space station, the game will challenge players to solve multiple complex puzzles in order to escape.

name: Split
summary: Co-op Puzzle Platformer

name: Space Hero: Intergalactic Titan
summary: A top-down "bullet-heaven" roguelite where you play as a futuristic space marine. Use a variety of damage and utility abilities in your attempt to survive. Earn tokens to spend on permanent character upgrades, ability upgrades, and ability mods that allow you to customize your playstyle.

name: Spooky Waltz
summary: Halloween is here! It's time for the annual Halloween Ball on Halloween Town! Join KaraMaple and Punkpin as they prepare themselves for the most important night of the Year! Get your moves ready, tune your hear for the beat, and prepare to battle a legion of Cursed Candieswhile you dance to the spooky beat. Protect your festival from the Old Geezer Gang and drive them off Halloween Town, assuring the spookier festival ever!

name: Spannerman
summary: Tú y tu maravillosa llave inglesa sois los únicos que podéis salvar el mundo del desastre nuclear. Las tuberías refrigerantes del reactor de la estación de poder nuclear local están goteando. ¿Podrás evitar las ratas antimateria y los escombros que caen, o iréis al otro mundo tú y tu reactor?

name: Spacen: The Beginning
summary: As Gary Rogers, the player battles through hordes of enemy spaceships in several missions, evading projectiles, asteroids and defeating powerful bosses. Gary collects debris from destroyed enemies and exchanges them at the home base for ship and weapon upgrades.

name: SpectralClimb
summary: 3D Platformer with some basic combat!

name: Spectral Force: Radical Elements
summary: Spectral Force: Radical Elements is a Role-Playing game, developed by Neverland and published by Idea Factory. It is a Japan-only release that focuses more on huge armies rather than a small group of heroes.

name: Springbot: Mars Attack!
summary: ZX Spectrum 48k Platformer

name: Space Junkies
summary: A visceral, jetpack-fueled VR Arcade Shooter where you fly through deadly Orbital Arenas in HOSTILE SPACE, facing off in extreme battles!

name: Spot the Differences
summary:
Are your eyes keen enough to spot the difference, even if it's ever so slight, in a pair of pictures? This game gives you that classic puzzle challenge while also offering a journey through odd and picturesque scenes on various themes: travel, gastronomy, playground, sports, pets, wildlife.

Three game modes are available in Spot The Differences! In Arcade Mode, images appear in a random sequence. Spot 5 differences in each picture! In Select Pictures Mode, play with pictures you choose. And in Time Attack Mode, spot one difference in each picture and then switch -- spot as many as you can while the timer runs!

name: Space Dream
summary: Space Dream VR is a Virtual Reality Experience filled with Stunning Beauty; combining elements of Music Visualization, Storytelling & Gameplay.

name: Space Monster
summary: Space Monster is a physical puzzle with a side view. Exploding bombs throw a space monster into a black hole. The monster from space is a threat to the planet Earth. Only you can throw it into a black hole and save the Earth! Game for logical thinking, reaction speed, good for children.

name: Space Casual
summary: Space adventure game that combines modern and different concepts with the games we played in the past.

name: Spellarium 8 Match 3 Puzzle
summary: That's not your regular Match3 game! It is a Match3 Puzzle. Part 8 has a new bonus game and a new gameplay you won't see in other Match 3 games.

name: Spunky: Gangster Simulator
summary: Enter the world of crime with Spunky Gangster Simulator. Assume the role of a mafia leader in this role-playing themed game. The mafia bosses, monopolize their presence in the crime world will develop their gangs and struggle with each other. Who will establish domination in the city?

name: Space Run
summary: Space Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your epic journey through space as a baby Martian.

name: Spell Blocks
summary: Reproduce patterns on Blocks to make Spells !

name: Spider Ponds
summary: A game about being a spider. Weave a web, catch prey, and discover the forest's secrets. Move along webs, sprouts, and trees. Eat flies to replenish your stamina, and follow a mysterious figure to see the end.

name: Space Invaders Get Even
summary: Space Invaders Get Even is a video game by Taito for the Wii. Originally intended as a retail release, the game was released as a downloadable WiiWare game instead. It was released in Japan on August 26, 2008, in Europe on November 7, 2008, and in North America on December 1, 2008.

name: Space Tycoon
summary: The universe is in full swing and the war is on the verge. At this time, should we set up our own space station and develop our own fleet to defend ourselves? Can also buy and sell warships to make money, why not？ This game is a simulation business game based on second-hand ship trading.

name: Springtale
summary:
You've slept for so long during the winter, sadly just you woke up at the end of the winter and all your friends are still as sleep. The thaw brings unexpected experiences, help your friends to feel as good as you in this new season! 
 
 
This game is made using Unreal Engine 4 during the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam. 
 
 
Every single asset in this game was made during the Jam by a single developer, me, Francisco Fuhro and the development was streamed on twitch. There was around 70 hours of work put on this game, no crunches, no late or early morning bed. It was an awesome experience! Surprisingly, the game is also under 100mb of download! Play the game and enjoy!

name: Specimen #14
summary: Yet another untitled entry in Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N., it follows an unknown protagonist hounded by mysterious, eyeball-like creatures.

name: SpellForce: The Breath of Winter
summary: In their greed for a long forgotten power, thirteen of the most eminent mages of all time have caused the world of EO to tumble into chaos and destruction. Enter this world beyond imagination in an epic adventure spanning time and continents. Indulge yourself in a world full of magic, battles and adventure, where the courage of one may decide the destiny of many. Lead your armies through spectacular battles and experience thrilling adventures.

name: SpaceXplorer
summary: Desktop and VR interactive space experience/game. Fan homage to SpaceX's efforts of inspiring humanity to finally become a spacefaring civilization! Experience launches, flights and landings of starships first-hand, engage with challenging mini-games, explore funny memes and more. :-)

name: Specimen 15
summary: Mysterious disembodied eyes chase you in this link of Haunted PS1's C.H.A.I.N..

name: Space Gold Rush TD
summary: Join in on the next gold rush and become a prospector in space. In this unique tower defense you can set up and reposition towers for maximum efficiency and adapt to the environment.

name: Space Asteroid Shooter
summary: Get ready to blast your way into the endless space and survive as long as you can against dangerous asteroids and deadly enemies.

name: Specular Stranded
summary: Specular Stranded is a hardcore, stealth/action, cinematic Sci-Fi experience. You wake up alone, stranded out in space. An enemy has boarded your ship. Your crew are either dead or missing. Hide in the shadows, take your enemies out without leaving a trace. That is how you survive.

name: SpaceDweller
summary: SpaceDweller is a turn based game where you have to fight against the Empire that attacked your sector. Travel from on star system to another, upgrade your ship and destroy your enemies. Combine modules and satellites with unique abilities to gain advantage in battle.

name: Space Kettle
summary: Have you ever played a game as a Flying Kettle? No? It’s time to fix this. In this game, your main goal is to reach the top of the unyielding surreal mountain at any cost, going through the test of inevitable falls, constant loss of progress, and deep frustration.

name: SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip
summary: Grab your board. Carve it up! Hit the sand and surf with SpongeBob and his best pal, Patrick, for some super boarding escapades! Ride mondo waves and winding waterways, and skate gnarly seaside streets and ramps for hours of challenges that'll test your awesome boarding skills. SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip is non-stop action features 2 modes of play: Story and Challenge. In Story Mode, SpongeBob and Patrick relive their crazy road trip to the beach through slideshows leading into arcade-style play. Freestyle your way through Challenge Mode as you, SpongeBob and his bodacious Bikini Bottom buddy explore a brand new never-before-seen world.

name: Space Vikings
summary: Pillage and plunder across the galaxy as part of a crew of Space Vikings in this sci-fi roguelite bullet hell dungeon crawler. Find exotic weapons, upgrade them with powerful augments, explore mysterious alien planets, and unleash viking vengeance on their inhabitants.

name: Spell Slingin' Tower Defense
summary: A game that combines the fun of custom spellcrafting with the monotony of a tower defense! Protect your hut with a vast arsenal of spells that you put into varyingly effective combinations.

name: Space Hole 2018
summary: You gotta go in the Space Hole! A space metroidvania, wherein a space shuttle must navigate both inside and outside of the space ball. Collect gems, opening up even deeper space holes.

name: Space Assault
summary: Save the world from attacking hordes of enemy alien beings by destroying as many invaders as possible! Score points for every enemy ship you destroy! Win bonus points by blasting the parent ships!

name: Speer DX
summary: Throw your speer, use it as a platform, and puzzle-platform your way through 125 stages in this director's cut version of the classic Speer!

name: Spartan's Spear
summary: Spartan's Spear is a thinky adventure set in Ancient Greece. Battle creatures of all kind with your wit and the might of your spear! Maneuver in tight spaces, loot chests for helpful items.

name: Spinny Dungeon
summary: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer to you. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE... or spin to SURVIVE!

name: Space Invaders
summary:
The handheld version of the 1999 Space Invaders for consoles. Developed by Crawfish Interactive, it features different graphics and power-ups, a password system to access levels and an exclusive soundtrack. The player can choose between three different ships to control, a first in the series. There's also a dash mechanic, enabled by double tapping left or right.

The game has link cable support for two player action and is compatible with both Game Boy and Game Boy Color.

name: Spark Man
summary: You play a robot called Spark Man and the screen advances from left to right. Kill all the enemies with your standard weapon or weapons with limited shots available within the stages. You can also shoot the bad guys face-to-face with your leg. During each boss stage you have to kill a certain number of enemies to continue on to the next level. The game ends after Level 9

name: Speed Power Gunbike
summary: Kahen Soukou Gunbike: Speed Power Gunbike (可変走攻 ガンバイク Speed Power Gunbike), is an action video game released on April 23, 1998 exclusively in Japan for the PlayStation. It was the first game developed by Inti Creates and was published by Sony Music Entertainment Japan.

name: Space Trail Fireworks
summary: Drag trails, make explosions, survive as long as you can! Space Trail Fireworks is a fun arcade-like, snake-like that is easy to learn. Best on touchscreen or with mouse.

name: Spires, The Wailing City
summary: Vondur's first map since 2010. Medium sized map in the city setting.

name: Splashy Tiles: Bouncing to the Beat
summary: Swipe your fingers to control the ballHow far can you bounce to the beat

name: Space Hunter
summary: Space Hunter is a homebrew game developed in 2005 for the Colecovision console.

name: Speedway League
summary: A dirtbike racing game released by Magnussoft in 2010 for personal computers everywhere.

name: Space Ranger ASK
summary: Space Ranger ASK is a classic arcade shoot'em up game, featuring hundreds of levels with asteroid blasting, spacemen rescues, UFO destruction, astroid mining and Boss fights! The game includes a fully featured Mission Editor, so you can create and share your own missions, and play those created by other gamers.

name: Spellbound : The Magic Within
summary: Spellbound: The Magic Within is a choose your own adventure style visual novel. Jump into a world of Magic, Witchcraft and Mystery as a magician in training. Interact with a host of unusual characters. Choose from multiple schools of magic, bond with your tutor, and maybe even save the world.

name: Space Station Zulu
summary: Aliens have invaded the space station you a commanding. It's your task to guide you crew towards safety.

name: Space Commander
summary: The endless expanse of space has never been such a dangerous place. Take command as a Space Fleet Admiral who will face the challenge of galactic war and determine the fate of the universe.

name: SpellForce: Platinum Edition
summary: Includes the original SpellForce: The Order of Dawn and both the expansions - SpellForce: The Breath of Winter and SpellForce: Shadow of the Phoenix

name: Sping
summary:
Sp!ng is like a stress ball for your brain!
Experience the zen and skillful world that is Sp!ng.
With only one touch, flow through hundreds of hand-crafted levels.
Unlock new themes that change the look and feel of your experience.
Earn new characters and perfect levels to unlock new challenging modes.

name: Spell Casting: Purrfectly Portable Edition
summary: Spell Casting is a line drawing puzzle game in which you are a young wizard learning spells in the comfort of your home thanks to Wizardly Distance Education offered by the prestigious Magical Education Of Wizards School!

name: Space Roller Coaster VR
summary: Jump into hyper speed and hold tight as you experience this galactic ride. Mars, Venus, Earth, the Stars and much more as you dive deeper into space. Remember the galaxy is vast and your journey starts here.

name: Spark World
summary: Spark World is an Action game, published by Den'Z, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Krabby Quest
summary: A SpongeBob puzzle game released in 2005.

name: Spellcrafter: The Path of Magic
summary: Spellcrafter: The Path of Magic is an RPG game with deep tactical turn-based combat and a unique spell casting system. Explore a world full of magic, collect gold, interact with NPCs, go on quests and make moral choices! Recruit heroes, assemble and summon powerful armies and send them into battle!

name: Speed Rumbler
summary: Terrorists have taken Super Joe's family and a number of townspeople hostage. You must drive your gun-equipped car through dangerous streets to free the hostages and collect power-ups. If your vehicle is severely damaged, you may jump free and continue to fight on foot.

name: Spinners' Bank
summary: Spot and mark the counterfeit bills from the real dough

name: Spellscribe
summary: Spellscribe is a typing fantasy RPG where you'll have to use every spell, word, and strategy in your arsenal to win. Explore dark dungeons, barter with friendly owls, and fight deadly monsters, all on your journey to save the world.

name: Space Pilot Alliance
summary: Zero-G spaceships and grappling hooks

name: Space Guard
summary: A shooter by MP Soft. It was released in 1983 for the BBC Micro.

name: Space Whale
summary: The Universe is collapsing, and Space Whale must eat and grow as much as he can to survive. Developed by Mercurial Games for the Professional Masters in Games Development at Abertay University.

name: Space Jam: A New Legacy - Full Court Pinball
summary:
The Tune Squad is back and ready to slam dunk in the Full Court Pinball game! The characters of Space Jam are prepared to go back on the field, but this time, the basketball match is a bit different. Today's battle will take place on a pinball board, so you never know where the ball will land! Can you think of a strategy and help your friends win the game?

This is a classic challenge with an unusual twist, so it's your chance to show off your skills! To earn as many points as possible, you must throw the ball to your teammates and hit all the bumpers. Guide it all around the board, and don't let it escape to keep the battle going! Will you be able to set a new record?

name: Space Craft
summary: Your ship crashed on the unknown planet BURA 0-5.1. This planet is not yet unknown to your race and who knows what awaits you here!

name: Spells of Genesis
summary: A game combining TCG aspects and arcade principles, with an unique, blockchain-based in-game economy.

name: Spacejam
summary: A classic 8bit arcade space shooter+infinite runner game

name: Speedy Gun Savage
summary: Speedy Gun Savage is a first person shooter VR game where Wolf, the hero of the game is an intergalactical bounty hunter and travels to different planets to collect bounties. The game has three different planets with several enemies and three main boss.

name: SpellUp
summary: Relax and Lose yourself in a magical world of Zodiacs and Words in SpellUp, an addictive word game.

name: Space Kadet
summary: Maze shooter

name: Spellbearers
summary: Spellbearers is a top-down, 2D, twin stick shooter inspired by "Super Smash TV". Battle against hordes of magical enemies to liberate the rulers of three kingdoms that have been overtaken by dark forces. With staff in hand, do you have what it takes to uphold the title of The Spellbearer?

name: SpaceTone
summary: SpaceTone is a rhythm game combined closely with story. In the game you will play the role of Reaper who judges dying lives through music.

name: SpaceColorsRunner
summary: SpaceColorsRunner is an Arcade game in which you have to be extremly vigilant!

name: SpyLeaks
summary: Uncover the mystery and save the world in this retro puzzler that also sports some old-school "shmup" action in between all the spying.

name: Spinning Maze
summary: Control and rotate the maze to reach the end.

name: Space Survivor
summary: The darkness is coming!! The silence is covering your spaceship step by step! The silent rooms. Some scary things are inside your spaceship… they are haunting you.

name: Space Takeover: Over City
summary: Conquer the world and strategize all the states io! Towers or states, all will be conquered!

name: Space Court
summary: As a newly appointed Judge, you will rule over Space Court and its denizens to keep the universe safe. Or possibly blow it all up. Either way, you’re tenured.

name: Space Doubt
summary: You have to kill the Bogloids who have entered your spaceship and repair the damage they have caused.

name: Spinshot Party
summary: Join the excitement of a real-life table football game! This game is easy to learn, but challenging to master, making it perfect for players of all skill levels. It's a family-friendly game that's sure to liven up any party.

name: Space Funeral 2
summary: Space Funeral 2, also known as Blood Blood, is a very brief fan-made sequel to Space Funeral and was released by DarkChibiShadow on October 13, 2012. It is regarded as the shortest game in the series. Space Funeral 2 is then followed by Earth Birth.

name: Space Query
summary: This simulation software brings the solar system to your fingertips, allowing you to explore the orbits of planets and witness the fascinating effects of introducing new cosmic objects like asteroids, extra suns, or even a black hole.

name: Spirited Soul
summary: Spirited Soul is a 3D action role-playing game from Voidion.

name: SpeedRunners: Mr. Quick's Speedy Bunch
summary: Adds 5 new runners to the character select: Mr. Quick, Dr. Smart, JailBird, Luc j'adore and Excel!

name: Space Warrior: The Origin
summary: A shoot 'em up game from Caliburnus Limited.

name: Spaceman
summary: Conquer the heights of space by navigating treacherous landscapes. Battle gravity and test your skill to reach the top. Get ready for the climb of your life.

name: Splat the Difference
summary: Splat! This spot the difference game is extra messy! When you find a difference, splat it with paint! Play solo or battle it out with friends! Up to four can play with just one copy of the game using Download Play. With hundreds of pictures and differences that change each time you play, the puzzles never repeat.

name: Spellscaper
summary:
Spellscaper is a multiplayer creative sandbox where players can create gaming worlds with others.
The game empowers players to create their own gaming experiences with the help of AI. Ask N.U.R.D. what you want to create and they'll make it for you! Add gaming behaviors to your creations to make the experience even better.

name: Space Junk Patrol
summary:
Guide your ship through crowded space to clean up space debris, repair failing satellites, and shoo away pesky aliens. And watch out for those asteroids! 
 
This is a room-scale arcade-style game requiring an HTC Vive VR Headset to play.

name: Spellbound
summary:
Just as you were about to advance a grade in the school of magic your tutor goes and gets himself kidnapped. You have to rescue him or you'll never graduate.

Battling through eight diverse and dangerous lands, collecting spells and objects along the way, you use your limited magic powers to fight off deadly adversaries in a frought-filled fight to free your tutor.

But it's going to be a tough task on your own: take a friend along to increase your chances and double the fun!

name: SpaceVibes
summary: An Artistic VR “Shooter” Game For Everyone! Enter space and enjoy shooting flying objects with a laser gun while jamming out to the SpaceVibes soundtrack! A game without gore, that doesn’t encourage shooting living things… In fact, you can’t!

name: Spoopcore 3D
summary: Spoopcore 3D is a low-poly 3D platformer/FPS hybrid where you play as a slime named Reggie on a mission to save ducks from across the multiverse and kill a god. Zoom through levels, find secrets, and dispatch enemies using weapon combos.

name: Speed
summary: Speed is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sports Car Challenge 2
summary: High-end racing on mobile enters the next round with Sports Car Challenge 2. Drive a total of 20 exclusive super cars by international top-brands such as Audi, Bentley, Bugatti, Lamborghini, Porsche and Volkswagen. Enjoy photo-realistic 3D graphics and spectacular attention to detail. Show your skills on the asphalt in three ambitious game modes and make your way to the top of the global leader boards. Fill your trophy room with the rewards from dozens of challenging achievements!

name: Spanky's Quest DX
summary: The Natsume’s Game Boy classic, now in full color! Enjoy this cute single screen arcade platformer with a new beautiful coat of paint!

name: Space Rocks
summary:
While on a routine Stellar Cartography mission, UESC Rains experienced a malfunction and warped into an asteroid field in an unknown sector of space. Unable to get a bearing to safely warp out, the ship must blast the asteroids into smithereens to prevent imminent destruction. To make matters worse, the local inhabitants are xenophobic and have sent warships and Magna-Mines to eliminate the alien (that's you!) threat.

As the pilot of your ship you must maneuver instantly, rotating left, right and energizing your thrusters to avoid destruction. A direct hit on an asteroid with your laser cannon breaks it in two. A hit on one of these breaks it into two smaller asteroids, a final hit on a small asteroid destroys it completely. Your ship is equipped with a special defensive option to help you avoid collisions when the action gets intense!

Space Rocks is an impressive blending of the classic arcade games Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe, crafted for the Atari 2600 by Darrell Spice, Jr. If you're a fan of either arcade cabinet (or both!), you'll love Space Rocks! While Atari's version of Asteroids for the 2600 was passable at the time of its release, Space Rocks blasts far ahead of this early effort. Taking full advantage of the DPC+ mode in our Melody Board, Space Rocks pushes the Atari 2600 to its limits and offers a wide variety of gameplay options to keep you playing for years to come. The graphics, animations, and sound effects are well above what is typically experienced on the 2600.

name: Space Attack
summary: Space Attack is a retro shooter with a 1970s feel. You can upgrade your ship according to your preference. Enemy battles show physics-based behavior. The difficulty level is set low for those who are not familiar with the game.

name: Spring Hell
summary: Just Press Spacebar at the right time! It’s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.

name: Spellarium 2
summary: that's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element. The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes. Plus a nice town to build.

name: Spy Racing
summary: A "driving" game of sorts. You can move left and right, and a bit forward and back. Don't collide with other cars, and collect as many disks as you can.

name: Spear of Destiny: The Kaiseki - Director's Cut
summary: This fantastic ancient world has been invaded by powerful enemies who rule in the dark. Several centuries have passed since Light's Lords defeated them with the spear of destiny.

name: SpaceHook
summary: A fun hooking game for 2-4 players!

name: Spacebar
summary: Spacebar restaurant management simulation

name: Space Dance
summary: Space simulator in the genre of fixed shooter from the 90s

name: Space Fishermen
summary: "Space Fishermen" is a 2002 fishing video game that breaks traditional norms by offering players a quirky and innovative experience. Developed through a collaboration between Land Ho! and Spumco, the game features three eccentric characters, planet-like fishing locations, and a unique reeling mechanism. Catch over 150 bizarre and alien fish species with the use of strategic lure preferences!

name: Spiders of Mars
summary: Horizontal space shooter in the vein of Defender.

name: Spider Fear
summary: Immersive Virtual Reality game where you fend off attacking spiders.

name: Spark
summary: Spark is an immersive FPS VR game on Oculus App Lab with a fiercely competitive Death Match and Riding battle. With the battle Pass, leaderboard, and more coming weapons, you will definitely have a great time in Spark!

name: Sprouts Adventure
summary: Oh Great One! Only a few Sprouts remain and they are in need of your help! Use your powers to guide them in returning to their once peaceful and prosperous existence. Fulfill wishes, help them invent wonderful toys to play with and assist them in rebuilding their amazing land! The happier you can keep your Sprouts, the more productive their community will be!

name: Splot
summary: Splot combines the easy to learn gameplay mechanics of a modern mobile title with the depth and detail of an old-school platformer, with sharp controls and crispy visuals.

name: Spirit of dungeon
summary: Pixel adventure with elements of bagel, and RPG. Beautiful graphics, and the complexity of the passage. You are a hero who decided to save the world from cultists who steal people for their needs, you have to overcome 15 levels to get to the very main spirit of this dungeon and defeat it!

name: Space Mission SM-11
summary: A Space Mission (SM-11) remake made from photograps and video recordings

name: SpeedRunners: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Cut-throat multiplayer running game that pits 4 players against each other, locally and/or online. Run, jump, swing around, and use devious weapons and pick-ups to knock opponents off-screen! One of the most competitive games you'll ever play.

This bundle contains the game and all available add-ons.

name: Spotted
summary: Spotted is a mouse maze game, requiring agility and bravery. Travel along the river, being careful to only touch the water and not the riverbank. The more water you accumulate, the higher your score. As you progress, the pace will get faster, so try your best to keep up.

name: Spaceland: Cooperative
summary: Meet the new DLC with a cooperatative story campaign. In this prequel to the main plot you will learn about Jim's way from an Academy graduate to an active officer of Space Rangers.

name: Spin Deluxe
summary: Spin Deluxe is a puzzle with physics and unique gameplay. You have to think hard in order to beat the game. Become a master of the world of Spin Deluxe and control its physical laws and properties to bring back the light of its lost Sun!

name: Space Ship Infinity
summary: Returning to the classic style of spaceship games in pixel art. Survive in space as many enemy ships and anything else that can destroy your ship, get all the advantages and improvements available to get your best score.

name: Space Ric-O-Shay
summary: Space Ric-O Shay is a Space Invaders clone for the Commodore 64.

name: Speedrunner's Paradise: Sky is the limit
summary: This game is a simple 3D platformer. It is very easy to understand the mechanics of the game, and anyone can play. But, can anyone finish this game? Anyway, as i was saying. This game is an experience. Will you enjoy it? I don't know. Maybe, you should.....Try it yourself!?!?!?!

name: Spirit and Katana
summary: Are you ready for an epic, yet adorable, adventure?! Join the guild waiting for you in the land of Celedain. This is a story about teamwork, friendship, and good times along the way. The bards will be sure to sing soon of your heroism in Spirit and Katana!

name: Spirit Whirled
summary: Spirit Whirled is an XNA community game

name: Spreadstorm
summary: Spreadstorm is a puzzle-adventure game where you control a digital signal in order to defeat the mysterious opponent with the logic, planning and reaction.

name: Spotlight
summary:
Spotlight is a series of educational games for the Apple II.

Reflect - Angle a mirror so that the light from a flashlight reaches the object displayed

Spotlight - Angle a mirror so the spotlight shines on a man moving across the screen.

Hot Stuff - Try to guess a number between 0 - 9. Each turn the player guesses three numbers, and are told how many are far away, close, or correct.

Boxed In - A computerized version of Othello played on a 6 x 6 board against a computer opponent.

name: Spider-Man 3: Trio of Terror
summary: Spider-Man 3: Trio of Terror is a handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Space Sex
summary: A sinfully wild Sci-Fi Adventure, with a Happy Ending! Lose yourself in the impressively graphic, stimulated 3D, visually novelistic world of Space Sex.

name: Space Shooter 24
summary: Join the war in the depths of space with Space Shooter 24! Customizable ships, realistic graphics, and breathtaking action await you. Take action now to save the galaxy.

name: Spritz the Happy Onion
summary: Spritz needs to bake a cake to ruin the appetite of the monster who's come to eat the moon! Guide Spritz the Happy Onion as he jumps off of background elements and into your heart. A delightful, surreal throwback to momentum-based platformers of old.

name: Spectral Escape
summary: Spectral Escape is a puzzle game where you have to die to escape a wild west prison. Push blocks, press buttons, collect piggies, turn into a ghost, possess animals, and get your freedom!

name: Space Rescue
summary: Space Rescue is a special space adventure game.You will navigate a tiny spaceship to slip into the puzzle where the Energy Spinels hidden. They have to glide up and down, avoiding a series of obstrucles, and eventually carry the Spinels back to their mother planet.

name: Spirit of Excalibur
summary: Spirit of Excalibur drops the player in to a power vacuum in England following the death of King Arthur. You control Constantine, who is King Arthur's successor, and any knights he is able to recruit. Real-time combat, one-on-one and between armies, are required to defend the realm of Camelot.

name: Spinning Top
summary: Just enjoy the Spinning Top game

name: Space Defender Battle Infinity
summary: The galaxy was suddenly attacked by alien life forms known as the space invaders.

name: Space - The Return Of The Pixxelfrazzer
summary: Space - The Return Of The Pixxelfrazzer is an open-world sci-fi hack'n'slash. Your aim is to explore the inexhaustible amounts of destructible asteroid fields, spacestations and unknown planets of the universe. And maybe, one day you'll probably find out about one of the most unsolved mystery of our universe... the pixxelfrazzer.

name: Spikit
summary: Spikit is a bullet hell game developed by a single developer, Igor Petrović. With a soundtrack composed by Dario Malešević. In this game, the player will have to dodge a constant barrage of spikes coming from the side of the screen. Not only will the player have to evade the spikes currently on the screen, but they will also need to keep an eye out on the next wave of spikes and position themselves accordingly.

name: SpellKnights
summary: SpellKnights is a Third-Person Multiplayer Fantasy Shooter developed with Unreal Engine 4, in which four knights fight with a magical mana (four elements of the nature: Water, Fire, Earth and Wind) to achieve the honour of the Arena.

name: Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer
summary: Is there intelligent life in the universe? Of course not, it's filled with Zombies! Sensing the opportunity for plunder, the Ghost Pirates have taken to the stars on their ethereal ships. Now it is up to YOU to take command of the Space Ghost Pirate Zombie Slayer fleet and lead them against the Zombie menace!

name: Spider Jack
summary: Control a spider (named Jack!) in this puzzle game.

name: Space King
summary: Space King is an early arcade game from Konami. It is the first non-Breakout clone the company produced, instead being a clone of Taito's Space Invaders.

name: Space Impossible
summary: Take control of a fully destructible spaceship and explore, blast or trade your way through the cosmos, alone or with friends. Every tile matters, as you dogfight, maneuver or speed your way past friendly traders, hostile aliens, and impressive space navies. What will you do, Captain?

name: Space Hodsola 2
summary: Space Hodsola 2 - Purple Planet is the long-awaited continuation of the game Space Hodsola.

name: Space Harrier II
summary: The LCD version of Space Harrier II is a watered-down version of the Sega Mega Drive game Space Harrier II created by Tiger Electronics.

name: Spirit Lords
summary: Game for android and IOS.

name: Spice Bandits
summary:
These scurvy space pirates are interested in just one thing…Spice.

Spice Bandits puts you in control of the invading pirate force, protect them as they mine the Earth's resources for the precious mineral, Spice. With groundbreaking online multiplayer, drop-dead gorgeous visuals, challenging and addictive gameplay, a huge amount of upgrades and outrageous weapons, Spice Bandits is the next evolution in Tower Defense.

name: Speed King
summary:
SPEEDKING -- the motorcycle racing game with thrilling high speed wheel-to-wheel action against 19 other determined riders. Work your way up to world class with the 3 skill levels on 10 world famous circuits. Put on your helmet and enjoy the exhilarating challenge of high performance bike racing at 250 mph!

There are 6 gears, with selection made by forward/back movement of the joystick or keys A and Z. Each gear corresponds to a particular speed range. Accelerate or brake by pressing or releasing the Fire button (or space bar). Acceleration and braking are affected by the gear to speed relationship. A neutral position must occur between gear changes if using a joystick.

Colliding with other riders will result in a spill from your machine, and a subsequent time penalty to regain control. Leaving the road causes loss of speed and eventually loss of control.

At the start of the race, two timers will start:

Lap timer: Transferred to left side of the screen at end of each lap (lower readout). Upper readout = best lap time.
Race timer: Timing of current race.

If a new record is set for lap time, race time or finishing position the information will be announced on the grandstand display board.

There are nineteen other riders to compete against at three skill levels selected by F8 (shift and F7). The number of laps can also be reduced to improve on the best race time as playing skill improves. A high speed preview of the selected track may be observed by pressing space bar. The race or practice mode may be aborted at any time by pressing the RESTORE key.

name: Space Invaders: World War
summary: MMO Space Invaders rail-shooter, with competition between countries for mass score.

name: Space Invaders
summary: Space Invaders for the Atari 5200 is an enhanced port of the Atari 8-bit port.

name: Spellbound FPS
summary: First person shooter game based on the first part of the Spellbound series of books. You play as Damitri with his ability to use ice magic. The player will use snowballs and icicles to defeat enemies. They will use Laura's song or scream to heal yourself or hurt foes. 14 stages 4 bosses and 3 modes.

name: Space and Lazers
summary: A chaotic, 4-player co-op space adventure! Manage your ship, fend off alien threats, and pilot nimble fighter jets as you race to deliver humanity's last hope to a new home.

name: SparkleWand Puzzle
summary: Unique Puzzle Game ! Seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you. Test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots. Fun for all ages !

name: Spider: The Secret Of Bryce Manor
summary: Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor is a 2009 side-scrolling action/puzzle video game for iOS and Android, developed and published by Tiger Style. The player takes control of a spider who comes to reside in to the deserted Bryce Manor and must spin webs to trap various types of insects, whilst simultaneously ascertaining what happened to the former residents of the manor. The game received critical acclaim and won multiple awards. Originally released in August,[1] a Director's Cut update replaced the original version on the App Store in December. The update added ten new levels, twenty-four new Game Center achievements, new music, more story elements and a new insect (the hornet).[2] A year after the game's initial release, a HD version was released for the iPad.[3] In 2013, the game was also released for Android.[4] A sequel, Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon, was released in August 2015 for iOS, Android, Windows, Mac and Linux.[5]

name: Spidertronic
summary: In Spidertronic the player gets to take control of a robotic spider moving through a world of isometric levels. Each level consists of tiles that make out the spider's web. Problem is that the web is under siege by odd spherical creatures. This has lead to some passageways being broken and now it's up to our little spider to repair the damage done. The aim then is to rebuild these parts of each level so that the spider can move on to the next. This is done with the use of coloured tiles. The HUD shows a flashing dot that indicates what colour is needed. The spider then has to find a tile in that colour and move it to the tile that needs to be repaired. Once this is all done the spider gets access to a teleporter and can move on to the next level. The spider isn't alone however. It has to be careful not to come into contact with the balls that move around the web. Balls can be destroyed by building a web in front of them. They won't be gone for long though since they will respawn after just a few seconds.

name: Spire of Glory
summary: Surpass the challenges of the Spire. Your legacy begins now. Prove your worth.

name: Space Travel Idle
summary: If you ever dreamed of exploring space at a relaxed pace, here's a journey designed for you.

name: SpeedRunners: Civil Dispute! Character Pack
summary: Play as Showtime, Cannon Fyodor, Diamond Diva or Dashwell with this new character pack for SpeedRunners! Each character comes in four colours and with unique animations. These are purely cosmetic additions and do not affect gameplay.

name: Spider-Man 3
summary:
The Game Boy Advance version of Spider-Man 3, a videogame based on the 2007 movie of the same name.

The Game Boy Advance version is a level-based 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up; only the characters are rendered in 2.5D. A map is used to enter levels, and each level has question bubbles that give hints.

name: Spy Robot: Gateways to Humanity
summary: Single player action FPS game with hacking, stealth and flight elements in a procedurally generated cyberpunk world with VR support. You are the Spy Robot flying on your trusty hover bike to rescue the remains of the human race scattered throughout the galaxy and solve an ancient mystery.

name: Space Fighter 4000: Training Missions
summary: Space Fighter 4000: Training Missions is a spiritual successor to the classic space combat game Starfighter 3000, made by one of it's original authors. It was exclusively released on Xbox Live Indie Games in 2011.

name: SpearFrog
summary: "SpearFrog" is a hardcore ,action adventure game with beautiful pixel Art.

name: Sprint Dodge
summary: A game made by a 16 year old! Enjoy :)

name: Spirit Overflow
summary: Spirit Overflow is the first online multiplayer e-sport for indoor cycling! Every game is an intense 3v3 territory battle that calls for skills, strategies, and sweat.

name: Space Lift Danger Panic!
summary: Space Lift Danger Panic! was originally released for the 3DS in 2015.

name: Sprout of Control
summary: Sprout of Control is a puzzle-game that requires wits, patience and timing. You can move in any direction as long as it is not occupied, but while moving, you can't change direction until you hit another solid object. Crawl your way through the levels and use evil fireflies to your advantage!

name: Space Company Simulator
summary: Face the challenges of conquering space in Age of Space: Colonization. Become the head of a huge corporation in a unique tycoon-style game and learn the secrets of the greatest minds on our planet working towards freeing mankind from the confines of Earth.

name: Space Fighters
summary: You there, combat pilot! Control your spaceship and battle others to win a fast-paced, chaotic game of king of the hill, free for all or team deathmatch. All in the total freedom and maneuverability of 3D outer space.

name: Spheric Bombs
summary: Explore an explosive world of strategy and reflection in this 3D turn-based tactical puzzle game! Guide a bomb through 25 unique levels, combining puzzle and tactics. Immerse yourself in a difficult and stimulating experience, balanced between relaxation and reflection.

name: Special Forces Group 2
summary: 3D First Person Shooter in real-time

name: Split-Second Samurai
summary: Use your samurai skills to read the heart of battle and execute deft swordplay, or die trying.

name: Splash Road
summary: Splash Road is a runner-style arcade race.

name: Spooky Scary Spaces
summary: Spooky Scary Spaces is a third-person adventure game, with a gameplay and visual style inspired by the survival horror games of the Playstation 1 and Playstation 2 era. In it, the player is a girl who, water pistol in hand, enters a house where other children are constantly disappearing. However, inside the house she observes that it does not follow a logical order, and each area seems to have no relation to the previous one. Even so, she advances through the house despite her fear, knowing that she is on the right path, as indicated by the presence of the Motogotchi (hand-held video game consoles) of the children who disappeared there earlier.

name: Splix.io
summary: Splix.io is an online multplayer game where you have to conquer as much land as possible and become the biggest of them all. You can move your player around using the arrow keys or wasd. If you're in your own area, you're safe, but once you leave your area you'll leave a trail behind, once anyone (including yourself) hits that trail, you die. When you get back to your area, the blocks that you have surrounded will be yours. But watch out, because anyone can steal back those blocks at any time. If you surround a couple of blocks while there is another player inside, the land won't get filled with your blocks.

name: Spring and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Employee of the Month
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants once again wins the "Employee of the Month" award, which makes him "Employee of the Year" Mr. Krabs Gives him two tickets to Neptune's Paradise.

name: Spellwake
summary: Spellwake is an online 3D Action RPG where Anything Goes. It features fast-paced hack n' slash against hordes of monsters and powerful bosses. Spellwake's vast class system allows you to make nearly infinite variations of builds.

name: Spacelords: Schneider Deluxe Character Pack
summary: Spacelords premium character packs instantly unlock characters along with a rare weapon Blueprint that are only accessible in the late game. This pack unlocks Schneider. If you already own this character, it won’t have any effect.

name: Special Force VR
summary: SPECIAL FORCE VR is FPS VR Game, available on HTC Vive. Through virtual reality, experience real gun fight in the middle of the battlefield. Proving your shooting ability on VR battlefield. Mission result is absolutely depending on you.

name: Spirit Parade
summary: Spirit Parade is an otome game from Lettuce Waltz.

name: Spacebase Siege
summary: Third person shooter with strategy elements.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Diner Dash
summary: SpongeBob Diner Dash is arcade action with an undersea twist! Mr. Krabs is expanding the Krusty Krab & building an empire, and SpongeBob is the new restaurants' server. Keep him on his toes and help him earn tips, while he serves customers like slippery sturgeon, antsy anchovies, and even Bubble Bass. It's up to you and SpongeBob to seat, serve and satisfy even the squirmiest of patrons.

name: Spikes Have Rage
summary: A brawler starring the unique "spikes" from the SpikeDislike games.

name: Spiritus
summary: Assume the role of Albert and Rose, in this bone chilling 2D pixel art survival horror. Return to classic horror gaming. Jump scares, zombies and rabid dogs are a plenty. Along with pixel gory details.

name: Space Gun
summary: Space Gun is an exciting physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you. Plunge into the space age of technology and take control of a killer gun and destroy everything in your path! The game features many unique buildings and levels, so complete them all!

name: Spriters, Hopes Blooming Dawn
summary: Spriters: Hopes Blooming Dawn is an RPG-style game that takes you on an epic adventure through a world filled with magic, mystery, and danger. Battle dangerous creatures, collect Gems with unique powers, and uncover the mysteries of your past in this engaging and innovative game.

name: SphereCats
summary: A merge puzzle game about spherical cats, with a twist. Play the classic suika experience or try new variations every day!

name: Sphere Slice
summary: Cut circles with the Wii U touch screen.

name: SpermDash
summary: Learn how to pass on love in Sex-Ed Runner Game Sperm Dash.

name: Spherical Soccer
summary: Local 1-on-1 multiplayer arcade soccer!

name: Spelen met Bassie & Adriaan Deel 1
summary: Playing with Bassie & Adriaan Part 1 contains the Crooks game, karaoke, a memory game and (digital) coloring pages.

name: Spells and Sacrifice
summary: A Lovecraftian dungeon crawler, learn occult spells to survive and descend through the scourge pit. Find that which was imprisoned long ago.

name: Speedway Challenge 2021
summary: Speedway Challenge 2021 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Space Kahuna
summary:
Are those California waves too bogus for you? Why don't you take a surf in SPACE!!!

Space Kahuna is horizontally scrolling shooter developed as a tribute to silly shoot' em ups from the past such as Parodius, Harmful Park, and Cho Aniki. Therefore don't expect the usual space tropes and get ready for some silly levels.

name: SpookyKillers
summary: Spooky zOmBiEs are getting close! Have fun tonight playing alone or with 3 friends! Perfect party night game for HARDCORE team work =0

name: Space X Collector
summary: This platform game may be one of the most challenging games you've ever seen in your life.

name: Spinner Prologue
summary: Use your Ipod or Iphone's accelerometer to get through the treacherous mazes

name: Spectrobes
summary: Disney Interactive's first original IP, Spectrobes is a DS game that involves training Spectrobes in order to fight the Krawl.

name: Spirits of Mystery: The Moon Crystal
Spoils of a Starfighter
summary: A space survival roguelike where you upgrade your ship over the course of the game, and unlock new ships and weapon mods as you progress over multiple games.

name: Speed Racer: The Videogame
summary: In Speed Racer, players take on the role of the characters from the film, getting behind the wheels of each character's signature vehicles to experience firsthand the film's high adrenaline, combative racing style. Perform tricks and pull off insane stunts through incredible, twisting stadium tracks, all while fighting against rival racers with incredible Car-Fu action.

name: Springtime Mahjongg 2
summary: Springtime Mahjongg 2 brings the lovely sights and sounds of this incredible season to your PC! Complete challenging mahjongg boards to reveal beautiful springtime motifs. Enjoy various hand-drawn tile sets, including classic Chinese motifs.

name: Spartan Commander Realtime
summary: You hold the fate of Sparta in your hands. Stand as a humble Hoplite and earn your way through the ranks as you become King of Sparta and all of Greece. Change the fate of History as you fight against Xerxes oncoming hordes and fight to win the day!

name: Space Engineers: Ultimate Edition 2021
summary: The Space Engineers Ultimate Edition 2021 includes all of the DLCs for Space Engineers, all the decorative blocks and cosmetic items released in 2019, 2020 and 2021.

name: Space Plane
summary: Short, turn based puzzle game drawn and coded by Artur Petrov. His second project after the Ink Plane.

name: Spacegirl
summary: Escape the homicidal space station!

name: Space electrician
summary: Space electrician is a classic falcon in a space setting

name: Spyro
summary: Spyro is an isometric game developed for mobile phones. Spyro is tasked with finding the outfits and accessories for each fairy.

name: Splash Lake
summary:
Splash Lake is an action-puzzle game for the TurboGrafx-CD and PC Engine CD-ROM. The player is an ostrich named Ozzie and must walk around a grid, pecking at certain lynchpin areas of the ground in order to collapse parts of the level into the ocean. The goal is to remove all enemies by dropping the ground they're walking on. It is structurally similar to Dig Dug 2.

The game has a multiplayer mode, which allows two players to try to outmaneuver and out-think each other.

name: Space Encounters
summary: Fly a ship through a trench and shoot waves of attacking enemies.

name: Spitting Z
summary: In this exciting and dynamic game you have to protect your harvest from pumpkin-eating zombies who got into the habit to visit your garden! To do this, you have a magic spitting stick! Spit into the microphone-kill the zombies!

name: Space Slingshot VR
summary: Have you ever wondered how Angry-birds-like view might look in VR, And from the First Person perspective? You will definitely have a lot of fun with this game shooting rats as if in reality, Now it comes, Let's go.

name: Spheria
summary: Spheria is a simple arcade game where you roll your POWERFUL BALL through stages of mystique and wonder.

name: Spot the Dot
summary: A little game where you have to break objects at an ever increasing rate.

name: SpinZap
summary: SpinZap is a challenging game in classic arcade style. Use your reflexes, dexterity and boss skills to conquer 81 levels of circle zapping madness.

name: Speedonauts
summary: Compete against the galaxy in this fast-paced speedrunning game. Create and share levels. Break records. Be the best.

name: Sporting Triangles
summary:
A licensed version of a British TV game show from the late 1980s.

The game features 3 players, all either human or computer. Each chooses a category of questions out of 12 on offer - some are for a single sport (such as soccer or cricket) while others a more general (such as Indoor Sport and Pot Luck).

name: Spermination
summary: Fight the battle you already won, but never remember. It is you up against 1000 other sperm fighters. Can you beat off your competition and come first? Finally, collect your very own baby gnomes as trophies for your minivan!

name: Speed Swing
summary: Speed Swing is a challenging level based grappling hook game, where the objective is to reach the end of each level as fast as possible.

name: Spelling Quest Online
summary: Spelling Quest Online is a real-time multiplayer competitive word game: flex on friends and strangers with your vocabulary and typing ability.

name: Spellborn
summary: In this open-world medieval RPG, use your magic and acrobatic abilities to combat the monarchy and bring freedom back to the people.

name: Splice: Tree of Life
summary: Resequence, mutate, and splice in this experimental microbial puzzler by Cipher Prime. In this game you will plunge into the tiny world of molecules. You should expose molecules to make them create new life. In the game there’s magnificent graphics and an excellent gameplay, enjoy all beauty of life.

name: SpaceTac
summary:
SpaceTac is a turn-based tactical RPG set in space, playable directly in any modern browser. 
Go through challenging and rewarding battles, improve your fleet with looted equipment, and try to uncover the mysteries of a galactic-wide takeover.

name: Spin Squared
summary: Gravity-defying puzzle platformer with a unique twist on world rotation. Navigate through 8 episodes of frantic gameplay and challenging rotation puzzles.

name: Spite & Malice
summary: Play North Sky Games’ brand new Spite & Malice game, also known as Skip-Bo and Cat and Mouse. Play all the cards from your payoff piles before your opponent and win the match! With a host of unique game variants, including Kings and Misery, and 4 challenging levels of difficulty, Spite & Malice offers an unparalleled game play experience!

name: Speedfreak
summary:
A platformer with speedrunning aspirations on which the player controls
a featureless humanoid through 7 levels that at a certain point and filling a "gauge" they will turn into its second form (a.k.a Speedfreak)
that possesses pretty much the same moveset but with slightly improved
stats.

name: Spelen met Bassie & Adriaan Deel 2
summary: Playing with Bassie & Adriaan Part 2 contains (digital) jigsaw puzzles, a music game, a memory game and an exciting catch game.

name: Spooky Zombies
summary: A funny platform game about zombies!!

name: SpellForce: Heroes & Magic
summary:
"Time for a new turn on the critically acclaimed SpellForce-Series. The epic fantasy saga is finally available on mobile devices, offering a whole new angle to the franchise. Leaving the story of its PC ancestors untouched and comes indeed 100%-story free, the Premium Game will offer turn-based strategy and tactics instead of real-time. 
 
CRAFT YOUR FANTASY EMPIRE 
Creating an own Kingdom turn by turn is the main goal in the 13-Mission long adventure mode or the free game, where you are facing your AI-opponents on randomly generated maps. Choose between the Dark Elves, the Orcs or Humans as playable races and ally or fight six neutral factions. Send your troops to conquer cities, to claim mines or farms and to search for treasure. 
 
EXPLORE NEW LANDS 
Your race’s hero will lead your army on their search for glory, treasures and valuable resources to exploit. Because your ever-expanding empire needs them to prosper. When you find new cities, you can muster new unique unitsand command them in any battle that lies ahead. 
 
BATTLE YOUR ENEMIES 
While your heroes explore the realms, you will meet your opponents on the battlefield and will exterminate them in simultaneous turn-based combats. Played out on hexagons, you’ll send Archers, Catapults, Knights or Dark Elf Necromancers against beasts & enemies like Spiders, Shadow Nightmares or Barbarian Berserkers. While you plan your actions, so does your enemy. When you both execute your plans, you’ll see who the better strategist is."

name: Splat!
summary: A one or two player shooter game published and developed by Williams, Inc. in 1982.

name: Space Cowboy
summary: Zaxxon inspired arcade game.

name: Space Betrayers
summary: A deduction game unlike any other. Experience a unique mix of card game, crisis management and backstabbing.

name: Splinterra
summary: Explore flying islands. Capture creatures. Use powerful spells. In this VR rpg.

name: Spider-Man: Toxic City
summary: Spider-Man: Toxic City is an action game based on the Ultimate Spider-Man comics set within the Ultimate universe.

name: Spirit Harem
summary: An erotic visual novel about sexy spirit girls!

name: Sprite Sequence Volume 1
