summary: "Spell Disk Survivor" is one of the game modes in "Spell Disk" where you survive against the endless waves of enemies. Craft overpowering builds using synergizing items and unlock new powers!

name: Sports Party Motion Sensing Fitness Game
summary: Embrace the fitness revolution! Workouts become fun games. Say goodbye to boring routines and hello to thrilling, sweat-filled adventures. Get fit and have fun! Join now!

name: Sports Pad Football
summary: Sports Pad Football is an American football game developed for the Sega Master System. It requires the Sports Pad. Otherwise, the game is exactly the same as Great Football.

name: Sprites
summary: This is an experimental horror game. The work tells about the hero's survival in a desolate town. Including the scarlet moon, ghosts traveling at night, surviving in a crisis-ridden town, the Jedi.

name: Space Flex
summary: "Space Flex" is a brand new shoot 'em up arcade. Play as Alan the alien and destroy as many enemies as you can! Collect bonuses, upgrades and test your skill.

name: Spaceship Carptain
summary: Solve a puzzle/mystery as a giant fish covered in worms!

name: Space Smash
summary: Inspired by classic Arcade games, Space Smash is a fast, addictive and retro shoot 'em up!

name: Space Rocks
summary: Space Rocks is an impressive blending of the classic arcade games Asteroids and Asteroids Deluxe, crafted for the Atari 2600 by Darrell Spice, Jr. If you're a fan of either arcade cabinet (or both!), you'll love Space Rocks! While Atari's version of Asteroids for the 2600 was passable at the time of its release, Space Rocks blasts far ahead of this early effort. Taking full advantage of the DPC+ mode in our Melody Board, Space Rocks pushes the Atari 2600 to its limits and offers a wide variety of gameplay options to keep you playing for years to come. The graphics, animations, and sound effects are well above what is typically experienced on the 2600.

name: Special Forces Strike: Tactical Swat Shooter
summary: Take on the role of a secret agent specializing in anti-terrorism operations in an exciting first person shooter!

name: Spiritual Soul
summary: A tactical strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 1998 for PC.

name: Speed Challenge: Jacques Villeneuve's Racing Vision
Spider Hero: Final Battle
summary:
Spider Hero: Final Battle - find out a truth about your past and determine the fate of the whole Galaxy! 
 
Amazing adventure is waiting for you! 
 
Your parents were scientists in a hidden secret laboratory. All truth about their life and experiments are hidden. It will not be so easy to solve this mystery, maybe there will be some criminal elements too. So, solve this case by analyzing all clues. Maybe you will find something new about yourself too. 
 
Find all hidden secrets of this story! 
 
Nobody knows what will happen at the end of this story. Dark force and good force will fight with each other for the fate of Universe. What is your role here? Maybe you will change your identity entirely, will find a new credo of your life. Don’t be afraid to start a new episode of the superhero adventure. Remember, there is no need to graduate a special academy to join super champions team. 
 
Be a hero and save the world! 
 
With our new game you will be able to enter the Universe of movie and comics heroes. Amazing quests, unlimited power of superhero, fighting for justice are waiting for you!

name: Spirit of Adventure
summary: "Spirit of Adventure" is a classical 2.5D dungeon crawl RPG game in which you'll take charge of a group of adventurers searching for the next callenge.

name: Space Ninja Simulator
summary: Its a Space Game Simulator but your also an Ninja. Oh, and you'll destroy thousands of asteroids with your ninja powers!

name: Space Pope
summary: A Catholicism-themed shooter created with Shoot-'Em-Up Construction Kit.

name: Spacetour Express
summary:
The Spacetour Express travel agency is here to provide the best destinations in the Milky Way.

Send tourists, scientists or military personnel to various planets, earn prestige, money and research tokens. But take care of your ships, as sending them to hostile planets may result in dramatic endings.

Oh also, try not to dissatisfy too many of your loyal customers, or else you might see some stowaways crawl up your ships...

name: Spl-t
summary:
We know. It doesn't look like much.
But we promise that it's a very good puzzle game.
Like, really good.

name: Splatter
summary: Oldschool topdown Shooter with advanced light/shadow effects and an evolving story in a Film Noir style. Shoot many monsters, use light to scare them off, upgrade your weapons, demolish everything around you, battle bosses and do side missions.

name: Spider Hunter
summary: Make new friends, but don't forget the old ones!

name: SpaceFront
summary: SpaceFront is a dynamic roguelike real-time strategy. Control Corgis and defend the galaxy from soviet invasion! No campaign will be the same thanks to procedurally generated maps, random artifacts, different units and abilities! Join the effort, join the SpaceFront!

name: Spacelords: Raiders of the Broken Planet - Alien Myths Campaign
summary: The Raiders explore the Broken Planet in search of the Protectors. With their help, Harec hopes to expel the human invaders. On their adventure, the Raiders will face cruel enemies, establish alliances and unravel the mystery of an antagonistic power that is conspiring against them from the shadows.

name: Space Games: Galaxy Attack
summary: A great galactic threat is looming, and only you can save humanity!

name: Space Frenzy
summary: Intense Arcade Style Gameplay, as you fight off wave after wave of ship fragments, that will form into cruisers to attack and destroy your ship. Doc with other ships after each wave to increase your firepower.

name: Spank It
summary: SPANK IT - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Space Theory
summary: "Space Theory" - a space top down shooter game. The player controls a spaceship and fights against space pirates, blows up enemy space stations and acquires upgrades at the end of each mission.

name: Space Frontier 2
summary: Colonize the Galaxy and upgrade your spaceships to fly further.

name: Spell Card Collection
summary: A Touhou Project fangame featuring 102 unique spell cards, created using the Danmakufu shooting game engine.

name: Spring of Decadence
summary:
The player can manipulate the heroine, and the player can train the character to decide the fate of the character.
There are hundreds of events and dozens of CG can be collected.
This game has a very unique story and a world with high degree of freedom.

name: Spellcasting 101: Sorcerers get all the Girls
Spiderling
summary: Spiderling is an exploration platformer made as part of Stencyl Jam 2014 about a young spider trying to escape with its friend before a war between their species starts.

name: Space Impact Evolution
summary: The first Space impact game to be released on the Symbian S60 platform for the Nokia 7650 smartphone. Was released as an app that was available to download from the Nokia website.

name: Splatter World
summary: A cancelled RPG based on the Splatterhouse franchise.

name: Spider-Man 3: High-Rise Hysteria
summary: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Space Mergers
summary: Space Mergers is a satisfying fast-paced puzzle game that encourages critical thinking. Combine blocks to create combos and gain points, reach the highest score you can! There is over a million different ways to play, enjoy some endless fun.

name: Space Duty
summary: A short and comical sci-fi story that takes place aboard a small space station in a somewhat strange universe. You have been drafted and shipped to a system on the fringe of colonized space, to make things worse, you have had an AI chip implanted into your head and your memory has failed. Your only desire and purpose is to get off the station.

name: Space Raiders in Space + Clumsy Rush
summary: An alien hivemind sets out to destroy humanity. Protect your crew from giant bug creatures and assist them on their mission. Discover the truth about the alien invasion.. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: SpongeBob Diner Dash 2: Two Times the Trouble
summary: Developed and published by PlayFirst in 2007 for PC, this time management game has players help SpongeBob and friends save their favorite restaurants from Sharkey Two-Times, who plans to open a casino in Bikini Bottom. The game features new characters, challenges, power-ups, and restaurants while maintaining the classic Diner Dash gameplay style.

name: Space Dance Harmony
summary: Space Dance Harmony is a VR dance rhythm game where you replicate real dance choreographies with your entire body to play. Immersed in breathtaking environments shaped by the sound and aesthetics of popular dance music, Space Dance Harmony is your space to get free and to dance.

name: Space Legends: At the Edge of the Universe
summary: Some places are best left alone even if advances in space travel make visits to remote parts of the universe a possibility. See what's at the far end of the universe and plan your escape. A breathtakingly exciting expedition to a distant world ventures into uncharted territory - on a faraway planet, total destruction threatens ALL.

name: Space Ashes
summary: A ship is sent on space stations to burn swarming and unknown forms of vegetation.

name: Space Launcher
summary:
Space Launcher is an arcade video game by Nintendo that was surprisingly original (many of the games Nintendo made during the late '70s were clones of popular titles like Pong, Space Invaders and Breakout). The game is similar to Frogger, though is not a clone since it predates it by at least two years. The game takes place in space, and your goal is to maneuver around space objects and dodge oncoming enemy fire from the aliens that are stationed above. There are also treasures at the top, and your goal is to fly up, grab the treasure, and come soaring back down after which you must repeat it until all of the treasures have been scavenged.

The game's poster seems to be inspired slightly by the Star Wars films, which were very successful at the time of this game's release. Even the yellow font of this game's logo could be said to be based on Star Wars' logo.

name: Space Adventure: Escape from Siphilus 1b
summary: Space Adventure - Escape form Siphilus 1b is a point & click adventure with challenging puzzles, funny dialogues and beautiful graphics. It's a rather quiet, chilled game accompanied by a harmonious electronic sound.

name: Space Tek
summary: Space Tek, Command, Construct, Collect!Space Tek is an exciting free to play online starship combat game. Players build their dream ships out of a range of unique blocks, and tailor their ships. Then put the ships to the test alongside or against players and Ai in a multitude of gamemodes!

name: Space Fury: The Phantom Menace
summary: Tear up your enemies using various power-ups and weapons in this old-school debut project "07natuskare".

name: SpaceBeaver
summary: SpaceBeaver is unusual 2d-action in a circular room. You're playing as SpaceBeaver, who must defend his SpaceDam from evil aliens. Use your weapons and four powerful abilities to show enemies what's what and save the world… SpaceBeaver.

name: Spacious Snake
summary: An abstract puzzle game about a snake. The snake must fill all tiles of each level to proceed, with obstacles making it increasingly difficult.

name: Space Vikings
summary: You are flying through the endless space in search for other space ships and planets which you can loot in order to buy troops, weapons and tanks.

name: Spot the Differences!
summary: Find all of the differences!

name: SpaceGeon
summary: SpaceGeon is a 2D colourfull shooter-rogulike game that supports users' modifications. Fight your way from Space Dungeon and return home!

name: Space Mercenary Shooter : Episode 1
summary: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic indie FPS inspired by shooter games from the early 2000's. Featuring hand crafted levels and a fully voice acted cast of characters.

name: Sphera Turris
summary: Sphera Turris is a timed rotating platformer where you guide a ball past an array of increasingly difficult obstacles to the top of a tower.

name: Spellcastia
summary: Spellcastia is a magical shooter designed specifically for VR. Its main feature is the use of active gesticulation to invoke a spell, so you get a deeper dive into the virtual reality and the world where magic rules.

name: Space Rangers 2: Reboot
summary:
It's an official remake of the "Space Rangers 2: Dominators".

This edition contains the original "Space Rangers" (2002) and the improved version of the "Space Rangers 2: Dominators" (2004). Among the new features are new game modes, new spaceship screen, new spaceship types, new equipment with additional characteristics, new text quests and new maps.

This edition also contains a lot of fan art - mini-games, pictures, wallpapers and screensavers. Many "Space Rangers" fans from the official game forum actively contributed to this remake - they created maps, wrote quests and tested the game.

name: SpeedingRoad
summary: Welcome to the world of straight highway speeding.

name: SpaceMerc
summary: SpaceMerc is a casual narrative bullet hell shooter about one pilot's quest to get paid by blowing stuff up. There's also an intergalactic war or something going on too.

name: Spider-Robots War
summary: This is a strategy game against artificial intelligence, in the style of science fiction

name: Spicy Deck
summary: Spicy Deck is a highly lewd strip tease and card combat game. Undress and get naughty with the girls as you win matches.

name: Spider Tanks
summary: Spider Tanks is a PVP Brawler. Players choose between a number of Tank Bodies and Weapons in the garage, then battle it out in one of the many Spider Tanks arena maps. Spider Tanks is free to play, but also incorporates a variety of play-to-earn mechanics, centering around skill-based competition, resource collection, and a player-driven upgrade cycle. Whether you want to play with a small group of close friends, or test your skill in high-stakes competition, Spider Tanks will be the worldwide play-to-earn esport for you. Purchase fully tradable Weapons, Tanks and Bodies in the Spider Tanks store for advantages to the upgrade cycle, rarity head starts and more.

name: Space Lords
summary: Space Lords is a video game released in arcades by Atari Games in 1992. It is a first-person perspective space combat video game which allows the player to fly in any direction.

name: Spyrazoid
summary:
Spyrazoid is a casual game for those who love a tricky yet beautiful puzzle. 480 pre-set boards and infinite randomly-generated boards provide endless possible gameplay, from easy to extra-hard.

Includes a Puzzle mode, Spinner mode, Bundle mode, and math-based Crypto mode.

name: Space CleanUp: Cosmic Robot Disinfector
summary: Fight cosmic grime with your trusty robot disinfector!

name: Space Wrangler
summary: Space Wrangler is a dynamic space sandbox featuring multiple experiences designed to offer variety in gameplay. Experience the wonders and turmoil of Space as you traverse the cosmos as part of a new generation of explorers, frontiersmen, and cowboys.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Invasion of the Lava King
summary: SpongeBob must fend off the Lava King's invasion in this top-down adventure game!

name: Spiritfarer: Jackie & Daria Update
summary: The Jackie & Daria Update adds two new characters, Jackie & Daria, as well as a brand new island to the game.

name: Spells of Gold
summary: Spells of Gold is a medieval RPG that focuses heavily on trade and intercity commerce.

name: SpaceShips
summary: A tense exciting space battleship shooting game, as the battleship pilot to create their own exclusive battleship.Down with the evil Martians.

name: Sparkle Piglet
summary: The adventure starts at The Lost Farm where you will be immersed into a unique world full of danger, puzzles, and mystery. Your enemies will do anything to stand in your way, but can they really stop you? Be smarter, faster, and better, and they won't have a chance against you.

name: Spatium Inter Nos
summary: 2.5D Space co-op adventure with platform and puzzle (in development).

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Bundle
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom - Rehydrated: Are you ready, kids? The cult classic is back, faithfully remade in spongetastic splendor!

name: Space Hulk: Ascension - Salamanders
summary: The Salamanders are the latest addition to Space Hulk Ascension with focus on fire and flame. This expansion also adds a new campaign playable for all existing chapters.

name: Spellfast
summary: A real time competitive PvP word game

name: Spellfire Odyssey
summary: Spellfire Odyssey is a multiplayer strategy game featuring PVP battles using spell casting. With a unique spell-making mechanic, adding strategy and creativity to gameplay. It offers fast-paced battles with various spell combinations for players of all skill levels.

name: Space Impact
summary: Space Impact is a shoot 'em up mobile game that was published by Nokia.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Complete Edition
summary: This bundle includes two new characters - an adorable dragon and a super-sweet red panda.

name: Space Ranger: First Meet
summary: Space Ranger: First Meet... is a short first-person shooter. In this game, you have to fight your way through hordes of robots in search of a safe place. You will use the environment to overcome obstacles and find a way out.

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 3 Player Cooperation Edition
Spear Song
summary: Add to the vishlist now! Spear Song is a turn-based tactic inspired by Slavic folklore, where turn-based tactics are combined with juicy and memorable graphics. Take the leadership of a small squad into your own hands and crush the most ferocious hordes of evil spirits and their mighty leaders!

name: Space Gladiator
summary: Retro top-down shooting game, you will control different kinds of the fighters in a unique way, soar in dangerous space, perform excellent skills, get loots, upgrade arms and achieve the highest score!

name: SpellTanks
summary: Spelltanks is an Action Roguelike where you play as a tank and have complete control over your gun. You can customize it with spells you find inside the dungeons and spells you salvage from enemies. Create your own custom combinations and try to clear the dungeon.

name: Spider-Man
summary: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Splash Jump
summary: Splash Jump - miniature arcade clicker game about jumping on platforms . Each click is a jump. Your task is to jumping and recruit points.

name: Spellzone
summary:
Spellzone is an RPG where the player controls a team of heroes who explore Tulneau Island. While this game uses a standard turn-based battle system, some tactical approaches may be required in order to defeat enemies.

Most in-game action takes place in the forest areas of Tulneau island, but you will also travel through deep underground passages, mines, rural areas, and cities.

name: Spider-Man: Friend or Foe
summary:
DS version of Spider-Man: Friend or Foe.
In this game, the player can use two characters in 3D levels from a roster of both heroes and villains.

name: Spar
summary: This hack changes the human fighters to resemble goblins, and replaces the city street setting with a forest setting.

name: Split the Ball
summary:
Split the Ball is puzzle game where player test their reflex through a series of obstacles at high speed. Manipulate the ball through various obstacles in each puzzle level using action like splitting, merging, shrinking, phasing, etc.
Challenge yourself through 80 levels across 4 level pack themes, daily puzzle and endless arcade. Are you fast enough to navigate the ball through each obstacle?

name: Spirit Rover
summary: Send instructions to Spirit – a lonely rover stranded on Mars. A game created in three days for the xkcd game jam. Inspired by this comic.

name: Speed Blazers
summary:
Equipped with sonic particle blades (SPB) you are able to glide, dash, and jump incredible heights and perform heart pounding tricks in gorgeous 3D environments. 
Outwit your opponents and manoeuvre through fast paced tracks with challenging 3D obstacles and pave your way through to victory.

name: Space Bar at the End of the Galaxy
summary: Space Bar at the End of the Galaxy is a Heist Comedy Space Opera Visual Novel where you play as Captain Leo Mancini, a tenacious and charming Space Pirate always looking for the next big heist.

name: Space Age: A Cosmic Adventure
summary: Space Age is a graphic adventure in the vein of 1990s classics, reimagined for the new millennium and its amazing mobile devices. Told in grand cinematic style, orchestrally scored, filled with drama, humor, and nostalgia, Space Age is a golden-age science-fiction story come to immersive life.

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
Spaghet
summary: Very few can resist the temptation of a warm plate of Spaghet... nor can you. You settle down, ready to sink your hands into that stringy goodness, but there's a problem: That's not your Spaghet. This isn't even your house, and the current residents don't appreciate having their food slapped around.

name: Spacecats with Lasers VR
summary: Spacecats with lasers VR is a wave shooter where you can prove to be the su-purr-rior feline in the galaxy by destroying not so claw-ver rat enemies with your mighty lasers! Customize your spacecat and choose perks to improve it as you get to harder waves. Did you ever want to have a cat dressed as a unicorn on top of a burrito shooting explosive and chain-lightning lasers at evil rodents? Then this just might be your game!

name: Sparky's Hunt
summary: A creature called Sparky is invading your town looking for something and your house is next. Can you fight her off before she catches you? Try to survive the week without getting caught and solve the mystery to why she is targeting you.

name: Spider Bounce
summary: Based on a simple idea, this game takes you on a journey of colorful fly hunting. You move your spider left to right and press down to dash, it is that simple. Spider Bounce builds on this idea through a variety of mechanics including upgrades and different game modes.

name: Spirit Riding Free: Ride Along Adventure
summary: Join Lucky and her friends on an interactive mission to save Maricela’s beloved mare from greedy horse thieves who've taken her captive with a wild herd.

name: Sparkling Corner
summary: A four-player racing game by Sega. The four cars race along the screen in a side view, with collisions between them causing them to slow down. The winner is the car which has travelled the furthest during the allotted time.

name: Spooked Hide & Seek
summary: Spooked is a crazy hide & seek game in a huge magical castle with up to 10 hiders playing against one dangerous seeker. Maybe you will be sneaky enough to complete all the tasks and get out of the mysterious castle or enough determined to hunt everyone else down

name: Spectral Ascension
summary: Spectral Ascension is a fast paced battle royale taking place in the spirit realm. Take part in 4 short rounds of non-stop brawling. Gain points through eliminating your foes and be the last one standing. Use those points to upgrade your abilities and further your rampage.

name: Sports Trivia
summary: Sports Trivia combines football management with a sports quiz. In order for the player to win a football match, a careful strategy must be chosen, then the player must answer some sport-related questions in a limited. More correct answers will allow the player's team more yardage across the field for a higher chance of scoring. This particular version of the game is not fully understood - it is thought to have only been distributed as a pack-in with Game Gear consoles. A separate, updated version exists in the form of Sports Trivia: Championship Edition.

name: Space Vulture
summary: Space Vulture is game #7 for the Arcadia 2001 collection of systems.

name: Space Cadet
summary: A previously unreleased game developed in 1984, Space Cadet later appeared in Game Room on the Xbox Live Arcade.

name: Space Attack
summary: Space Attack is game #2 for the Arcadia 2001 collection of systems and is a clone of the Arcade game "Galaxian"

name: Spider Solitaire Black
summary: Classic Solo play card game "Spider Solitaire" has been arranged in cool style! 300 stages in Stage mode, and also Random mode is playable! At Random mode, Your play recode such as time and clear rate will be recorded in details per difficulty levels. At Stage mode, 300 stages in different difficulty levels are available. Let's challenge Hard mode if you naver try! Resume is possible during the game that takes time. You can play whenever wherever continually. Let's challenge to clear the Hard stage game as well!

name: Space War 2000
summary: As a space knight, you will vie for glory, honor, fame and fortune in this one- or two-player first-person perspective 3D jousting adventure. Procure multiple weapons anhd cool defensive items in your quest to rank with other valiant knights on the High Score Table.

name: Spring Bonus
summary: Spring is in the air! Journey through the beautiful Spring countryside with the Easter Bunny in this adorable match-3. It's bursting with bonuses and fun for all the family.

name: Speed Up
summary:
Speed Up. Feel the speed. Doge the lasers. Collect the speed boosts.
Speed Up even more! Experience the rush. Enjoy the thrill. Master the almost impossible.

name: Space Lint
summary: Inventory management game set in space. Loot items, craft and repair to survive!

name: Space BloX
summary: Space BloX is a retro themed game where you will guide a spaceship through a randomly generated barrage of BloX. Nobody really knows what they are, but don't hit into them!

name: Spellwheel
summary: Combine runes and sling spells with a magic wheel to defeat goblins, knights, and killer robots. Experiment with magical runes, fight quirky enemies, and defy the will of Death itself, all to rescue your beloved.

name: Spectro
summary: Designed exclusively for VR, Spectro is a ghost hunting action game with roguelike elements. There are infinite haunted levels to explore, chests full of gear to unlock, and hidden totems to find.

name: Spellarium 4
summary: Help Eric build the Tree of Life by playing Match 3 levels as well as some additional bonus games: Spot the Difference, Hidden object scenes, Mahjong, and Solitaire!

name: Space Chimps
summary: Space Chimps is based off of the 2008 movie with the same name.

name: Sprawl 96
summary: Sprawl 96 adds enemies and gameplay from the 2023 game Sprawl into the original Quake.

name: Space Operation
summary: In2XXX,alien civilizations gradually came to the earth's clouds and outer space began to invade the earth. In order to counterattack,mankind will launch two space combat spaceships that have been developed for many years. Can the two pilots driving the combat spacecraft repel the aliens civilization

name: Space Eggs
summary: A single screen shoot'em up, similar to Space Invaders, written by Nasir Gebelli and published by Sirius Software for the Apple II and Atari 8-bit platforms.

name: Space Gardener
summary: a game about gardening in space

name: Sprung
summary: Sprung puts players in the shoes of either Becky or Brett in a conversation-based visual novel that mostly consists of dialogue. Sprung can be regarded as a dating sim, though the linearity and variety in the game (as well as its humor) also lend it to being an adventure game. The game was one of the first dating simulation games to have a wide commercial release in North America.

name: Speakrit
summary: Introducing the world's first Speakrit combat game! Generate customized spirits using advanced technology, and experience high-level bluff combat! Collect creativity energy, and unlock new levels of evolution in your own speakrit adventure!

name: Space Max
summary:
Destination: Earth. Gas-engine: ON.
Get ready for a noisy takeoff! Help Max the Astronaut Monkey get back home with his high-tech jetpack, famously powered by eco-friendly flatulent energy. Rip through space thanks to this powerful yet all-natural gas that lets you fly higher and higher!
After a crash landing on planet Cowa-426, our brave hero discovered that the only way to get home was through the power of flatulence. Help him collect scrap metal to build powerful space suits. Careful though! The journey through space isn’t exactly a piece of cake (or cut of cheese…)! Watch out for space cows, asteroids, and other silent but deadly perils of the universe.

name: Spellirium
summary: A word-spelling game inside a classic graphic adventure game.

name: Special Force
summary: A 2003 first-person shooter produced by the Central Internet Bureau of Hezbollah, a Lebanese Islamist militant group. The game recreates battles from the South Lebanon conflict between Hezbollah and Israel, with the player assuming the role of a Hezbollah fighter tasked with defeating Israeli soldiers.

name: Spin Time
summary: Learn what it truly means to spin in this indie clicker game by Dumb Video Game Stuff. Spin Time is a short relaxed comedic experience where all you do is press a button. Your mission? To help the world's greatest spinner, Horst, in his quest to achieve maximum spin.

name: Spina the Bee
summary:
An unreleased Intellivision title from 1983

Summer time and there is need to pollinate the roses and sunflowers! You have been ordered by the queen of the hive to collect pollen. Careful on your journey though. You will have to brave a harsh environment that contains spiders, dragon flies, water puddles and rain drops. Succeed and you will return to the bee hive to collect your reward and rating by the queen.

name: SparkMutts
summary: Explore a Massive procedurally generated Steampunk world full of smart Dogs. Meet Villagers, Brave dangers in procedural Dungeons, Buy or build your home, Craft Innovative Gadgets and explore vast biomes with fantastical mechanical Beasts on this Brass Filled Adventure.

name: Spectra
summary: advanced drawing software

name: Spaceball Revolution
summary: No info

name: Space Station Defender
summary: Defeat enemies and get parts! Build your own spaceship!

name: Sphinx Lowering
summary: A Doom II mod.

name: Space Elevator Project
summary: A simulation sci-fi game where players take on the role of the project manager of a space elevator project. They will progressively achieve project phase goals and ultimately accomplish the ultimate goal of constructing a Mars colonization spacecraft.

name: Space Agent: 8 Artifacts
summary: Journey through time and space to get for mankind 8 artifacts that hide powerful knowledge. A fascinating story, various levels, many weapons and enemies – the grandiose adventures await you in the game!

name: Spiritus Vindicta
summary: Investigate haunted locations, collect evidence, and learn about dangerous ghosts in a spooky 2D ghost hunting experience.

name: Spirit & Stone
summary: A kingdom's open ended journey from a small village to a patchwork of bustling castles. Build your kingdom block by block. Explore the world, grow your industries, and watch your citizens thrive in your creations. Do it your way - there are no wrong choices.

name: Sports Illustrated for Kids: Baseball
summary: Sports Illustrated for Kids Baseball will combine extensive player development, player trading, team management and arcade-style play into a unified system of game play. Kids can assemble a team, name their team, choose a team uniform style and then train their players to make them better and advance through the leagues. Plus, two friends can link up their Game Boy Advances for hours of gaming fun - the only baseball game on the GBA that offers multiplayer capabilities!

name: Space Castle
summary: Space Strategy. A mix of tower hold games and role-playing action.

name: Space Impact+
summary: One of the sequels for the game Space Impact installed on Nokia 3300 series mobile phones. It was one of the pre-installed games on the Nokia 1100 series phones.

name: SpaceRace
summary: Futuristic 3d racing game where players compete to set the best time on visually striking tracks.

name: Spent Shells
summary: Spent Shells is a high score top-down shooter with roguelike-y randomized elements. Players dive in to an ever-changing dungeon to harvest a crystalized power source that will get them home. Fight through the dungeon using a variety of weapons, characters, upgrades, and your own skill!

name: Spirit Guide Crucible
summary: Enter the Crucible, a walled-in arena where you fight face-hugging spiders and blood-sucking worms, terrifying mechanised golems, bomb carrying grunts, and the ever present Summoners, which must be destroyed before the stream of enemies can be turned off and you can progress…and finally escape!

name: Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot
summary: Uncover cosmic conspiracies in "Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot," a Sci-Fi Mystery Point-and-Click Adventure with a twist of Yuri Dating Sim. Solve the murder, present your case to the incoming Marshal, and navigate your choices to unlock unexpected lesbian romances!

name: Space War Attack
summary: Space War Attack is a Simulation game, developed by Bit Town and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Spring Time
summary: Bikes, springs and racing!

name: Splittown
summary: Cold War has split the world in two. The Great Divide spans across the globe with an impenetrable wall between the two blocs. You are Leonard Nimby; stone-faced agent of IM5, hot on the trail of a shrink gun stolen from you by a villanous mayoral candidate on the eve of a fateful election.

name: Space Digger
summary: Can You Survive While Mining In Space?Space Digger is a challenging and action-packed space mining, action roguelike game!

name: Special Tactics
summary: ST brings the most intense, tactical-action experience to Steam. Select your custom loadout, plan out strategies and accomplish your objectives. Deep Campaign, Addictive Survival mode and unrivaled multiplayer including Squads (1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 2 vs 1)

name: Spectrum 6
summary: Mixing colors and assigning it to a certain place made the Spectrum6 a challenging yet fun experience. From combining 2 primary colors such as Red, Yellow and Blue, you can create any secondary colors like Orange, Green or Violet. A neutral color Black can also be created by combining all the primary colors.

name: Space Station Cargo Simulator
summary: SSCS is an indie arcade game with puzzle elements, where you take the role of a simple cargo sorter in a huge corporation. You will have to sort the cargo by weight, fragility and content.

name: Spaaace!
summary: 560 chars to land from outer space

name: Species: Artificial Life, Real Evolution
summary: Species: Artificial Life, Real Evolution is an evolution simulation with hands on interaction. It allows for direct changes to each creature as well as indirect and gradual environmental changes which affect the species and their evolution.

name: Specter Spelunker Shrinks
summary: Specter Spelunker Shrinks is about a platforming hero who will jump, grow, shrink, and whatever else it takes to make it back to his home on the moon.

name: Space Bee
summary:
Space Bees have attacked!
Hit! Aim for the beehive!

name: Speyarranoth
summary: Speyarranoth is a classic sci-fi space asteroid shooter in 3D. You control the game using WASD and shoot with the space key. It's wonderful to just blast full speed through the asteroid fields lasers ablaze and enjoy the explosive light show.

name: Space Station Continuum
summary: Space Station Continuum is a building & management sim inspired by the past, present, and future of humans in space.

name: Spider
summary: A platform game

name: Sp:In
summary:
Control the Nuggle’s spaceship with a single tap and collect the Light Energy needed to fight their biggest threat: a supermassive black hole that is slowly absorbing the Nuggle’s Planet.
But be careful, it may be harder than it seems! You will find many obstacles to overcome in your journey through space such as asteroids, deadly dust clouds or radioactive zones. Not everything is as it seems and you’ll need to hone your skills to master your spaceship’s speed and movements!

name: Spellbroken
summary: In a land where a city of zealots stands surrounded by wilderness, the Handlers patrol the frontier. Collie, a newly-minted squad leader, finds herself on a mission with her two squadmates to an abandoned building in the wilds. There, she reflects on her past in the face of her seemingly blessed role, and will face a fateful decision.

name: Spirit Animal Survival
summary:
SAS is a Open World Coop Multiplayer Game. 
Set in a vast environment that features building,crafting,taming,riding,flying and exploring wildlife, dinos and dragons as well as horrific creatures and instances with the ability to morph into Spirit Animals.

name: Speglar
summary: Frantic 4-player laser ricocheting top-down shooter. Keep it casual and enjoy the chaos, or master the surprisingly deep mechanics to obliterate your enemies. Duke it out locally in free-for-all or 2v2.

name: Space Bubble Cat
summary: An interactive comic about a lonely cat in a bubble floating through space.

name: Space Station Manager
summary: Space Station Manager is an exciting game where you own a space company, your main goal is to build a space station, make profit, grow your business, build an economical network, and expand beyond the solar system.

name: SperGatito Minigames
summary: A game with 5 mini-games to have fun made with Clickteam Fusion

name: Speed King 2
summary: Motorbike racing game

name: Spiki Game Box
summary: The Spiki Game Box is a collection of 4 combined role play games. Each one of them will lead you through it's own story, full of horror, drama, and comedy.

name: SpongeBob Squarepants: Idea Sponge
summary: This educational game gives kids an adventure with Spongebob Squarepants while teaching them mathematics, logic skills, creativity, life sciences, history and nautical trivia.

name: Spider-Man 3: The Goblin Strikes!
summary: A handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Space Launch Engineer
summary: The year is 2023, and you are a head of private space launch company. You are driven by the only ambition: to reach the stars. Build rockets from wide variety of components, improve them, study new technologies to forge more and more powerful spacecraft.

name: Spanish Rage
summary: Spanish Rage is a beat'em up that fuses the frenetic action of the arcade rooms with an aesthetic and a narrative never before exploited in the history of video games: the Quinqui cinema.

name: Space Slaves
summary: Space Slaves is a tactical space fighting game where an AI apocalypse destroys most of the human race, and the humans that survived are used by the AI as slaves to generate electricity by being placed in pleasure machines. Their emotions and pleasure are harvested by the AI to power their ships.

name: Special Courier
summary: Special things require special attitude!

name: Space Tanks
summary: Battle against multiple waves of enemy tanks that... IN SPACE!

name: Space Station 51
summary: You are a member of Space Station 51. When you wake up, you find that a zombie virus has broken out on the space station. You need to follow the command of the station master and take a series of actions.

name: Spirit
summary: Shape an empty island into a wacky ecosystem. The game puts you in the role as a stranded spirit, with the power to give and take life. Play trough the sandbox Free Mode, or 9 casual Adventure missions.

name: Space Loner Chronicle
summary: Sea Green is totally alone in space, and she like, loves it, of course!

name: Space Marshals 3
summary: Join the rowdy Space Marshal crew on their latest misadventure in outer space. Strap those boots on, gear up and get ready to hunt space crooks! This is a story driven action game with an emphasis on stealth and tactical combat.

name: Space War
summary: Space War is the first game released by Vectorbeam after its founders left Cinematronics. It is essentially a very close version of Cinematronic's Space Wars, which had in turn been brought to Cinematronics by Vectorbeam founder Larry Rosenthal as a prototype inspired by the 1962 PDP-1 game Spacewar.

name: Speed Into Dino Valley 2
summary: Kids use STEM skills like force and lift to help Blaze save Zeg

name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows
summary: The Wii port of the Spider-Man: Web of Shadows. It is a full-3D action game based on the version for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3, Wii, and Xbox 360.

name: Space Flowers
summary: Space Flowers is an intra-galactic tradewars game. Buy and sell flowers as you upgrade your spaceship and explore the galaxy, locating lost family members along the way. Fight off an evil extra-galactic empire when you are ready. Great fun for all ages!

name: Space Redemption
summary: Space Redemption is a 2D shooter in which the protagonist is assigned the role of the savior of mankind!

name: Speak of the Devil I: A Deathly Proposition
summary: Experience the impact of making a pact with a demon in this linear visual novel, where the consequences can be life-changing in an instant. Michi, the main character, has the chance to pursue a romantic relationship with any of the female characters, including the demon he made a deal with.

name: Space Revenge
summary: Space Revenge is an action-exploration game. With a top down perspective, twin stick controls and a sci-fi mood to explore the enemy base full of dangers. Embark in this adventure and hunt down the responsible of your fathers dead. The only way is REVENGE!

name: Spin & Roll
summary: Spin, roll and launch your way to victory in this action puzzle game designed to test your reflexes, skillful movement and watchful eye!

name: Spin Rhythm XD: Monstercat
summary: A hand-picked collection of 10 classic Monstercat tunes including nostalgic beats and some hidden gems.

name: Space of Another Reality
summary: This is a virtual exhibition game. Players navigate the exhibition space from a first-person perspective reminiscent of an FPS game. The virtual exhibition space is divided into several small exhibition sectors. Each sector displays its independent virtual installation.

name: Space Strike
summary: Space Strike is a commercial Space Invaders clone.

name: Sport Clubs Collection
summary: Introducing the Sport Clubs Collection: Immerse yourself in the thrill of precision and skill with our exclusive 3-in-1 Games Bundle, featuring Archery Club, Darts Club, and Baseball Club – the perfect fusion of classic sports in one exhilarating pa

name: Space Badminton VR
summary: Space Badminton is the worlds first VR Badminton simulation. It will test your true badminton skills against a sophisticated and skilled artificially intelligent space robot. You will fight against the AI robot to become the badminton champion. Space Badminton takes place in the deep space, where you are given the power to defy GRAVITY by the power of jet boosters. Use this to your advantage in defeating the AI robot. Good Luck !!!

name: Spot It! Challenge
summary: Spot It! Challenge is a DSiWare hidden objects game.

name: Spitting Image
summary: Political farce in a fighting game based on the British telly program.

name: Speedway Ringer
summary: Speedway Ringer is a top-down racer inspired by American stock car oval racing and the real-life challenges of Motorsports. Drivers will need a balance of aggression and patience to perfect their technique and succeed in a chaotic online multiplayer environment.

name: SpearHeads
summary: Spear your friends in this 4-player 2D spear-throwing arena deathmatch! Players will compete by collecting various spears and taking aim to throw them at your enemies until only one player or team-colour is left standing.

name: SpeedColor
summary:
SpeedColor will test your mental agility and quick eye-hand coordination. You'll have less than a second to tap the indicated color, and only one chance to do it.

SpeedColor is as frenetically addictive as it is ridiculously hard to beat.

For many, one of the most difficult games. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Spacebus
summary: Spacebus is a single player scifi rogue-lite that allows you to take control of an overworked mechanic on one of the galaxy's oldest and least-maintained means of transportation: the Spacebus. Keep the engines running and help deliver passengers safely to their destination!

name: Space Hulk: Ascension - Successor Chapter Pack
summary: This DLC adds 4 successor chapters to the game: Novamarines, Crimson Fists, Angels of Redemption and Flesh Tearers. Each of these are fully playable as separate chapter option in the game with identical traits as their parent chapter.

name: Space Chicks
summary: A mobile endless runner in which the hero is tasked with saving stranded "Space Chicks" on micro-planets. Gravity pull from each planet alters the protagonist's movement.

name: Splinterlands
summary: Splinterlands is a unique digital trading card game that allows players to truly own their cards and other in-game assets. Thanks to web 3.0 technology powered by the HIVE blockchain, each card in Splinterlands is a non-fungible token owned by a player. That means that players can do anything they want with their cards, including battling for rewards, holding as collectibles, trading on the peer-to-peer market, combining to level up, or even burning to obtain Dark Energy Crystals, the official in-game cryptocurrency of Splinterlands.

name: Spell Sweeper
summary: Spell Sweeper is a puzzle game which based on "Minesweeper". Fight against enemy by Opening/placing flags to squares.

name: Space Avenger: Empire of Nexx
summary: Space Avenger is super fast paced top down arena shooter with multiple ships and tons of upgrading options that will help you in your war against the Empire of Nexx. Traverse intense battles across multiple worlds as you attempt to push the Nexx back and save your people!

name: Space Invaders: Virtual Collection
summary: Attention all Earthlings! Relentless alien hordes have been identified near you. Prevent the dangerous Space Invaders from landing on your territory. Use your cannon to defend against waves of descending alien invaders. Don't let them hit the ground or it's all over for you and the Earth! Destroy them and score points!

name: Spartacus: Born to be Free
summary: This game contains a set of puzzles themed gladiatorial fights of ancient Rome. Collect a picture from the parts at this level, and then unlock new levels and get access to new pictures. You are waiting for images of ammunition, battles in the arenas of gladiatorial fights.

name: Spellario
summary: Spellario - it's a new fantasy RPG clicker. Learn new spells, increase your DPS, fight with danger mobs on 8 different locations. Get the loot and gold, buy equipment in the shop or craft it yourself.

name: Speed Legends
summary: Speed Legends takes the mobile racing & car driving genre to a whole new level by adding an addictive career mode, a gigantic open world, unlimited car tuning, stunning graphics and the most realistic car physics ever on mobile.

name: Sport Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Spartan X 2
summary:
Slums, subways and a smugglers' ship lead Johnny to microchips and the evil Satine

The police are corrupt. The gangs are vicious. And an evil microdiip has turned a decent father into a mindless beast.

Young Johnny Thomas seardies alone for the distributors of the mind-bending microchips. From slum to subway to smugglers’ ship he follows a torturous path that leads to the ultimate battle with the evil Satine.

name: Spellfield
summary: Spellfield is a relaxing farming RPG set in an idyllic town. You can build up your farm, hone your skills, and explore a vibrant, mysterious world.

name: Space Race
summary: Space Race is the second arcade game created by Atari and was released in July, 1973. The two players each control a rocket ship; the object of the game is to make it from the bottom of the screen to the top, while avoiding obstacles such as asteroids. Score is kept electronically and the background consists of a simple starfield.

name: Space Invasion
summary: Destroy the waves of aliens before they descend to the surface and wipe out your ship.

name: Spell of Destruction
summary: A isometric action-adventure game with puzzle elements written by Steven Chapman that was originally released as Wizardry in Europe and Australia.

name: Space Cactus Canyon
summary:
The year is 2543. You are the last cactus on Earth.

You live in the scorching deserts of the Rocky Mountains in what used to be Alberta, Canada. The heat is nearly unbearable and wildfires are common. The rest of your fellow cacti have moved to a more temperate climate ... on Mars. They have sent a final spaceship to transport you there.

Reaching it won’t be easy. Water has become Earth’s most precious resource, and although you are a cactus, you need every drop. You’ll collect the water as you move through the canyons on your way to rendezvous with your rocket. Every so often, you’ll even find a bucket of water, and you’ll be able rest for the night.

But watch out for the humans. The few that remain after World War XII think they need the water even more than you. And they’ll do anything to protect it.

name: Speakerman 2
summary: Speakerman 2 is a 2D platforming adventure game with collect-a-thon elements. Find your adventure, talk to everyone, do quests (no markers or maps - you need to read!) and come to your own conclusions. Discover new areas and make new friends.

name: Space Block Buster
summary: Find your games asleep in your memories in the world of VR. Space Block Buster contains all the features of the game you used to enjoy in your childhood. Clear stages faster with higher points, using various blocks, rackets, and properties of the ball.

name: Spider-Man: The Video Game
summary:
Spider-Man: The Video Game, also known as Spider-Man, is a 1991 arcade video game developed by Sega based on the Marvel Comics character Spider-Man.

Spider-Man and his allies must retrieve a mystical artefact first from the Kingpin, then Doctor Doom.

name: Spidey & His Amazing Friends
summary: Go on adventures with Peter Parker, Miles Morales and Gwen Stacy with the Spidey Learning Watch! Hear Spidey say fun phrases and listen as the narrator guides you through games that focus on hand-eye coordination, counting, matching and more to complete crime-fighting adventures. Dodge Doc Ocks lasers to help Spidey get the stolen Energy Star back, count bubbles to blast Green Goblins glider, match patterns to find the missing scooter and choose the correct letter to catch Rhino. Digital clock faces feature Spidey and His Amazing Friends, and time tools include a stopwatch, timer, alarm and cuckoo clock. Go webs go!

name: SpinSling
summary: SpinSling is a wild fun and addictive game for mobile devices featuring over 20 playable critters and lots of costumes!

name: Split of Knight
summary: (Japanese cute RPG) She"Rose" left the Each village, her dear old home town, to travel around the world and headed for Titus to receive knighthood...

name: Spyglass Board Games
summary: Play with a friend on Xbox LIVE, or play against the computer. Use the Xbox Live Vision camera to personalize the game board, playing pieces, and video effects. Each game has custom pieces to choose from, such as a rook made of stone or a furry checkers piece. And you can customize the look with textures like marble, silver, and gel. Make each game your very own!

name: Spellweaver: Duke's Zombies Deck
summary: Duke's Zombies Deck (1 hero + 60 cards) - Swarm your opponent with endless hordes of zombies. Keep the pressure on by making them deadly with your Undead Necromancers, and if that isn't enough, you can always rely on Duke Harsford to raise them back and keep the party going.

name: Space Radiance
summary: Space Radiance it's arcade game with rpg system. Protect green glow against physical objects using a variety of improvements.

name: Space of Retaliation
summary: Inspired by viral sensation, Among Us, Space of Retaliation is a unique sci-fi gaming experience, high quality 3D graphics and First & Third-Person viewpoints. Players aim to repair the station with the goal of escaping. However, the only chance of survival in this game is to find the disguised spy.

name: Spider Solitaire Gold
summary: Spider Solitaire Gold contains several game modes of Spider Solitaire cards game.

name: Splatoon 2: Version 4.1.0
summary:
Version 4.1.0 is an update to Splatoon 2 that was released on 3 October 2018 at 02:00 UTC.

Changes:

Major content update:
New stage: Skipper Pavilion.
Four new main weapons.
One new sub weapon: the Fizzy Bomb.
One new special weapon: the Booyah Bomb.
Four new music tracks.
Balance adjustments for weapons.
Many adjustments and bug fixes.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants Saves the Krusty Krab
summary: Plankton has stolen all the Krusty Krab's Krabby Patties and littered them all over the ocean floor. Mr. Krabs is terrified. Can SpongeBob collect all the Krabby Patties before opening time and save the Krusty Krab?

name: Space Battle Arena
summary: Space fight arena is a retro arcade based arena shooter game that was modeled after legendary arcade games. This game retains the fun, addicting aspects of those arcade games while also adding on new, awesome features such as challenges, skins, and a world wide leaderboard.

name: Spidded
summary: Spidded - An arcade platformer in which the player acts as a spider that moves with its web, dodging a fly swatter and balancing on an unstable web.

name: Spacer Project
summary: " You are sent into space aboard your spaceship to eradicate any alien threat trying to invade the galaxy.... Facing waves of enemies drawing their strength from the genesis of video games, and armed with rudimentary weapons or slaloming in an asteroid field! Face the growing difficulty of Spacer Project.

name: Space Milkman: Tsuneo wa Uchuu no Gyuunyuuya-san
Speakeasy
summary: An isometric shoot 'em-up minigame set in an underground bar in 1930s Chicago. Speakeasy combines historical charm with edge-of-your-seat action for a gaming experience that’s as thrilling as it is unique.

name: Space Box Battle Arena
summary: Design and build your unique free-form spaceship and fight your enemies for victory in the Space Box! Machine guns, lasers, flamethrowers, harpoons, energy shields, black hole generators, and much more equipment to choose your game style! The exciting PvP sandbox battle arena awaits!

name: Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game
summary: Space Voyage is a puzzle game that doubles as a cinematic experience. Click and drag the given items, tools and teleporters to plan a perfect path for your spaceship to safely reach the end portal. Over 100 levels, colorblind assistance, no reading ability needed.

name: Sparky
summary: Help the robotic dog named Sparky complete the mission!

name: Space Rangers: Episode 46 - The Devil Within
summary:
You will play the part of special agent Yaz KreJonns of the Space Rangers, the organization that is called in when regular Star fleet is not enough.
This time something strange is happening on a mining planetoid. The miners has gone missing.. and then the team of soldiers sent in to find them.
In a galaxy near you, you are to boldly go where no one else dares.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Model Sponge
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants Model Sponge is a learning game geared towards children aged 5-7 released for the V.Reader. It is based on the episode with the same name.

name: Splashy Cube
summary: FEATURES: • lots of colorful levels; • simple gameplay; • cute graphics; • unlockable skins! • highscores! ABOUT THE GAME: Have you ever wondered how it's like to be a cube with a sweet tooth for blobs with the same color as you and allergic to blobs in different colors? Now you have a chance to find out! Splashy Cube is a simple puzzle game, where you travel through a series of colorful labyrinths. Avoid blobs in any other color than you, pointy spikes and falling down the abyss. Eat as many tasty blobs to gain points and lead on the scoreboard. Let yourself sink into this surreal world and complete "just one more" level!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Defending the Secret Formula
summary: Join SpongeBob for learning fun as he defends Krusty Krab's secret formula for the Krabby Patty in five exciting learning activities!

name: Space Lift Danger Panic!
summary:
This new Directors Cut version features 32Bit graphics, sound and a completely new game mode, more than doubling the content found in the original. Space Lift Danger Panic! is sure to surprise you!

The Ceranthians have become sentient. Aware of their predicament as people trapped within a video game, where will their disillusionment end?

name: SPQR: Crime Stories in Ancient Rome
summary: SPQR is a mystery thriller drama about a PTSD ridden legionary turned detective, whose cases lead him spiraling deeper into a web of deceit, corruption, and murder when he unmasks a powerful cult with a plan to destroy the republic.

name: SpectrumGames
summary: The good old Mafia in a virtual space, as close to the offline version. Become a host, invite players and build the game atmosphere as in real life! Or find an open room to join as a player.

name: Spoils of Plunder
summary: Spoils of Plunder is a hardcore action RPG with PvP, co-op and single player modes. It features novel combat and spell mechanics that set it aside from the rest of the genre. Spoils of Plunder is a game where skill matters.

name: SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip
summary: Nintendo DS port of SpongeBob's Surf & Skate Roadtrip.

name: Spin Puzzle
summary: A casual and amusing puzzle that consists of spinning the pieces to correctly assemble the pictures. Be quick and arrange all the pieces before the time runs out.

name: SpikeOut: Digital Battle Online
summary: Spikeout: Digital Battle Online is a 3D beat 'em up video game developed by Sega-AM4 and published by Sega in 1998. An update, Spikeout: Final Edition, was released in 1999.

name: Spy Story: The Elusive Evidence
summary: Explore the delightful world! Solve the most spy layouts you've ever seen!

name: Space Rage
summary: More than just a game, Can you collect all the cubes?

name: Spy Against Spy
summary: Spy Against Spy is a bootleg of Spy vs. Spy programmed for the Dragon 32/64.

name: SpikeOut: Final Edition
summary: Spikeout: Final Edition is the 1999 update for Spikeout: Digital Battle Online, and the second in the Spikeout series of arcade games. It replaces the game's attract sequence, balances out the characters, adds 2 new stages and bonus stages, and adds a cutscene explaining the backstory of the game's villain Mikhael.

name: Speed Heroes
summary: Speed Heroes - Addictive, simple and a hard, fun , fantastic feeling!

name: Sprocket Junkie
summary: Sprocket Junkie is based on the 1996 classic Rocket Jockey. This vehicular combat game features grapple hooks mounted on rocket engines, a unique cast of characters, traps and power ups.

name: Space Leprechaun
summary: We invite you, go to the most introspective adventure with the cosmic leprechaun. Collect colors, dodging obstacles, defeat bosses. Immerse yourself in the pixel world of childhood.

name: Spellrune: Realm of Portals
summary: Spellrune is a singleplayer collectible card game with rogue-like and role-playing elements set in a fantasy world. Take the role of a wizard apprentice, build a powerful spell deck, defeat hordes of creatures and collect magic artifacts.

name: Sprinkler & Ghost
summary: A Survival game where you must dodge the ghost and been shot from the sprinkler!

name: Spring World
summary: Nature Clan: Spring World, otherwise simply known as Spring World, is a game in the Nature Clan series. It was designed for inclusion on plug'n'plays, and its hardware is based on VT02/Famicom.

name: Spyer
summary: Denny, a government spy, is assigned to investigate a remote area where there is supposed to be a terrorist group. Upon arriving at the scene, Denny comes across several armed individuals, and finds possibly the largest base of the terrorist group.

name: Spirit Level
summary: Jump, twirl, and flip your way around this spooky castle! Unlock doors and find your way through this haunted land. Collect all your lost spirit buds, and unlock the mystery of the tower.

name: Sprint Racer
summary: Let's go racing and put the pedal to the metal - super fun 2D F1 car racing!

name: S.P.A.T.
summary: You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.). Solve challenging problems with unknown monsters in the dark corners of the earth.

name: Spellarium 5
summary: This Spellarium introduces several changes to the Match3 game mechanics, one of which is the Toggle Button. Also it includes some skippable bonus games such as Solitaire, Mahjong, Spot the Difference, and Hidden Objects. Of course, there's also a story to follow and a town to build!

name: Spy Girls: Undercover Agent
summary:
Drafted into the nation's spy network from a young age, you've never known anything outside the world of espionage. Alongside your fellow operatives, Mischa and Erina, you’re tasked with keeping the country safe and eliminating threats.

But with rival organizations closing in, and after a chance meeting with a famous singer with a dangerous secret, the pressure is on.

With lies and deception at every turn, it can be easy to forget who your friends are, but with the fate of the country in your hands, you can’t afford to lose!

name: Spectral Synergy
summary: Embark on a dual-realm RPG odyssey in "Spectral Synergy" Master blade and magic, solve puzzles, and unravel a tale of balance between light and dark. Every choice alters your path in this 3D action roguelike adventure.

name: Spectra Echo VR
summary: Immerse yourself in this surreal world of Spectra Echo VR, and embark on a unique music visualization journey. Play your own music within the game and watch as the environment and particles dance to the rhythm of your tunes. Unwind and revel in this captivating audiovisual extravaganza!

name: Spin Quest: A Slot Adventure
summary: Experience a unique mix of RPG and slot games!

name: Space Haste 2
summary: Space Haste II is an adrenaline pumping, futuristic racing game that puts players in the driver’s seat of the hottest hovercrafts on the planet.

name: Spirit Possession
summary: A 2D horizontal platform game that transforms into an enemy and solves puzzles.

name: Spermination: Cream of the Crop
summary: You may have beaten off others and came first a thousand times, but you've never tasted the sweet Cream of the Crop. This sequel is harder, faster and will blow your crusty socks off! Choose from 3 difficult leagues: Hand, Mouth and the coveted Cream Pie! Crack the egg & unlock your bundle of joy!

name: Split Apart
summary: A retro survival horror game about envy. There's an unrelenting stench of mold and hostility permeating the stale air of this place. You need to find a way out, by any means necessary.

name: Space Invaders
summary: A fan made version of Space Invaders free to play in your web browser.

name: Spooky Town
summary: Spooky Town is a top-down corner Roguelike spell building game that utilizes various spells to create unimaginable spell effects, with ultra high degrees of freedom even for developers.

name: Space Leaper: Reboot
summary:
A rich roguelike experience with lots of strategic team options!
Simple placement gameplay combined with a deeply strategic system that includes type advantages and character skill combos. Assemble your strongest, cutest team and conquer the stars to rebuild your home!

name: Sprinkle Islands
summary:
Titan burns again - Award-winning water puzzler Sprinkle is back in a new shape!

In a not so distant future, a garbage hauling space ship from Earth gets on the wrong course and burning trash is scattered over the beautiful islands of Titan. Help the Titans as used car tyres and soda cans set their villages on fire!

Using intuitive touch controls you control a tiny firetruck, but since the fires are sometimes hard to reach, you need to use obstacles, buttons and elevators to put them out. Your water supply is limited - earn drops by conserving water!

* Five distinct islands with a total of 60 levels provide hours of challenging entertainment.

* Amazing water physics - The original Sprinkle set a new standard for water in games. Sprinkle Islands improves on that with endless oceans, pools and floating objects.

* Easy controls, challenging gameplay!

The original Sprinkle game has been enjoyed by more than eight million people. Join the fun in this improved version!

name: Space Pizza
summary: Satisfy all your space ship punching needs.

name: Spikey Walls
summary: Spikey Walls is a game where players avoid falling into spikes by tapping the a-button.

name: Speed Guess: Something
summary:
Draw, doodle, sketch and guess words with friends and make new friends. Speed Guess Something is a sequel toDraw Something, the most popular social drawing and guessing game, with many new fun features added.

While you can continue to draw and guess with friends and other players in a turn based game, we now introduce a brand new PvP challenge mode - ‘Speed Guess’. Play a real time PvP challenge with friends, to guess drawings and sketches correctly in the shortest time possible. Win a game and challenge other players to beat your best time. Challenge friends directly to a duel for the highest score in a guessing match.

name: Spacegirl 2038
summary: Spacegirl 2038 is a fast paced, high energy arcade style shooter. Save your sister and her crew, they're depending on you!

name: Spell Welders
summary: Play as 1 of 17 different welders in this strategic turn-based RPG! After you choose your spell, decide how you will cast it. Will it be fast? Accurate? Powerful? You've never had control like this before as you weld your way to victory!

name: Space Pixel Swarm
summary: Space Pixel Swarm is a free and simple strategy game where you are massively outnumbered. The enemy will expand quickly which leaves you with the option to either do the same or to fortify key worlds. With each world the enemy conquers or destroys, your own forces and economy will become stronger. Will you intentionally sacrifice your own planets to give your fleets an edge?

name: Sprite Man Adventures
summary: ​In this game you will run around chopping enemies, dashing into them, and shooting arrows. Pick up chests around the map to earn health, exp., and even coins! Will you be able to defeat the boss?!

name: SpringBack
summary: Linked by an ethereal elastic force, your two heroes must conquer and loop through four environments, in ever transforming levels. Use cleverly your main weakness as an unstoppable force and destroy your enemies with the help of your elastic link.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants Bubble Rush!
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants Bubble Rush! is an Action game, developed and published by Big Fish Games, which was released in 2006.

name: Spear Girl
summary: Spear Girl is a puzzle-adventure platformer where you use your special spear to explore a kingdom where adherents have subjugated the king and imprisoned him, taking the crown. Climb mountains, pass through cursed forests and dark caves to unravel the mysteries behind the power of the spear.

name: Speed Demons
summary: Speed Demons is the ultimate highway racing simulator, with breakneck speeds, amazing physics-based crashes, and the most intense TRAFFIC ever seen in a video game. Featuring hundreds of events, tons of varied vehicles, endless highways, and 8 gameplay modes, this is the top-down, physics-based racing game the world has been waiting for.

name: Spy vs. Spy 2
summary:
Spy vs. Spy: The Island Caper 
Spy vs. Spy: The Island Caper (also known as Spy vs. Spy II: The Island Caper)[8] introduced a side scrolling play area, which effectively allowed for a small number of very wide "rooms" (the action actually takes place outside, on a tropical island).[7] It also introduced the idea of traps being built from the sticks and coconuts on the island, meaning that each spy no longer started with a fixed number of traps, but must compete to acquire the raw materials necessary to build their traps. The spies must gather the three segments of a rocket and then dive into a sea where a submarine awaits them. However, only connected segments can be carried at any one time. The second installment also included more complex scenery and continued the dual-screen interface present in the first.[7] The game starts with the two players parachuting onto an island in search of a buried missile. As they search, players are able to build traps to slow their enemy's progress.[7] This game was going to come out on the NES in North America from Kemco but was scrapped because of poor sales of the first game on NES, but in 2009 reproductions of the game in cartridge form were released in both regular and black and white limited edition cartridges.

name: Space Train
summary: What if there was a train, in space? Embark as a simple passenger or take a longer-term role as a member of staff in an asymmetric gaming experience like no other.

name: Specimen 13
summary: In Specimen 13 you play as one of five survivors (or a traitor) who find themselves as unwilling subjects in an experiment set on a mysterious island. Alternatively, play as the Specimen and prevent the survivors from escaping through the underground elevator.

name: S-Project 66
summary: Survive this nightmare by hiding in your surroundings. Be discreet, because death will be final.

name: Spaced Liberation
summary: Spaced Liberation is a very small indie game about the liberation of a planet.

name: Sporty Games
summary: Fun and sport from your home! Your body is the controller, move to play alone or with friends!

name: Spiky Tower: A SpikeDislike Game
summary: Spiky Tower takes the SpikeDislike formula and flips it into a vertically ascending platformer.

name: SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest - Oktoberfest
summary: It’s Oktoberfest time! As Munich-based devs with a weakness for good beer and lederhosen, we couldn’t resist the opportunity to prepare a little something for you guys to mark the occasion. Enjoy this Free Oktoberfest DLC for SpellForce 3!

name: Spelling Blizzard
summary: Spelling Blizzard is an Educational game developed by Bright Star Technology and published by Sierra On-Line Inc in 1994.

name: Space Confetti
summary: Space Confetti is basically an optimization project that I decided to put together and make an asteroid clone of. The purpose was to try out some programming patterns like components, observers, and object pooling.

name: Spellgrimage
summary: Spellgrimage is a tactical RPG rogue lite, with gestion part. Choose your heroes, assign them skills, and set out to conquer an adventure full of mystery and danger.

name: Spin Doctor
summary:
How many levels can you survive in this addictive retro arcade game?
Can you swing your wand past a field of deadly spikes, fuses, and acid droplets to move to the next level?
As you progress, the field gets tougher and the levels get trickier. Have fun but STAY ALERT! Your wand never stops spinning as you fight towards the finish! Can you do it?

name: Space Gate Rush
summary:
In Gate Rush your mission is to land on all space Dock stations and then rush to Mothership’s gate. Do you have what it takes?
Earn in-game currency from landing on space Dock stations and going through the gate. Protect yourself from scary space monsters bent on destroying your beautiful spaceship! Invest the in-game currency in new space ships with more boost and power ups!
Easy to play but hard to master means you will be coming back again and again.

name: Spectre VR
summary: Spectre VR is a suspenseful, multiplayer horror game designed for Gear VR.

name: Spellshard: The Black Crown of Horgoth
summary:
After 1000 years of peace and prosperity, an ancient evil arises once again...

The land has been stricken with an evil curse and the eight Lords of Decay have returned to undo millenia of scientific progress...

In order to restore the lost technology, a group of young heroes have come forth to challenge the Lords of Decay and their daemonic hordes...

name: Spy Muppets: License to Croak
summary: Spy Muppets: License to Croak is a story-driven activity based game where the player is the best secret agent on the planet: Kermit the frog! Kermit has to stop several super-villains - including the temptress Piggy Galore - from succeeding in their evil plots! All of the favorite Muppets feature in this colorful game, on both the bad as the good side. Kermit, Animal and Fozzy fight against Dr. Nose, King Prawn and Piggy Galore. And what's up with B&B - Bunsen and Beaker - who seem to busy to help Agent Frog with his transport and gadgets? The game offers three alternate stories to follow, but all these stories are connected somehow and eventually will all point in the same direction - the ultimate villian!

name: Sparkster PC
summary: A reimagined version of the Genesis version of Sparkster that aims to create something new and exciting with its existing ideas and assets.

name: Space Intern
summary: You finally got an internship in the intergalactic space station, congrats! Now you just need to survive on different planets, experience gravity inversion, and weightlessness, talk to burn-out workers, and of course - avoid getting killed by local aliens.

name: Speedpunk: Garage Pack
summary: Unlock 9 new cars with Garage pack.

name: Sprout Valley + Bit Orchard: Animal Valley
summary: Make your dream of settling on an island and growing a beautiful garden come true!

name: Spock in the Dama Kingdom
summary: Discover the Dama Kingdom in Spock, a great fantasy adventure game !

name: Spider Crisis
summary: The world is infested with giant mutated spiders. In Spider Crisis you operate a small remote control tank equipped with deadly weapons. Use your weapons to shoot, bomb, and burn these creatures back to where they came from.

name: Space Invaders Anniversary
summary: Space Invaders Anniversary celebrates the 25th anniversary of the oldest Taito franchise.

name: Spectre
summary: Spectre is a breakthrough that brings new experiences in virtual reality to horror fans creating film-like suspense and surprises. Designed for immersive virtual reality and 3D, truly original gameplay has players pursued by the chilling Spectre in stunning and terrifying environments.

The people of this village lived in peace and harmony until a wizard came and spoiled their tranquility by bringing a forbidden art back to life. The secret art gave objects and animals massive strength foreign to their nature.

Jagodd, the wizard's name, increased the number of his followers thanks to this secret art and in a short time became king of the village...

summary: Flappy Fly Fire is a game in which you need to control fire. The game ends when the fire touches the dynamite and everything explodes.

name: Space Postman Story
summary: Space Postman Story is a story rich adventure game.

name: Sparkling Memory

name: Space Pirate King

name: Spacer: Legacies
summary: Spacer: Legacies is a game of turn-based tactical combat between small and large capital ships. Recruit skilled captains to command your vessels and choose the abilities that will make them unstoppable. Pursue vengeance in a gripping campaign across the whole of the Tantalus Cluster.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Creature From the Krusty Krab
summary: Nintendo DS port of SpongeBob SquarePants: Creature From the Krusty Krab.

name: Spiderdroid
summary:
It's the future, when droids do battle. You send your Spiderdroid in to capture a building by covering the structure with its unbreakable Droidweb. Your Spiderdroid lays down a web strand as it crawls along each girder. Once you have strung a web strand completely around an opening, the Spiderdroid flings a web over that opening. Your objective is to travel all the building's girders so the entire structure is caught in
your Droidweb.

But watch out! The building is swarming with Birddroids out to have your Spiderdroid for lunch. If you get cornered, use your secret weapon!

Press the Joystick's button to cast a magic spell that makes the Birddroids
invisible and unable to eat you...but only for a few seconds. And remember - each of your Spiderdroids can cast only four magic spells.

Once you capture the first building, it's time to send your advanced
Mummydroid to capture the next one, which is guarded by a horde of Skeledroids!

name: Speedpunk: Greeble city
summary: Unlock new map Scorching heat and race on different planet.

name: Space Explorers: Reload
summary: During blast-off of the spaceship one of the capsules got lost. The team found out that it was the one that contained all of their clothes. Now they all are about to go on a Space Exploring mission completely naked...

name: S.P.Y. Special Project Y
summary:
Once again an evil madman has the world to ramson involving nuclear warheads, and it's up to one man (or two if playing with a friend) to fight and shoot his Goons over various locations to get to the madman's complex on an island in the middle of the ocean and stop him once and for all. In a homage to James Bond, S.P.Y. Special Project Y has a variety of game styles over various levels which need completing to complete your mission. 
 
You start off flying a Jet-Pack over the ocean from a 3rd person perspective flying into the screen towards the island with the baddies coming towards you. You have a gun but can get icons to upgrade your gun. There are Hang-Gliders and a huge Helicopter to contend with as well before landing on the island and onto the next stage which the game then becomes a Beat -em-up. You view the action from the side as the game scrolls horizontally as you move from left to right. Baddies come at you from all sides and you kick or throw them. Baddies with guns will drop their weapons which you can collect and use before facing another boss who needs defeating to move on. 
 
Other game styles played has you running into the screen from a 3rd person perspective shooting the baddies coming towards you. As well as various weapons, you can collect smart-bombs to kill all on screen. The last style of gameplay is a beat-em-up again with weapons but you must jump up various levels to get to the top. As the game progresses it mixes up each level with these game styles.

name: Spanking Runners
summary: Arcade combat racer developed by K-D Lab (now KD Vision) for the PC. Notably, it features a tactical, turn-based mode for "people who do not have good reflexes."

name: Spider's Web
