name: Space Beam
summary: Top-down space shooter in which the player's and his opponent's spacecrafts are at the opposite sides of the screen. Both try to shoot their opponent first while moving left and right. Space debris is floating between both players and blocking the respective shots. Furthermore the energy level for the laser has to be filled to the max in order to reach the other side of the screen (and therefore your opponent).

name: SpeedBall!
summary: SO FAST!! Can you handle it?

name: Space Shadow
summary:
A sci-fi Light Gun game from Bandai that came packaged with the Hyper Shot Light Gun for the Famicom.

Space Shadow is an on-rails sci-fi Light Gun game from Bandai that takes its inspiration from the claustrophobic killer aliens movie Aliens. The player walks down an octagonal hallway and shoots any hostile extra-terrestrial life that bursts forth from one of the side-passages or the ceiling.

Space Shadow was the pack-in game for the Bandai Hyper Shot, a sub-machine gun shaped Light Gun for the Famicom. Despite the fact that Light Gun games tended to do far better in the US, neither the Hyper Shot nor this game were ever released outside of Japan.

name: Spyro the Dragon: Wings of Fury
summary: Spyro the Dragon: Wings of Fury is a browser-based shoot-'em-up starring Spyro the Dragon.

name: Spase Defense
summary: Stranded on a far flung planet, hold out for rescue against alien foes with a variety of guns, lasers, and explosives.

name: Splitmind

Spades Plus offers you a great experience against many Spades players from all around the world! You can play in many different game modes such as Classic, Solo, Mirror and Whiz.

Now playing Spades is much better with Tournaments, Knock-Out and many other different modes!

Spades is one of the traditional trick-taking card games like Bid Whist, Hearts, Euchre & Canasta, but this game is played in pairs in which spades is always the trump.

name: Space Trek
summary: One of the early space shooters.

name: Space Intruders

name: Space RPG 3
summary: Advanced space themed role playing action! Trade, fight, and do missions.

summary: Reunite the Dragon and Phoenix Kingdoms to stop the evil witch!

Oh, and dont forget to wear your headphones; the new music tracks make Speedx 3D Hyper Edition sound like never before!

The fastest tunnel racer ever!

Enhanced visuals.

New music, improved controls and even faster gameplay!

Hyper mode, shields and boosts!

summary: Multiple levels, multiple weapons and enemies have their own characteristics, waiting for players to challenge.

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
summary: Based on the film of the same name, Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron tells the tale of a rambunctious mustang stallion named Spirit and his journey through the untamed American West. A sudden and violent thunderstorm has hit Homeland and scattered the herd. Even Spirit is nowhere to be found. Luckily, Little Creek and Little Brook know of the lost horses and have set out to help them return to Homeland. Only you can help them get the herd home safely and find out what has happened to Spirit.

summary: A cartoon style and happy non-violent arcade racing game. You will drive, slide, enjoy the scenery and have a nice time racing in a beautiful world.

name: Spud's Quest
summary: Spud's Quest is an adventure game for Windows that draws its inspiration from the classic games of yesteryear, most notably the Dizzy, Zelda, and Metroid series. Take on the role of Spud and his friend Prince Charming on a journey to uncover four ancient elemental essences that have the power to remove a curse upon the royal family.

name: Spacewind The Zeppelin
summary: a zeppelin that shoots arrows where you can acquire improved skins and powers for your adventure

name: Speedrunnerz
summary: In this game, you will embark on various trails, each starting in a secure location. As you progress through the portals at the end of each trail, be prepared for increasing levels of difficulty. You are one of the best speedrunners out there!

name: Spider-Man 4
summary:
Spider-Man 4 is an unreleased Wii game developed by Eurocom. The game was intended to be a tie-in game for the movie Spider-Man 4, however it was cancelled due to the cancellation of the movie.

The game has since been released online in 2020, after a prototype was found on a RVT-H Wii development kit.

name: Splatch!

You control a rabbit who must navigate underground levels to find carrots to eat. Digging through the dirt can release rocks which will fall and can crush the rabbit. There are other obstacles such as mushrooms and on later levels moving opponents which are deadly to encounter.

name: Space Cats Saga: Chapter II
summary:
Space Cats Saga Chapter II: Macrocosm is the sequel to DerTimmy's megawad by the same name.

Download and kick Demon Butts with 3 different Alien Catgirls -the Starborn, fight your way through 15 large maps with completely new and devastating weaponry.
Fully compatible with Megawads and Add-Ons, this Doom modification reskins for almost all monsters and decorates.

Bigger and better than ever before and now featuring a new Arcade mode with regenerating aliens and power ups to even the odds. New bonus "Meteor Storm" and "Flying Saucer" rounds add yet more thrills and the chance to rack points up for extra lives. There's also a Classic mode for those wanting a slower paced more traditional game.

Megawad, based on the results of three speedmapping contests, held on , with next themes:

1. Industrial 2. Ancient city 3. Free disigned style, but there was limit of 3-colours of textures/floors on map

All maps were built in limit of 4 hours

name: Space Bees

name: Space Mining
summary: Space Mining is a game of strategy and deck building! Winning games will give you new cards, and powerful equipments for special bonuses in the match! You can play solo, sharing the screen or play ON-LINE to challenge new opponents or against AI. An innovative gameplay for a brand new card game!

name: Space Wars
summary: Space Wars is a 2D space shooter video game developed in the Unity 3D engine. It is exciting in the classical sense with powerups, highscores, scrolling backgrounds, and tons of enemy ships. Take to outer space and shoot at enemy ships today!

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron - Forever Free
Splitter
summary: This physics-based puzzle game challenges you with 25 brain-teasers aimed to develop your spatial thinking and accuracy. Draw a line to cut joints, as well as wooden blocks and planks. Learn to avoid obstacles and use dynamic figures to bring the smiley to the exit. The objective gets challenging as you get fewer moves to solve the puzzle. Collect all the stars and prove a physics games pro. Having become a smash hit among flash games online, this logic game returns to your desktop or mobile browser to play online without download.

name: SpellBounders 2
summary: Conquer the denizens of Diretome Keep with wits, words, and magic in SpellBounders 2, a dark fantasy roguelike word-game.

name: Spider Solitaire
summary: You might know the rules of Spider Solitaire, but let us remind them just in case. To solve the patience, create descending “runs” of cards. The order goes from King to Ace, and has to be of the same suit to be discarded. On the tableau, single cards can be moved between the columns regardless of their suit or color, but only same-suit cards are allowed to be moved as a group. If no moves are available, you may deal another row of cards, as long as there are no empty cells on the table. Your final score for a game of patience depends on the number of moves, session time and the difficulty mode.

name: Spebo
summary: Mobile phone racing game distributed for J-Sky 50KB devices through the Ulala no Channel J portal.

name: Space Shooter
summary: Become the best spaceship pilot with Space Shooter which is an arcade game that can quickly wake up your hardworking side

name: Space Tactics
summary: Defend your bases by shooting the oncoming alien swarms.

name: Space Wackos

name: Space Endeavor
summary: Space Endeavor is an Action Shooter Game.

name: Space Turret Gunner
summary: 《SpaceTurretGuner》is a VR shooting game, as a gunner of the space battleship, players will experience many battles we carefully prepared for you。

name: Space Lagat
summary:
Remake of a video game for the Agat (soviet 8-bit computer, clone of the Apple II) 
The goal of the game is to evade the snake and to gain points by collecting crystals. Keep in mind that different crystals worth different amount of points. Every 200 points you move to a next level, every 1k points you get an extra life. There is a total of 20 levels, all different.

Big Heads are playing football and you have a chance to play with such famous players as Wine Runey, Cristiano Rollover, Eric Canteena or Peely. Hit the ball with the head or your feet, score goals and collect power-ups to win the tournament.

name: Sports Heads: Basketball
summary: Sports Heads are back! This time your goal is to win the basketball league tournament and get to the play-offs. Choose your player and join the game against computer or your friend. To win the match, just score more points in one minute. Collect power-ups to get advantage over your opponent!

summary: Another meeting with a cute dino. Drag objects (wooden boxes and triangles and other objects) to help the little dino throw the wooden ball into the water. And remember that dino can help you with tips (hints), skips and dino coins. 80 levels.

name: Space Cantina
summary:
Match, squeeze, mix, serve! Great music, incredible visuals, cute planets. Explore space, open your restaurant and become the best bartender!
Become the best bartender throughout in the music themed universe. Dozens of ingredients to mix, hundreds of customers to serve is waiting for you behind the doors! Explore the vast space and discover new planets as you go. More than 20 space ships are waiting for you to begin your journey. Play with your friends through facebook or compete with them through leaderboards.
More than 70 levels to play with bonus levels waiting for you upon completing each planet, and more levels on the way! Earn high scores and rewards.

name: Spears 'n' Spades

name: Spoockey
summary: Who cares about Christmas! We wanted Halloween all year long, so we made Spoockey, a competitive multiplayer air hockey/block break mashup to satisfy your creepy cravings

name: Spike
summary: Spike is Kee Games' version of Rebound, with an added "Spike" button. Like Rebound it is a ball-and-paddle game reminiscent of volleyball. The "spike" button controls a vertical paddle close to the dividing line (the "net") which symbolizes a player jumping up and blocking the shot.

name: Space Invaders Collection
summary: A homebrew collection of two Space Invaders games, made with Taito's blessing.

name: Speed Demons
summary:
Speed Demons is a racing video game released in 1999. The game was developed and published by Microïds.

The game has 6 vehicles with possible localised damage, with three possible points of view. The game can be played as single player, 2 player split-screen, or by up to 6 players on a network. There are 10 circuits in varying locations, such as American motorways, on the sides of a volcano during its eruption and snow-covered ski slopes.

name: Space Boy
summary: A small survival game.

name: Spaceship Racer: Portal
summary: Spaceship Racer: Portal is an acade retro endless runner in pixel style with crazy "spaceships"

name: Spirit Swap
summary: A love story of a body swap between a man and a woman sharing one body.

name: Spin the World
summary: Spin the World is a platformer where you, as an adventurer, navigate a dangerous path to escape from a mysterious and dangerous world where danger awaits.

name: Space Fishing
summary: Space Fishing: Explore, catch, win! Are you ready for a unique fishing experience in space? Explore different regions with your custom spaceship, catch exotic fish, and win unique rewards. An unmissable experience for space adventure enthusiasts!

name: Space Quest: Incinerations
summary: Space Quest: Incineration is a 2012 fan-made sequel to the Space Quest series, created by Chris Ushko. It had been previously started in 1999 as a team project, cancelled, and then revived again as an almost completely different game. Information for both versions of the game are kept on this page.

name: Space Spider
summary: In the boundless universe, wage an inspiring battle with alien civilizations to defend your last home. Face stronger enemies and get stronger supplies and incentives.

name: Sperm Into Labia
summary: Anaïs, a porn influencer, plunges into a whirlwind of sensations that defy her understanding and awaken her deepest anxieties. Unable to escape the clutches of her agoraphobia, insomnia becomes her constant companion, fueling her relentless pursuit of carnal satisfaction.

name: Space Ranger Appleseed
summary: Become a Space Ranger, guarding a Space Orchard. Fly across asteroid belts, drive across dusty moonscapes & liase with the Space station to get your bumper crop of space apples ready!

name: Spellstorm
summary: A re-imagining of the classic game Magestorm, fight in an all-magic battle arena as an archon pulled from time and imbued with fantastical powers in an eternal struggle between the 3 Primal Forces - Order, Balance, and Chaos. Fueled by increasingly powerful magic, defeat your foes and their shrines in this three team FPS battle arena.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Deluxe Outing Pack
summary: The Deluxe Outing Pack is a bundle that combines the Thrilling Outfit Pack, Excited Outfit Pack, and Deluxe Outing Pack Bonus.

name: Space Junk
summary: Intense action, retro-styled visuals, a sizzling synth soundtrack and tons of cool Sci-Fi references, all rendered in vibrant, neon graphics. Get your trigger-finger ready, turn the lights down, the sound up, and blast your way through level after level of fast paced, Junk smashing action!

name: Space Crafter
summary: A game about crafting ships to fight the aliens.

name: Speed Racing
summary: A casual racing android game

name: Space Fuss
summary: Action-strategy game, about space hobo, who had his cardboard box stolen.

name: Spoids
summary: Spoids is a challenging throwback to the original brand of tower defense games. Command the Remote Defense Space Station and respond to distress calls of those who are being attacked by the invaders. Travel from planet to planet using your powerful arsenal to hold back the Spoids.

name: Sportsman's Double Play
summary: Sportsman's Double Play is a sport shooting and fishing game released in 2006 by Masque Publishing.

name: Speed Mazing
summary: Exciting "racing" party game for up to 4 players. Quick gameplay loop, hundreds of maps and eye-catching visuals. Also included is a challenging time attack mode for single player.

name: Space Survival
summary: This is a post-apocalyptic survival game that combines tower defense, survival, strategy, and random events. The game atmosphere is fun, and there are many wonderful props waiting for you to discover. Every decision you make will affect subsequent development. Live by your wisdom,

name: Spellslinger
summary: Spellslinger is a Strategy RPG Word Game. Spell words from a 4x4 tile grid to defeat enemies. Use strategic synergies of Spells and Artefacts to exploit weaknesses and defeat even the most powerful of foes. Explore a world with multiple unique areas on your quest to defeat The Dark One.

name: Spellarium 7: Match 3 Puzzle
summary: Collect coins coins to refuel the 7th element, Time, to stop the world from decaying.

name: Spear of Destiny Super CD Pack
Spring Catastrophe
summary: Spring Catastrophe is a 2D scrolling action game where Lily White spreads spring to Gensoukyo.

name: Special Forces Group
summary: Special Forces Group is a first person shooter for Android.

name: Space Crusade: The Voyage Beyond
summary: The Voyage Beyond is an expansion pack for the Amiga game Space Crusade. Adding more missions and weapons for your Space Marines.

name: Sports Illustrated for Kids: Football
summary: This is your team, and you can run it any way you see fit! Assemble your squad, come up with a menacing name, choose a style for your uniforms, and then put your athletes through a rigorous training camp in hopes of fielding the best bunch ever to hit the turf! There are no official licenses to stand in the way of the detailed action, leaving the burden on the game to deliver realistic gameplay at every turn. As your players become more experienced, their skill levels will increase and you’ll get a chance to see new special effects. There are tons of hidden bonuses such as power-ups and stadium improvements to be unlocked throughout the season, and each player is rated for speed agility, and strength. A unique rookie card system rewards all-stars with a little bit of fame, and 3D camera work captures all of the excitement from the opening kickoff to the awards ceremonies. Using a link cable, you can match up against a friend to see who has developed the most competitive team. If realistic football sounds like fun to you, give SPORTS ILLUSTRATED FOR KIDS a try.

name: Space Rabbits in Space
summary: "Space Rabbits in Space (and everywhere else)" is a 2d parkour skill-based platformer adventure about betrayal, speed, hard love, and fun facts. Played with one hand. On a mouse. Like we stated in the short description, it's good to have a free hand for various reasons.

name: Spartacus Card Game
summary: Spartacus Card Game is a Gladiator Fighting Card Game for 1 to 2 players.

name: Spy Swatter 2
summary: Spy Swatter 2 - Bad Dudes have stolen Top Secret Files and scattered them all over the World ! Travel to Cool Locations and Get The Bad Dudes, Get the Files and Save us ALL !

name: Spear of Destiny
summary: A bundle with Spear of Destiny and its Mission Packs was released on GOG.com and Steam under the name of "Spear of Destiny" by id Software. Due to Bethesda merging Wolfenstein 3D and Spear of Destiny into a single bundle, this bundle with the mission packs got delisted, which means that the packs are unavailable for new buyers.

name: Special Squad vs. Zombies
summary: A strange toxin has entered the city and almost all people in the city were transformed into the zombies. The zombies are very ferocious and they can destroy everything that prevents them. There is only one change to save the city, it is the Special Squad.

name: Spellbound: A Detective's Tale
summary: Spellbound a detective´s tale is a Vr Noir/ Medieval fantasy inspired scape room in wich every time you start a new game every puzzle is randomized making every playthrough unique. Use All of your tools to scape the infinite tower.

name: Spin Rush
summary: Spin Rush is 2D arcade game, where you have to collect dots and match colors.

name: Spookware: Watch Party
summary: A collection of spooky microgames featuring fast-paced gameplay inspired by horror classics. Chop off legs, hurl hatchets, clash cards with Nosferatu, and many other ghoulish acts of terror!

name: Space Duet
summary: Two pet pilots enter, one succeeds! Duel in spaceships using rockets to try and knock out the opponent.

name: Spirit of Europe: Origins
summary: An edutainment jRPG experience, spanning from ancient Greece to the 12th century European Renaissance, brimming with historically-accurate characters and events, experienced through two realms: of spirits, thoughts and emotions, and the material world.

name: Spider Square
summary:
In Spider Square you have to swing the Squarelicious characters as far as you can just like a spider would.

Avoid the obstacles and collect the gems along your way to unlock fantastic new heroes.

name: Special Force Double Take
summary: [SPECIAL FORCE DOUBLE TAKE] is an innovative 3rd-person battle-royale shooter from Dragonfly GF Co., Ltd. You must hunt cruel monsters, loot valuable items to get stronger, and protect yourself from relentless enemy players to become the last survivor in this unpredictable field.

name: Spectre
summary: A Pac-Man variant in which the player moves this time through a split screen 2D/3D-maze collecting dots and avoiding the deadly Questers. Written by Bob Flanagan and Scott Miller and published by Datamost for the Apple II computers.

name: Space Interceptor
summary: Fight for your life in the solar system and beyond as a space fighter pilot in a 26th century megacorporation.

name: Space Galaga
summary: Namco-Bandai mixes classic Galaga action with the anime Space Dandy.

name: Spongebob Boat-O-Cross
summary: In this game, the player controls SpongeBob's boat and has to finish the course without crashing or hitting any obstacles. The player presses the arrow key to drive forward, presses the down arrow key to reverse, presses the right arrow key to lean forward, and presses the left arrow key to lean back. In total, there are five levels

name: Space Mercenary Shooter: Episode 2
summary: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic FPS inspired by early shooter games, featuring handcrafted levels and a fully voice-acted cast of characters.

name: Space Smack!
summary: Space Smack! is a 1 to 4 player party game exploding with chaos and sabotage. Enter into the vast expanse of space and clash in a variety of minigames. In this controller-only game, cooperate or undermine your friends to become victorious!

name: Splatoon 2: Version 3.0.0
summary:
Version 3.0.0 of Splatoon 2.

Changes:

Major content update:
Players can talk to Callie in Octo Canyon.
More than 100 new gear items.
New rank: Rank X.
Two new music tracks.
Adjustments and bug fixes for multiplayer, Salmon Run, and Spectator Mode.
Balance adjustments for weapons and abilities.

name: Speed Tapping Idle RPG for Touhou
Space puzzle
summary: Space puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details!

name: Spheres: The Ancient Fuses
summary: Spheres The Ancient Fuses is a third person 3D platformer, but it is also focused on combat and puzzle solving. Inspired by many classic games we grew up playing, our goal is to make a game that we would love to play!

name: Sprite Fight
summary: An action-based 2D platform fighter with the use of long-ranged combat and the ability to battle your friends. With a series of unique game modes to brawl out in multiplayer, acquire a series of weapons throughout a variety of stages to fend off your opponents and come out victorious.

name: Spy 1 Lovecraftian
summary: Teen Romance x Comedy x Lovecraftian. This visual novel is a must-play for fans of all three genres. It features a heartwarming romance, hilarious comedy, and edge-of-your-seat thrill. With its engaging story and memorable characters, this visual novel is sure to leave you wanting more.

name: Spelunker HD: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Bats, spiders, snakes, ghosts... that's just the beginning.

This version includes the Spelunker HD main game and all of the Championship DLC stages, Areas 2-10.

name: Spacer Rescue: To Valhalla
summary: In a universe full of opportunity and fortune as a Spacer two things are true: Space is really dangerous and big and two always remember to get paid. Pay your debts and stay safe!

name: Speed Golf Royale
summary: A golf game where speed matters!

name: Sparkour
summary: Sparkour is a 4-Player First-Person Racing game, where you and your friends use speed, agility, and strategy to boost yourself across the finish line!

name: Spot The Object
summary: Embark on an immersive hidden object quest! Explore stunning landscapes, enjoy relaxing gameplay, and unravel challenging puzzles. Discover the joy of Spot the Object today!

name: Spruce
summary: Create the perfect community for your town of wizards. Forge weapons and defensive towers in preparation for the onslaught of monsters - and pray you survive.

name: Sparta: War of Empires
summary:
Set in the 5th century BC, the ancient world of Greece is in turmoil, under threat from Xerxes and his giant Persian Empire. This is a world where politics and diplomacy prove as sharp as the blades of combat. Few men have dared to rise against Xerxes and his invading armies.

The people need a hero – someone to stand up and unite Greece in the battle against his empire. With guidance from King Leonidas and help from his Spartan army, you will hone your abilities as a strategist, diplomat and a leader, while you build an army unrivaled by even that of Xerxes.

name: Spellgear
summary: Non-target action role-playing game, with MOBA and MOBA-style arenas, an open world to explore and relax, a fresh and unique combat system, and many other exciting features.

name: Space Drift Squad
summary: Call your friends and lead your squad through the outer space and protect your planet from asteroids and alien ships on this local shoot'em up. Shoot, evolve e explode these space enemies.

name: Spartan VR
summary: Welcome to Ancient Greece! Become the main hero of the story of the battle of the Titans, defeat Medusa and save Hermes from death!

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 4 Player Cooperation Edition
Space Control
summary: Space Control is a VR comedy sim where you play as a border control officer in space. Analyze strange passports, perform invasive security scans, and chuck any object that seems chuckable as a parade of Earth-bound aliens passes by your booth.

name: Sports!
summary:
Enter a whole new arena of sports fun with favorite LeapFrog characters! Bowl, block, chop, swing and swim through nine active games. Team up with a friend or play along with Leap, Lily, Tad and the whole crew.
Be a sports star and appear on-screen: LeapTV puts your child right in the game.

name: Spaceland: New Adventures
summary: This add-on doubles the number of missions available to you and tells new stories of the characters from the original game.

name: Space Lines: A Puzzle Arcade Game - Extra Levels!
summary: Space Lines: Extra Levels! for even more challenge!

name: Spectron
summary: The planetary clust Shalix is plagued by an intergalactic dust cloud that blocked out their sun. Now the Shalix have built a fleet to colonize new worlds. Unfortunately they set their eyes on Spectron, the player's home world. It's up to the player to repel the invading forces from Shalix.

name: Spellshot
summary: Survive against hordes of zombies using bullets enchanted with spells purchased from a rerolling shop. Spellshot is a fast-paced, rogue-lite fps in which you create unique builds by combining and upgrading spells, activating set bonuses, and collecting rare items.

name: Space Hulk: Space Wolves Chapter
summary: Amongst the annals of the Imperium, few warriors have reached higher honour than the Wolf Guard of the Space Wolves. Devastatingly ferocious in attack, immovably resolute in defence, these savage warriors have broken many foes down the long millennia.You can now command these fierce warriors and take on hordes of Genestealers.

name: Space Station Oblivion
summary:
In the far future, the human race has abandoned Earth for the reaches of outer space, having ruined the planet in the relentless quest for resources and in endless conflict. In a desperate search to find a new home, they found Evath, a life-sustaining planet with two moons, Mitral and Tricuspid. They sent a ship, named "Exodus" to colonize this new planet with explorers, embryos and supplies. Generations passed, and the colony on Evath was formed. Without the rule of law, the oldest members of the Exodus' crew, the Elders, were forced to take control, form an army and bring the rule of law to Evath.

Lesleigh Skerrit aspired to work for the Driller Federation. His grandfather had been a member of the Federation, but he was falsely accused of murder and banished as a Ketar. Only later did the evidence contesting his guilt surface, but it was too late - the law did not allow someone banished as a Ketar to return to Evath. Lesleigh was not bitter and did not seek retribution. He wanted to study law to prevent this kind of mistake happening again.

Called in by his superior, Montigue Yarbro, he is offered a lifetime opportunity - to complete his training and gain a promotion to Elite within the Driller Federation in one fell swoop. His experience on Mitral bore him well - he was to go to Mitral and attempt to avert the coming catastrophe. Mitral, having been abandoned in its unstable state by the Ketars, was going to explode within four hours, and the explosion would take Evath with it. Skerrit's mission was to use the excavation probe "Last Hope" to place eighteen drilling rigs around Mitral to allow the gas to dissipate harmlessly into space and prevent this disaster. Things are not so simple though, with the security systems activated prior to the Ketars' departure.

name: Space Overlord: I got Isekai'd into a Sci-fi World
summary: Space Overlord I got Isekai'd into a Sci fi World is a unique take on the Isekai genre. HuniePop-like interactions with quests, bosses, and Choice-Driven stories. Go on missions, take over the empire, or join the Renegade Pact.The best of all worlds: a dating sim, an Isekai comic, and a RPG.

name: Space Break 2 Head to Head
summary: Space Break 2 Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Space themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Space Wars
summary: Space Wars is an exciting endless level-base game in which you control spaceship through multiples levels, trying to shoot down the enemies and avoiding their attacks.

name: Speedy Sparrow
summary:
Help Speedy Sparrow struggle with a group of stubborn ladybugs!
Your task is really simple - touch ladybugs to make Speedy Sparrow peck them. None of the ladybugs can leave the borders!
Along with collecting points you may unlock new types of ladybugs, which will have completely new features and will allow you to get more points!
You will meet toxic ladybugs you shouldn’t mess with, armored ladybugs or even ladybugs sending bullets towards you…
During the game you can also make combos (by pecking two or more ladybugs at one stroke) and get even more points. Good luck!

name: Space Inversion
summary: Space Inversion is the classic arcade Space Invader style shooter. Battle the invading aliens from outer space.

name: Spare Change
summary: Run your own video arcade and try to keep your token machines filled in this frantic action game from Brøderbund.

name: SpellTome
summary: SpellTome is a story driven fantasy adventure 2D platformer. Hurl balls of magic, dash across levels, and jump over obstacles while trying to get the fabled SpellTome.

name: Space Core
summary:
Welcome to the Space Core Intergalactic League!
Assemble your team of champions with unique abilities and experience dynamic PvP matches on arenas in real time.
Guns, teeth, ice, and flames — use everything to score touchdowns and win matches!
Unlock new champions, upgrade them, find your perfect combination of abilities and outplay your opponents on the way to the championship!

name: Spear Master
summary: You are the son of a mighty hero. Now it's your turn to protect the world from an ancient evil.

name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights
summary: This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights. We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world.

name: Space Choice: Data Analyzer
summary: A little experimental game about making many choices quickly. Pick from 3 options, then do it again, and again, and again... Make the best out of a bad situation. Do it as quickly as you can because time is the most valuable resource at your disposal.

name: Sprint.Fire
summary: Sprint.Fire is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter with a focus on advanced movement and marksmanship.

name: Spiraling Snow
summary: Variant of Hide and Seek included in Lexibook's Disney Frozen Portable Game Console.

name: Spellstruck
summary: Face off in the ultimate showdown of elemental magic in Spellstruck. A game of tactical and reactive, arena style combat on randomised maps. Curve spells through the air, deflect attacks and combine an ever-growing list of unique abilities to defeat your rivals.

name: Spinstar
summary: Spinstar is a precision puzzle platformer. Its core mechanic - manipulating gravity - provides a challenging experience throughout every carefully-crafted level that invites the player to a playful and exciting journey.

name: Spirits of Mystery: Chains of Promise - Collector's Edition
summary: Isa's back to his old tricks, and now he's doing the bidding of an even greater foe.

name: Space Dust
summary: An action packed strategic space adventure with trading and procedural generation. A space vagabond with a gambling problem must trade and fight off pirates to pay a debt before he is turned into space dust.

name: Speedy Biker Xtreme
summary:
Tilt your way to victory! An all new version of your favorite bike game is here!
Race against the computer, or challenge a friend with real-time head-2-head.
Speedy Biker 3 features 18 new track locations across the globe complete with bone-jarring jumps, dizzying whoop-de-doos, ramps, mud, and obstacles galore.

name: Spot the Difference: Ukiyo-e Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji
summary:
Find mistakes in Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji!
Enjoy brain training while looking at Ukiyo-e!

name: Space Scrap Shuffle
summary: Join and rearrange modules on your ship to fight your way to the warp gates

name: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N.
summary: SpongeBob: Bubble Pop F.U.N. is a classic match-three puzzle game with a couple of clever twists. Similar to classics like Puzzle Bobble, the playing field is set before you start, and it’s your job to fire red, green, blue, purple, and yellow bubbles at the ones hovering above your porous yellow skull. You can bank shots off the walls, and you fire by holding your finger on the screen and pulling back.

name: Spy Kids Learning Adventures: Mission - The Underground Affair
Speed and Scream
summary: High-adrenaline experiences collection for virtual reality, ride a rollercoaster on the moon, visit the realm of the dead or places that can't exist in our world.

name: Spirits of Yendor
summary: Fight your way through the hordes of Baalzebub with your ghostly followers. Loot items for your followers to use, and sacrifice them to increase your power for the next assault.

name: Spoonman: Ballad of a Bonehead
summary:
It's a typical Wednesday. Your asshole of a boss wants you to go grab a crowbar so you can open the generator room before the hotel you work at goes up in flames. So you head down to the hardware store, but they're sold out. Then you step in some broken glass and cut your foot. Then a homeless dude tries to sell you a crappy robot suit. And THEN a necromancer mistakes you for one of her minions and you're stuck in her creepy witch's hut!

Yep, it's just a typical, crappy day on Pen Island...

name: Space Hawk
summary: Imagine a hunter, alone in Deep Space. You control his movements. He's armed with a "gas blaster." His prime target is the white Space Hawk. If a Hawk, deadly gas bubbles, comets or amoebas touch the hunter, he tumbles into infinity! There are just three ways to escape: move out fast under backpack rocket power, shoot away the danger, or go into HYPERSPACE! The longer the game goes on, the more exciting it becomes, so... GET THE HAWK!

name: Sprint RPG
summary:
The dusty Bone Dungeon awaits, full of treasure and peril...

Pick up your mighty sword,
Embrace your trusted shield,
Put your high heels on... and RUN!

Smite enemies at record speed in this Rogue-lite game of fast-paced combat and memory.
Defeat the Bone King and his skeletal monster horde and make your bid for freedom.

name: Sprint 2
summary: Despite its name, Sprint 2 is the first game in the Sprint series.

name: Space Marmalade
summary: Space Marmalade is a sci-fi turn-based strategy genre, bending the geometry of grid-space for an interstellar environment. Move from star to star, dispatching waves of procedurally-generated enemies. Each level is its own Solar System, with planets and asteroids to hide behind.

name: Spanky's Quest
summary: Welcome to Mopoland, where the evil witch Morticia has cast an evil spell and turned all the fruits of the mighty kingdom into fiendish monsters. Spanky, our primate hero is on a quest. Armed with his magic ball, Spanky must hunt down Morticia through six grueling levels to liberate Mopoland, and save it’s citizens from a certain famine.

name: Spaceforce Constellations
summary:
An action-packed strategy game of galactic conquest! Welcome to a new experience in gameplay and battle your way through a series of devastating space feuds, for supremacy across the universe. Unleash your firepower and launch an arsenal of special attacks to destroy the enemy.

Explore the galaxy and distant constellations, where resources, new life forms and fearsome adversaries abound. Destroy your opponents with lasers and missiles, along with a dozen special attacks and weapons you can earn through mining and search for life mini games.

Place spaceships in combat formation at the battlefront, keeping in mind that the vulnerable and missile attack ships, should be positioned behind the stronger crafts that are equipped with lasers and abundant health points, in order to engage the enemy and withstand attacks that would otherwise destroy inferior spaceships. When all the crafts of either opposing fleet have been destroyed, the battle is over.

If you win, but have damaged crafts, return to the nearest base and mobilise available ships for the next mission. As the game progresses, depending on your leadership status, you have the option of selecting up to four spaceships with different abilities in every space station and a total of six in battle formation.
Each spaceship can be upgraded by collecting experience points during combat. The current status is denoted by rank signs. Ships with more experience can withstand greater damage and deliver more powerful hits.

The scan button helps detect resources, which can be found by scanning and mining different sectors of the galaxy. Collecting crystals is strategically essential, because special weapons cannot be acquired without them. Without these special weapons, you will be incapable of completing specific missions.
There are three types of crystals and their various combinations are required for special attacks. Use the crafting system in space stations to create the sort of crystal needed for the desired weapon.

The search for life will grant you life points. While claiming life points, you will get promotions with rewards and additional crystals.
Engage in one-on one battles and lead your mother-ship against the enemy's. The battle of the mother-ship is a turn based card collision. The results of all mother-ship battles can be tracked in the space base Hall of fame panel, where your rank is displayed.

name: Spread Out! Hold Naar' Havok
summary: Easy and deep wargame. Choose your army (the Elves or the Orcs), win the war by controlling 5 of the 9 territories or by killing the enemy king. Deploy reinforcements.

name: Space Guardian
summary: Robots have launched an attack on humans, and the space guardian force is dispatched to fight to defend the earth! This is a fast-paced arcade-style casual car battle game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever.

name: Sphere 3
summary: Some roads lead to salvation, others - to eternal damnation. What will you choose?

name: Spellwrath
summary:
In Spellwrath, you assume leadership of one of the six medieval kingdoms on the magical continent of Eyja.      
      
Expand your castles, train your knights and take control of your enemies domain in this turn-based strategy RPG!

name: Spooky Typing: The Ghost Plague
summary: Be prepared to dodge the sharp elements and type the words to eliminate the ghosts. Can you to this fast enough and stop the ghost plage to spread across the world?

name: Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition: Infested Mines
summary: Enjoy free new content for Space Hulk: Deathwing – Enhanced Edition! Lead your squad through dark, xenos-filled corridors and caverns in the imposing new environments of the Infested Mines. This DLC is free for all Space Hulk: Deathwing – Enhanced Edition owners.

name: Sport Games
summary: Sport Games is a compilation of Sega Mega Drive sports games released by TecToy in Brazil in 1998. Included games are Super Volley Ball, World Championship Soccer II and Super Real Basketball.

name: Space Soldier
summary: Space Soldier is a single-player adventure game, you will play the role of a Protagonist to clear the enemy in the level

name: Spirit Stones
summary: Spirit Stones combines a match puzzle game with card collecting.

name: Spider-Man 2 Handheld Game
summary: Spider-Man 2 Handheld Game is an LCD handheld game based on Spider-Man.

name: Spellbound!
summary: Spellbound is an arcade shooter educational game teaching spelling. Every level starts with a word and it is up to the player by shooting enemies to collect letters part of the word in order to win the level.

name: Spire of Lust & Fetish
summary: This magical land has been swamped by darkness and horrible creatures. The Kingdom is defenseless since the enemy captured the girls in charge of protecting it! Rescue them one by one, and you’ll be thanked generously ~

name: Spellbound!
summary: The DOS port of the game plays largely the same but it has re-drawn graphics and UI. Notably it lacks sound effects during gameplay.

name: Space Samurai
summary: A space shoot em' up

name: Space Fat: To the Core
summary: Starting in space battle your way through all the layers of the atmosphere and into the planet itself in this roguelike vertically scrolling shooter. Can you survive long enough and make it To The Core?

name: Space Tyrant
summary: Terrorize the galaxy for fun and profit! Space Tyrant is a fast-paced roguelike-lite 5X game set in a grimly grimdark future of eternal war. Build a terrifying space fleet, make enemies and disintegrate peaceful extraterrestrials in your relentlessly unpleasant march to total domination!

name: Spirits of Spring
summary: Chiwatin, a young Native boy stranded in the northern landscapes of Permanent Winter, is haunted by giant crows. To overcome their cruelty, Chiwatin goes on an inspiring quest to restore Springtime and find the courage to move on. Inspired by familiar struggles with bullies and isolation, Spirits of Spring is an empathy game rooted in deeply emotional storytelling. Experience the fiercest loyalty in the most unlikely of places

name: Space Adventure Cobra: The Psychogun Vol. 2
Spider-Man: Web of Shadows - Amazing Allies Edition
summary: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows - Amazing Allies Edition is a 2D side-scroller with 3D graphics. The story is similar to the seventh-generation console versions. A break-off piece of Venom's symbiote begins infecting New Yorkers and it is up to Spider-Man to save the city. He can switch between the back and red suits at any time, and each has its own move set and abilities.

name: Space Quest: Collector's Edition
summary:
A collection containing the first five games in the Space Quest series which was released to celebrate the 15th anniversary of Sierra On-Line (originally founded as On-Line Systems). This collection was released alongside other well-known series from Sierra On-Line (specifically the "King's Quest" and "Leisure Suit Larry" series of games).

In addition to the first five games in the series, the collection includes the 1991 remake of the first Space Quest game, the French and German versions of Space Quest V, an arcade game collection called "Roger Wilco's Spaced Out Game Pack", information on the Space Quest series, and some videos (including a spoof journalistic piece where the "reporter" interviews various people at Sierra On-Line), and a secret bonus program about the World Famous Talking Bear.

name: Space Bandits
summary:
Space Bandits is quite possibly the most unique game out of all the MBX titles. You take control of a robot who must collect Earth's Energy Crystals that were stolen by "Computer Controlled Androids". The uniqueness of the game comes from the fact that not only can you walk up and down the corridors on the bottom of the screen, but also on the sides and top of the screen. Therefore, the game has a 3D aspect to it which makes your mission much harder to complete, especially considering that the controls change accordingly with the different sides of the screen (if you are controlling your robot on the bottom part of the screen all that is needed to move forward is a press "up" on the joystick. However, once on the top of the screen, a press "down" on the joystick moves you forward). This change of joystick movement helps create a more realistic feel that really helps the game out and makes it more fun to play, however frustrating it may be first. After you have the controls for the game down, which can prove to be very tricky, the next step is to go about completing your mission to get back all the of the Earth's Energy Crystals, which are represented by little red diamonds throughout the 3D maze. However, there are a few curve balls thrown in. If you are unable to collect the crystals after 40 seconds, they become radioactive. This means that if you touch a crystal once it's radioactive (they turn white after becoming so) you will lose a life and fall off into space towards a purple alien ship which appears in the center of the screen. On the other hand, if you do collect all 4 crystals from that round, you might think your job is done, but that's not the case. Even after all the crystals are collected you must still blast the white androids which follow you throughout the maze. Only after all of the androids have been killed will you be able to advance forward. 
 
The robot you control in the game is also equipped with an electronic vapor gun that will shoot a pulsar beam all the way around the screen which can actually come back and hit you if not careful (and the range of your shot increases as the game progresses, so an accurate hit is necessary later on!). When you do manage to hit one of the androids through they do not simply vanish from the screen, but instead leave behind an energy mass which cannot be passed through by your robot. On later levels when there are many androids roaming about the screen a well planned shot is necessary, because you could actually cage yourself in due to the energy masses. However, there is a way out of a jam if you find that all the crystals have turned radioactive (and therefore cannot be collected) or if you find yourself caged in by energy masses. By the press of a button, you can Beam Up to your yellow ship and then be presented with a fresh board and start all over (but then you lose any crystals you might have managed to collect and the game gets a little harder). One other thing to note about the androids is the fact that they can shoot anti-gravity spray at you, so getting out of the way of their line of fire is another challenge faced on your quest to save the earth. One last little nifty feature of the game is the ability to wear a defensive shield which makes you invincible to anything on the screen. However, the shield can only be used for as long as the red bar on the top of the screen indicates (you actually can take off the shield at any point after putting it on to save the energy bar from being depleted). The shield, and all these other little bonuses tossed into the game, can all be accessed by either the press of the button or by voice recognition if the MBX gaming add-on is attached. All one would need to do in order to activate the shield, for example, would be to simply say "Shield" into the microphone! 
 
Space Bandits is a very interesting game, and has a lot of unique features. However, the mainstream gamer might be turned off a little by the easiness of the first few rounds. At first I wrote this game off as being too easy, but after playing it through to the 5th level I found myself being caged in numerous times by the androids who were out to get the crystals I had collected! So when you give this game a try, play into it a little as the challenge can pick up fairly quickly. In addition, as with all MBX cartridges, this game uses voice recognition and synthesis very well. Being able to speak plain English into a microphone to tell your robot what to do is really a great added dimension to the game. So if you're a space shoot 'em up junkie, you might find all the options available in Space Bandits interesting and entertaining.

name: Spaceball
summary: Did you ever wonder what sports would be like in space? This dynamic multiplayer game will have you on the edge of your seat for hours! Mixing elements of rugby and basketball with the low gravity of the moon, you can work as a team to score goals against your opponents. Tackle, grapple, and shoot your way to victory!

name: Speed NFL
summary: Play a football (American) game in 25 minutes. Select your team before using the NFL rankings to decide on your offensive tactics.

name: Spirit of the Obelisk
summary: Switch between four unique heroes, each with their own special ability in this charming puzzle platformer. Play alone or with a friend to complete interesting puzzles in vibrant themed worlds.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Patty Pursuit
summary: Trouble has come to Bikini Bottom! The evil “mastermind” Sheldon J. Plankton has once again hatched a plan to steal the secret Krabby Patty formula. Explore, collect coins and spatulas and crush obstacles as SpongeBob on his epic, most side-scrolly adventure ever!

name: Space 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
Space Harrier
summary: The PC-6001 mkII port of Space Harrier reduces many of the graphical elements to squares and simple shapes, presumably to achieve a higher framerate.

name: Sprint Car Challenge
summary: Sprint Car Racing is perhaps the most extreme, and most electrifying of all of the world`s motorsports. Compensating for their light weight and huge power, these beasts use enormous spoilers and wings to keep themselves on treacherous tracks. Drivers slide around corners sideways and spectacular collisions are frequent, as the cars jostle in tight packs. There is no other sport like it! And now, you can experience the frantic racing action for yourself.

name: Space Jones VR
summary: Space Jones is a FPS VR game. Story: At an era of human space colony expansion, a bounty hunter (the player) accidently picked up a mysterious treasure named “Star Box”. Therefore, the bounty hunter has been targeted by multiple space pirates. A major war will be triggered at any time. The player will have no choice but to eliminate all the pirate battleships in flocks.
publishers: Shanghai Oriental Pearl Culture Development Co.Ltd

name: Space Run: Adventure Above Sky
summary:
Space Run Epic! Sling Escape will take you to an epic cosmic adventure. Fly away from the Earth and visit multiple planets in the quickest way possible. Can you bend the laws of physics and escape velocity?
Tap to blast off your space pod and leave planet Earth in this addictive casual runner game. Rockets doesn't work anymore and you are getting trained to fly a space pod to travel across the galaxy! Your adrenaline level will be on an all-time high when you dodge incoming asteroids and collect bonus points from black holes. We hope you are up for sleepless nights in this addictive action game orbiting planets and more!

name: Sportsball
summary: Sportsball is a local multiplayer game inviting up to four players take the reins of exotic birds where they will flap, tackle and dunk balls into the fieldnet for points and glory.

name: Spaceminers
summary: Welcome to the world of Spaceminers and our exclusive pre-alpha release Spaceminers: Gold Runner. This thrilling game mode serves as the first step in your journey towards becoming a skilled Spaceminer.

name: Space Ripper
summary:
Space Ripper is a hardcore space shooter. There’s no saves, a little HP and many dangerous enemies… 
If you can survive for 5 minutes you are arcade God!

name: Space Armada
summary: Space Armada is a clone of the game Space Invaders. Rows of bomb dropping aliens are invading your home planet, and you need to protect it! You control a laser gun at the bottom of the screen; your goal is to earn as many points as possible by destroying the waves of attacking aliens at the top of the screen. The aliens march steadily downward, and if they reach the ground or you run out of laser guns, the game is over. When all aliens in a wave are destroyed, you move on to the next, more challenging round. From time to time, a flying saucer will pass by at the top of the screen which can be shot for bonus points.

name: Splash King's Tournament
summary: Splash King's Tournament is an exhilarating, fast paced tournament style multiplayer battle royale, third person shooter game for PC.

name: Spartan Firefight
summary:
Get ready for the Firefight! From the creators of Spartan Runner comes a new action-packed game: Spartan Firefight.

Battle against waves of enemies accross a variety of game modes and maps in under five minutes. Unlock and upgrades powerful weapons to help you in your task. Purchase and collect skins, helmets, shoulders and more to create your unique Spartan.

name: Space Invasion
summary: Space Invasion is a variant of Space Invaders. It has most of the features of the original arcade game with the player moving left and right while shooting at the invaders.

name: SpinDrive Ping Pong
summary: SpinDrive Ping Pong puts players at the heart of realistic game play in which you battle your opponents for the top ranking title. SpinDrive Ping Pong's fast-paced, exciting and realistic Ping Pong matches can be played in three different modes: Tournament Mode puts you in a competitive knockout competition, Rally Mode lets you enjoy a thrilling rally and in Exhibition Mode, you can start a single match straight away! Are you able to smash and spin your way to the top and become a world-ranking Spin Drive Ping Pong player?

name: Spirit Summoner
summary: 3D Real-time strategy attack enemy defense with upgradable summoned units. You play as Spirit Summoner to destroy modern human sophisticated defenses of a small city. Devise a masterful strategy that utilizes your summoned creatures to their fullest potential and breach their fortifications.

name: Space Saviour Special
summary: Space Savior Special. Shmup genre game. Help Earth in her last awakened attempt to save humanity from the Naggal Biomechanical Virus. Use everything you have to get through enemy forces! Your ship, your pods, your bombs, your faith and your reflexes to destroy your terrible enemy!

name: Space Mechanic Simulator
summary: Become a Space Mechanic! Get your hands dirty, explore the depths of space and repair broken machinery. Diagnose problems using diagrams and tools, perform repairs, manage your resources and watch the simulated machinery come alive. Or just gaze upon the beauty of the Solar System.

name: Space Waver
summary:
Space Waver is an action-adventure space game, with a strong bind to comics.
Become a space mercenary and experience his life through multiple contracts.

name: Space Slalom
summary:
Space Slalom is a video game developed by Orca and published by Sega for the SG-1000 in 1983. 
 
Though on the surface it appears to be a space-themed vertical shoot-'em-up, there is actually no shooting involved. The player controls a shuttle and must navigate it through a course defined by colored stars, similar to ski slaloms. The player must also avoid obstacles, and will be awarded with extra points depending on on his/her speed across the course. 
 
At a mere 8kB, the game is one of the smallest SG-1000 games, and was only sold in Japan.

name: Space Station Racer
summary: Space Station Racer is a unique racing game that uses realistic space flight physics. Race around 12 different race courses located on imaginary space stations from around the world, using nothing but your powerful thrusters to accelerate, turn, and brake.

name: Spice World
summary:
Join the Spice Girls as they enter their own interactive dimension. 
 
Interactive magazine with exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes footage. 
Create your own remixes of five of your favorite Spice Girls songs. 
Become your favorite Spice Girl and practice individual dance routines. 
Choreograph all the Spice Girls for their special live shows - on your TV!

name: Space Travel
summary: Space Travel was an early computer game for Unix that simulated travel in the solar system.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Fists of Foam
summary: An edutainment game for the Didj. It is a side-scrolling Beat 'Em Up.

name: Speedy Eggbert 2
summary: The Sequel to Speedy Eggbert.

name: Space Spy
summary: Space Spy is a surreal adventure title based on the developer's own experiences.

name: SpacePort Arcade
summary: SpacePort (SPC) is arcade style game similar to Galaga paired with the Binance Smart Chain via the SPC token. Non-SPC holders have the chance to win daily jackpots which can be hundreds or even thousands of dollars by having the highest score of the day. The game is free to play, holders passively earn tokens by playing, and holds regularly scheduled competition events to reward players with more SPC. Holders can also earn NFTs when they win daily high scores in game. Free players are limited to only winning high score jackpot earnings but cannot win NFTs.

name: Sprydite
summary: Sprydite is an action-adventure, survival with immersive RPG elements in a large open world. Science fiction set in a post-apocalyptic and cyberpunk backwoods setting with a small touch of surrealism.

name: Spinout Drifter
summary: Narrative: Drift through the city, dodging cars and other things alike! Drifting: Control your car in various ways to maneuver through traffic! Customize your car: Choose from a variety of car body's, colors, and tires!

name: Spaced Out
summary: Retro, classic, couch-buddy competition in space! Simple controls make it easy for friends and family to join in the fun!

name: Spiral 3D
summary: How many layers can you pass?

name: Spaceship Typing
summary: An educational typing game to help kids learn how to use a keyboard.

name: Spider Hero Lava Floor 2: Craft Exploration
Spectral Force Chronicle
summary: Spectral Force Chronicle is a Role-Playing game, developed by Xpec and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Space Surf: Shark Attack
summary:
You are Tyrone Stallion, a world famous surfer riding some of the gnarliest waves ever surfed! But there’s trouble in the water. A 10 foot great white shark named Brutus is after you! Surf waves, whales, dolphins, birds, airplanes and UFO’s to stay ahead of Brutus the shark!

Surf past as many islands as you can and discover all the incredible things you can interact with in this exciting, action packed surfing endless runner!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle For Bikini Bottom
summary: PC version of Spongebob Squarepants: Battle For Bikini Bottom. Unlike its console counterpart, it is a collection of mini-games.

name: Spooky's Jump Scare Mansion: Karamari Hospital
summary: In this alternate universe the elevator has crashed below the 1000th room revealing even more terrific monstrosities. In this new abyss lies Karamari Hospital, long abandoned by the living and infested with the not so living. Can you tackle this new marvelous pit of despair and suffering, or will you end up like most of the patients of Karamari Hospital with your various organs removed and placed into bins that sorted both alphabetically and by buoyancy? Only you have the power to start forest fires with your mind and find the ending of this game. (Note: You do not have pyrokinesis in this game, sorry)

name: Spooky's Jump Scare Mansion: The Doll House
summary: Continuing after Karamari Hospital, The Doll House exists in the deepest part of Spooky's Mansion. Brand new horrors, atrocities and secrets await within. Can you finally escape this menagerie of terror and put the spirits of the mansion to rest?

name: Spectrubes
summary: A new addictive puzzle game from the creators of Big Journey to Home, inspired both by the eighties and the modern games – we present Spectrubes!

name: Space Racer X
summary:
Do you enjoy hustling in space, dodging narrow canyons with a fast x-plane racer?
Space Racer X is endless 3d space flying game simulator.
Collect credits and buy new spaceships that are created only for you.

name: Space Escape
summary: A rogue-like arcade shoot-'em-up.

name: Space Carrot
summary: Arcade game about collecting carrot growing on asteroids. Perfect way to spend 5 minutes while waiting for something. Best played with a gamepad.

name: Sphex: Minimal Arcade Game
summary:
SPHEX is a hard survival/runner game with arcade elements where your primary purpose is to try stay alive for as much time as possible. Things start off easy in a very simple game world, but they soon become more and more challenging as you try to run for your life.

Test your survival skill
You should move as fast as possible in order to avoid all the small red squares that are coming towards you. If you get hit a few times,

name: Space Raiders
summary: Embark on an intergalactic journey in this adrenaline-pumping 2D space shooter! Pilot your sleek spacecraft through treacherous enemy armadas as you battle to save the galaxy from imminent destruction. With intuitive controls and fast-paced action, blast your way through wave after wave of alien invaders. Dodge incoming fire, shoot enemies in this thrilling arcade-style adventure. Are you ready to become the hero the universe desperately needs?

name: Sprocket Rocket: Design and Conquer
summary: Help Wallace & Gromit collect cogs to fix their ship and fly to the moon! Make the most of your ideas by protecting them with intellectual property rights.

name: SpellForce 3: Versus
summary:
SpellForce 3: Versus is a a Free-to-play version of SpellForce 3, allowing players to participate in the newly introduced ranked multiplayer as well as play in a skirmish against AI opponents.

In SpellForce 3: Versus, you will be able to play either Humans, Orcs and Elves - and your faction will be randomly chosen for you when you start the game for the first - once an Orc, always an Orc! While fighting against other users of SpellForce 3: Versus, you can also face players from the expansions Fallen God and Soul Harvest - there will be just one big SpellForce 3 player base.

SpellForce 3: Versus will have NO microtransactions, NO advertisement or any other common Free-to-play mechanic. You can play Versus absolutely free of charge, only if you want to have access to the singleplayer campaigns from SpellForce 3, SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest or SpellForce 3: Fallen God, you'll have to buy them.

Additionally, there is a Multiplayer-Upgrade pack available, allowing you to choose from each of the six different SpellForce-factions: Humans, Orcs, Dwarves, Dark Elves, Trolls and Elves.

name: Space Invaders Revolution
summary: Space Invaders Revolution is a new take on the series, which marks a true progression over any version before it: New types of invaders, new rules and new ways to destroy them. Contains a faithful reproduction of the original arcade machine in Classic Mode. New Era mode: the simple rules of Space Invaders are expanded and twisted into a revolutionary step for the classic franchise. New Era mode takes the form of a world tour, with the player confronting the Space Invaders at 20 recognisable geographical locations. In total there are 60 levels to defend and 13 different types of invader to battle. Power-ups include protective shields, additional support craft, rapid-fire shots and column-clearing laser beams - essential aides as the action becomes progressively more intense. Power-ups can be used in combination: using support craft with laser results in three laser beams, decimating multiple waves of invaders with every press of the fire button.

name: Spyro the Dragon 8
summary: Spyro the Dragon 8 is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2005 to promote Crash Purple and Spyro Orange.

name: Space Waves
summary: Space Waves is a procedurally generated 2D arcade style shooter with multiple collectable power ups and varying enemy types. This game will casually draw you in and then increase the pace and difficulty as you progress through the never ending levels.

name: SpiritSphere
summary: SpiritSphere is a local multiplayer game that draws inspiration from classics like Zelda and Windjammers and mashes it together with the nostalgic feel of playing air hockey at your local arcade.

name: Spaceship Trucker
summary: Spaceship Trucker is a 2D shooter. You are a spaceship trucker travelling down the dangerous star route. The Flees will try to block your way through space and pirates want to steal your precious cargo. Watch out for meteors as well. In each level you'll have to prove yourself worthy of being a spaceship trucker by fighting off dangerous boss enemies.

name: Sprocket Wings
summary: In this fast-paced 3D racing game, you’ll go wing to wing against a motley band of Gnomelings. After zigzagging through 16 trippy courses, you’ll wonder: Is it a race with a twist or a twisted rave? Either way, expect a potent dose of disorienting visuals and disturbing surprises at every turn.

name: Spy x Anya: Operation Memories - Thrilling Outfit Pack
summary: This is an outfit set for Loid, Anya, Yor, and Bond to use in SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories.

name: Space Garbage
summary: Do you like Tetris? Doesn't matter. Space Garbage is here to rotate Tetris 90 degrees on its head and add a little car to it. Blast and stack your way to the top of the leaderboard with this farm-to-table, indie, retro, solo, arcade... experience!

name: Springy: A Bounce Adventure
summary: Help Springy and his friends on a fantastic 3D adventure in an unknown world full of dangers.

name: Space Rocket Adventurers
summary: A reverse Tower Defense - play as the oncoming party and survive the onslaught that has been placed into your path.

name: Spacelords: Raiders of the Broken Planet - Wardog Fury Campaign
summary: Harec wants Loaht to join his Raiders but the Wardogs are out for his blood. Wardog leader General Marmalade wants all the Aleph and Loaht is a loose end. Loaht’s fury could win the war but who will get to him first? WARDOG FURY is a premium campaign for Raiders of the Broken Planet.

name: Splash Carnival
summary: Spash Carnival is roguelike shooting game featuring paintball weapons. Arm yourself with diverse low-durability weapons, splash the enemies and move forward! Welcome to the Splash Camival~!

name: Sprout: Idle Garden
summary: Design and build your zen garden, where you will cultivate and collect a variety of flowers as you progress through the game. Relax and decorate, or optimize for maximum efficiency - your garden is your own.

name: Spring in Summer
summary: A storytelling sandbox adventure driven by your own personality about helping a jackalope ghost who cannot move on. Explore a mystical island inhabited by quirky mythical creatures, connect with the hearts of its community, & discover one’s heart fulfillment in your own heartwarming personal journey

name: Space Pilot
summary:
How long can you survive? Face intergalactic traffic and space pirates!

Hey guys, this is my new arcade game Space Pilot! It's actually one of my old test games from back in 2013. I've decided to finish it, and since it's actually already playable, I thought why not share it to you guys so that I'll be able to get some feedback while I develop it! I hope you guys enjoy playing my game. Any and all feedback is very welcome!

Controls:

Left Arrow Key - Move Left
Right Arrow Key - Move Right

name: Speak Lies
summary: Life is perfect in Vistine Academy, a high tech boarding school for talented young ladies. Perfect, as long as the 10 rules are never broken. Speak Lies is a mystery adventure game. Unravel secrets and solve murders in this text message simulation.

name: Speed High
summary: Speed High is a fast-paced abstract scrolling shooter and time-based game, to drive a ship forward and destroy enemies to gain highest scores in limited time.

name: Spider
summary: A simple shooter game released in some Mega Drive plug & plays. It was originally released in Brazil by Tec Toy under the name of Aniversário (Birthday). The player needs to prevent the spiders from getting to the cake.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Underpants Slam
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants Underpants Slam! is a fast-paced, side-scrolling multiplayer slapstick collect 'em-up, set deep in the ocean. An incredibly powerful storm current has disrupted a Royal Laundry shipment of the undergarments of Neptune, Lord of the Sea, and has spread his unmentionables across the bottom of the ocean. Neptune now calls upon all the commonfish to collect his lost undergarments, and fix this "delicate" situation. He's offered a bounteous reward to the sea creature who collects the most bloomers!

name: Spanky's Quest
summary:
Wicked witch turns fruits into monsters, Mopoland Population famished!

Welcome to Mopoland, where the evil witch Morticia has cast an evil spell and turned all the fruits of the mighty kingdom into
fiendish monsters. Spanky, our primate hero is on a quest. Armed with his magic ball, Spanky must hunt down Morticia through
six grueling levels to liberate Mopoland, and save it’s citizens from a certain famine.

-Fun, playful characters.
-Password continue feature.
-Unique traps and bonus rooms.
-Fantasy/Adventure for the entire family.

name: Speculum Mortis
summary: Speculum Mortis (Latin for "mirror of death") is a horror-themed first-person point-and-click adventure done mostly in greyscale.

name: Space Orbs
summary:
Two player cooperative colour match-3 where two players tackle each side of the threat and can transfer orbs between each other to solve the puzzle. There is no time pressure but for each move there may be more orbs filling the screen.
As the levels progress various blockers and bombs will complicate the solution, when no more matches remain on screen a level is completed.

name: Space Break
summary: This is a casual, 3D game with space battles. The purpose of the game is to defeat opponents of 20 levels. The player controls five different spaceships (1 fighter and 4 battleships) at each level. During the battle you can switch ships and different ships can attack different opponents.

name: Spore 2D Creature Creator
summary: This was a Flash game adaptation of the Spore Creature Creator

name: Sprill - The Mystery of the Bermuda Triangle
summary: Open your eyes for the thrilling hidden object game Sprill - The Mystery of the Bermuda Triangle! Sprill is relaxing on his boat when all of a sudden three aliens sink his boat to the bottom of the ocean and tell him they need his help finding the Pearl of Poseidon. Assist Sprill by finding objects and finishing mini-games, and help him save an entire planet!

name: Specialist's Vengeance
summary: Deliver justice to the killers. When Olivia's son and husband get murdered by the cartel members, the world just isn't the same anymore. This special effects specialist turns into an avenger. Go ahead, experiment, create and test your own explosives. Make sure your revenge is carefully planned!

name: Space Exposures
summary: Space Exposures is a kind of mini arcade game that gives you the chance to experience both the joy and the frustration that we astrophotographers can sometimes feel during a clear, starry night. Feel the thrill of delight from a perfectly captured photo, and despair in the utter frustration at all the clouds that constantly get in the way.

name: Spy-der Pig
summary: This is Obstacle game. Agent Spy-der Pig with the mission of destroying the most powerful thing in the dark world. The higher you go, there will be more obstacles and challenges. Let's fight together with Mr.derPig to see who will get to the best position in this journey.

name: Sprint One
summary: Super One, released in 1978, is a simple b&w overhead-view arcade racing game. It is single player version of Sprint 2 and a sequel to the Championship Sprint and Super Sprint games.

name: SpaceWalker
summary: You are about to be part of the SpaceWalker team. Let’s explore the the multiple dimensions yet to be known, obtain the knowledge and power of the cosmos and save the universe!In Early Access, Solar System Explorer, you will steer a spacecraft to visit planets in the solar system,. On each planet, you will learn the skills and knowledge necessary to accomplish missions.

name: Space Debris
summary: A Local Co-op Zen Space Rock Demolition game. Up to 16 players can play locally on a single screen, collecting space materials to unlock unique ships and upgrades, as well as new features. Drop in/out multiplayer for everyone!

name: Spy Kids 2: Mega Mission Zone
summary: Spy Kids 2 Mega Mission Zone be kid agents and save the world. Join Carmen and Juni Cortez on this exciting adventure game.

name: Space Captain McCallery Episode 1: Crash Landing
summary: Space Pirate Captain McCallery has Crash Landed on an alien planet! Explore a strange and hostile alien world in this Low-Poly 3D Action-Adventure game.

name: Speedway Survival
summary: Survive the darkest hour at UT! As Sola, defeat shadow monsters wreaking havoc on Speedway with your magical flashlight! Will you be able to rescue Sola's sister, Luna?!

name: Space Cube Racers
summary: Space racing game for up to 4 players (local, split-screen). It uses newtownian mechanics but with an easily to pilot control scheme where your ship will always thrust along your line of sight.

name: Space Hunters
summary: Join space bounty hunters in a brutal 2D handmade beat 'em up, where every punch and kick is fueled by action and greed. Battle your way through a gritty, money-driven universe in this intense, fast-paced adventure.

name: Space Incident
summary: Space Incident is an interactive story about the two astronauts and one unexpected fellow traveler. The game takes place on a spaceship, who’s been lost somewhere between Earth and Mars.

name: Space Hulk: Defilement of Honour Campaign
summary: Space Hulks do not usually move under their own power, the winds and tides of warpspace usually determine the course of these derelict clusters of ships. The Defilement of Honour was different, being equipped with a functioning engine room of sorts, as well as an ancient navigational device in control of its course.

name: Spy Hunter
summary: Spy Hunter is a vehicular combat racing game developed by TT Fusion, published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, and released for the PlayStation Vita and Nintendo 3DS. The game was the second reboot of the Spy Hunter series, following the first reboot of the franchise in 2001.

name: Spring It!
summary: Drag and drop tools onto the line so your toy robots can reach the end of production.

name: Spiritual Soul 2
summary: A tactical strategy game, developed and published by Shuwa System, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Space Defender
summary: Space Defender is a top-down 2D arcade space shooter with some RPG elements.

name: Space Banditos
summary: Between a group of bandits and a team of sheriffs, it's war. Everyone wants to reign over the area ...

name: Spellarium 9
summary: Each level is designed with love, like a piece of art, in order to keep the game interesting, not just mindlessly moving tiles.

name: Space Explorers: Red Planet
summary: You're the lonesome astronaut with your jetpack-set. You will experience planet exploration with 7 different jetpacks on an abandoned planet.

name: Spliced
summary: Spliced is a hybrid roguelite deck-builder. Play as a symbiotic ooze, taking the parts and abilities of enemies you defeat. Use cards to battle enemies and navigate the environment.

name: Space Drifters 2D
summary:
Space Drifters 2D, is a top down space shooter with Newtonian physics style movement.
Made in the Unity engine with graphics and controls reminiscent of Asteroids with the added benefit of a local co-op and multiple versus modes.

name: Spot The Difference Food & Drink
summary: Introducing Spot The Difference: Food and Drink, from the original creators of the globally famous Spot The Difference arcade game.

name: Spectrum Valley
summary: Spectrum Valley is an interactive experience that is part-exploration game and part music visualizer. Take control of a boy or girl character and run and jump around in several biomes, collecting coins or food bonuses as the world moves and reacts dynamically to an audio file on your system; affecting the ground beneath your feet, some objects, and even the weather.

name: Spice Odyssey
summary: A roguelite cooking game about a misfit chef running a small spaceship restaurant on the outskirts of space. Cook and serve your dishes, upgrade your kitchen equipment, and decorate your restaurant. Expand your culinary fame across the galaxy!

name: Space Voyage: Episode 1 - A Big Soviet Adventure
summary: Retro-style adventure that tells the story of a simple Soviet cosmonaut.

name: Sprint 1
summary: Sprint is a series of overhead-view arcade racers released from 1976 to 1978. "Sprint 2" was the first in the series with the "2" reflecting the number of players, rather than indicating it as a sequel. Sprint 4 and Sprint 8, a 4 player and 8 player version respectively, were released in 1977. Both were full color raster versions of the game. The single player cabinet Sprint 1 was released in 1978.

name: Space Turbo 2
summary: Space Turbo 2 - Continuation of a dynamic arcade game in which you have to fly a futuristic space plane through an endless tunnel and avoid various traps.

name: Space Odyssey
summary: Players play as cute food astronauts in a co-op party game. Different ship's roles like pilot, gunner, shielder, and gatherer. 'Dark Hotpot,' a new team from the 'Space Academy,' faces a colossal jellyfish alien devouring their planet. They must defeat it and say their plant.

name: Space Rocks Blaster
summary: An arcade space shooter with a simple retro design. The player earns score for destroying asteroids and enemy space ships. The game has a single player mode and a two players co-op mode on a single computer.

name: Space Crawl
summary: Built exclusively for VR, Space Crawl launches you aboard an abandoned space station. Handle weapons with real-life movements, dodge space aliens, move in zero-gravity, and put your survival skills to the test. Truly an immersive first person zero-gravity experience.

name: Spirits of Freedom
summary: Embark on this Epic Platform-Style Adventure, Inspired by the Most Iconic Games Ever. Race with WOLFY, and Fly with FOXY on a journey to save your home with the help of the Rainbow Spirits and their friends.

name: Sprint Cars Road to Knoxville
